author: {'steamid': '76561198297645415', 'num_games_owned': 732, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 775, 'last_played': 1710238060}
review:
Фетишистам по шрамам и одноглазым девушкам посвящается.
Ну а вообще, сюжетик дефолтная романтика приукрашенная фишкой а-ля она не такая, с ней никто не дружит и она иная, но я пойду и подружусь с ней. В принципе тут есть значки и достижения что многими ценятся, ну и сам разраб оставил в игре "послесловие" в галерее где он сам сказал что профукал много времени не туда и сделал всё в последнее время, само по себе то что он планировал изначально могло быть интереснее чем этого проходняка с дефолтной базой сюжета.

author: {'steamid': '76561198279825253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1711026266}
review: Коротенька нестандартна новела. Чесно кажучи, очікував більшого, хоча б по хронометражу, але навіть за тих 3 години я встиг прив'язатись до історії. Дуже шкода, що весь сюжет обмежився поверхневим розкриттям персонажів і протягом проходження не було варіантів вибору... Залишалось просто спостерігати за розвитком подій. Але навіть так, все таки мені не хочеться якось негативити в сторону цього проекту, мені сподобалась ця мила маленька любовна історія.

author: {'steamid': '76561199228834208', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1710978015}
review:
This game is total CR**...  Don't bother wasting your time OR MONEY.  The ONLY REDEEMING QUALITY is the artwork of Sachi.. It's cute.

Story is almost a ZERO out of 10.  And you can tell that besides Sachi's artwork no love was put in making this game.  EVEN the developer confesses that it was a rush job, and he hated doing it after he started, AND that he had to meet a deadline so basically he just spewed out trash.

0/10.

review:
[h1]100% Achievements[/h1]
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Difficulty[/th]
        [th]Very Easy[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Time[/td]
        [td]1 hour[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Gameplay Skill[/td]
        [td]Unnecessary [/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Note[/td]
        [td]Just play as described in the achievements.[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

ストーリは記憶に残らない内容ではあるが、ヒロインが可愛いかったので無問題。

ゲームボリュームと価格が釣り合っていないように感じるが、
100% Achievementsマニアにはお勧めできるゲームである。

[h1]実績コンプについて[/h1]
実績の説明通りプレイすればOKと言いたいところだが、下記実績のみはミスリードがあるので注意。
隠し実績の「なまこ発見：ギャラリーのFAを見る」はギャラリーで発見できない。（2024/02/11時点）
FAは[Extras]→[History]のどこかにあるので探してみよう

author: {'steamid': '76561197982854475', 'num_games_owned': 1746, 'num_reviews': 181, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 594, 'last_played': 1706660591}
review:
ARTWORK:
Pretty unique, and creepy in a positive way, and not just because of the one eyed girl protagonist. Given how short it is, there is a decent number of CGs, and even more "after story" bonuses, plus a number of short animations. Unfortunately, the game is of rather low and 4:3 resolution. Still, this is by far the main forte of the game.

STORY:
The story is a generic linear and very predictable friendship and love affair between the one eyed girl and the protagonist, that leaves a little bit to be desired in many areas. There is little background or story building around the main character's "one-eyedness". It is very short, with little character build up, and with the ups and downs of the story being rather flat. 

INTERFACE:
The engine and UI used for this visual novel is Renpy, an issue given the issues of the latter. No explanation of keyboard shortcuts is provided, and no auto setting in the general interface, for example.

SOUND:
Music is passable but rather generic and monotone. No voice acting provided.

SUMMARY:
Given the steep price vs. the amount of content included, I would only recommend it for the niche creepy artwork, and if so, on a 70% to 75% sale. Given this game is mostly a one person affair, however, I still give props to the creator. 5/10 at full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162769688', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1699100796}
review:
[h1] 이야기를 보여주는 작품 [/h1]
개인적으로 미소녀 연애 시뮬레이션, 이하 미연시, 장르를 직접 하거나 하진 않았고, 지인 어깨 넘어로 보기만 하였다.
그러므로 다른 미연시 게임과 비교는 하지 않았다.

일단 개인적인 평가로는
[b]"게임을 한다"[/b] 보다는
[b]"책을 읽는다 "[/b] 라는 느낌을 많이 받았다.
그래서 해당 제품을 [b]"게임"[/b] 이 아닌 [b]"작품"[/b] 이라고 설명하였다.

[h3]해당 작품은 이야기의 진행만을 제공한다.[/h3]
이야기가 진행하는 동안 플레이어에게 어떠한 시련, 고민, 선택지 등을 요구하지도 제공하지도 않는다.
[b]그런 이유로 저장기능과 불러오기 기능은 큰 의미를 가지지 않는다. [/b]

결국 플레이어는 다음 글을 읽기 위한 상호작용(ex. 마우스 좌클릭)만을 필요로 한다.
단순히 이야기의 진행을 위해(혹은 이야기와 함께 보여지는 캐릭터를 보기 위해) 게임을 진행할 뿐이다.

이야기에 대한 내용은 혹 스포가 될 수도 있으니 블라인드 처리를 하도록 하겠다.
내용에 대한 직접적인 스포는 존재하지 않으며
이야기의 플롯에 대한 내용을 한줄로 평가하였다.
[spoiler]개인적으로 이야기의 플롯은 누군가에게 괴롭힘을 당하는 소심한 여자주인공을 도와주는 특별할것 없는 이야기라고 생각한다.[/spoiler]
결론적으론 외눈박이라는 여자 주인공의 특수성이 이 작품을 특별하게 만든다고 생각한다.

개인적인 생각으론, 이 작품은 서브컬쳐의 굿즈라고 보았다.
해당 작품의 개발사, 그림작가 등의 팬심 혹은 응원이 될 수도 있다.

게임과 유저간 상호작용을 중요시 하는 플레이어는 해당 작품을 추천하진 않는다.
특이한 이야기를 좋아하는 사람
이야기를 읽는 것을 좋아하는 사람
해당 작품을 만든 사람들을 응원하는 사람들은
책 한권 산다고 생각하며 가벼운 마음으로 구매해도 괜찮다고 본다.

author: {'steamid': '76561199429519805', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1696503218}
review:
游玩过程总想着会不会反转，不过看来就是一个很简单的故事。
这个规模的眼睛眼球应该快赶上脑子大了，还有眼睛大其实很容易跑进脏东西，拥有这么大的眼睛睫毛的实用性就等于零了。
通关本游戏后有一些其他剧情可游玩，应该是网友二创的剧情？因为英语水平接近幼儿园所以没玩，看起来也是挺有意思的Σ(⊙▽⊙"a

author: {'steamid': '76561199436938338', 'num_games_owned': 273, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1690839113}
review:
Love Ray-K wish he put more effort into marketing his works online. His works display uniqueness I don't see in any other artist or author for some reason 
Moving on though I liked the characters and mood this VN had, am disappointed seeing so much left out clearly. The music was a bit jarring to start with but I think it grew on me later simply due to the mood the VN was setting weirdly enough 
Had I heard it anywhere else I would be complaining a lot more tho. 
Several sprites, backgrounds, original tracks and a likeable cast is here. There is a lot of good to excuse its short comings but I do feel bitter that I couldn't see the authors full vision for the game 

I don't think I would recommend this to majority of people but if you have any interest in Ray-K definitely get it. If you aren't sure wait for a sale

author: {'steamid': '76561198350213501', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1690081608}
review:
7.5/10
非常可爱的一款游戏！给高分的理由完全是因为游戏本身想传达的纯粹的内容和能引发笔者的一些共鸣。四位可爱的主人公（高冷傲娇男、元气美少女、青春猪头少年和敏感但心善可爱纯洁的少女）都给我带来不同的感觉，笔者可以在两位男生的身上看到自己从前与现在的影子（护→知赖），可以在两位女生身上也能体悟到女性的力量（幸敏感脆弱但又能鼓起勇气做出改变、明美那样永远充满活力且心地干净善良的纯粹，不得不让人怀念从前的校园恋爱啊！泪目）。而且本作让我也联想到了一部漫画《迷之彼女X》，这部漫画也特别介绍了青春期男女恋爱的成长经验与心路历程（不过是女生主导的漫画，没有小幸那样稍显被动啦），真的可以说两部作品都是能带给人力量的。
福永护→福永幸！保护对方并让对方永远幸福下去吧!

ps:本作因为女主的眼睛的问题和XP所以会让大多数人看起来有些些奇怪，但其实深入玩下去，其实笔者觉得是十分正常且可以被广泛包容的，本作除了一个坏人，其余人都特别可爱！

author: {'steamid': '76561199445270823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1689308947}
review:
This has to be one of the best games I've played, I know it's linear, it is literally the textbook definition of a visual novel as there are no choices, but that is not a bad thing in this case, it's one of the best experiences I've ever had with a game and I am waaay more than satisfied, this game has left me with such a big sense of joy in my heart, the art, music, compiled with the storytelling, I BADLY want another installment continuing on the story, but as it stands right now if this is the end, I am more than happy with the outcome.

I cannot express enough how I feel about this experience, I highly recommend it, despite what peoples impressions of this game are, it's so worth a buy, if I could buy this game again I would just to support the creator, absolutely Amazing novel of a game.

review: 玩了8.7个小时全通成就全达成，这里必须要说，幸非常可爱，是纯爱，一开始觉得会有恐怖成分，之后才发现是个纯纯恋爱游戏，剧情没有分支，没有任何选项，纯爱党可推荐，有喜欢伤口的也很推荐，并且，全cg画的非常好看我个人非常喜欢，bgm也非常棒，是一种诡异的可爱，非常诡异但是非常上头的背景音乐让我大吃一惊，很值得推荐，最后感谢作者，游戏非常精彩

author: {'steamid': '76561198041836740', 'num_games_owned': 990, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1686441459}
review:
Короткая милая визуальная новелла, где герой пытается подружиться с одноглазой девушкой. Разных концовок и выбора тут нет вообще, но история неплоха сама по себе. Если вас цепляют истории со спасением изгоев, то наверняка зайдёт.
Рисовка на любителя, мне лично понравилась, но думаю для кого-то может создать ощущение криповости, хотя ничего такого сюжетом не подразумевается. Музыка особо не запомнилась, один трек вообще создавал какое-то не к месту ощущение напряжение в абсолютно мирной и спокойной сцене.
За свой ценник игра очень уж коротка, потому советую брать только по скидке.

author: {'steamid': '76561199490084333', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 515, 'last_played': 1690351571}
review:
本人是Ray老师的粉丝❤️❤️，这部独眼妹作品自然是因此而购买，内容很短，很快一小时不到就能完结。并且这是纯爱作品没有涩涩哦。幸这个形象应该是除了希尔薇之外很出名的角色了，很敏感而又可爱，非常非常非常喜欢这部作品，希望这部作品会有后续以及更多插画出现，感谢Ray-kbys！！！！！
另外如果希尔薇能上steam不管多少钱我都买，作者的画风真的很奇怪而又好看让人着迷，虽然自己推特被作者屏蔽了呜呜呜呜.....有能力请支持正版或者在DL上购买
I am a fan of Teacher Ray ❤️❤️， This one eyed girl work was naturally purchased for this reason, and the content was very short, which could be completed in less than an hour. And this is a pure love work without pornography. The female protagonist should be a well-known character besides Sylvia, very sensitive and cute, and I really, really like this work. I hope this work will have follow-up and more illustrations. Thank you Ray-kbys!!!!!
Also, if Sylvia can join Steam for any amount of money, I will buy it. The author's art style is really strange and attractive, even though my own Twitter has been blocked by the author. If you have the ability, please support the genuine version or purchase it on DL

author: {'steamid': '76561198928624492', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 499, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 499, 'last_played': 1679368646}
review:
This is a Cute Romance between a Boy and a Girl with ONE eye who is being bullied... The game does NOT have multiple routes or any choices. IF that is okay then I recommend this game. ALSO This game cost me $2.50 and took me about 8 hours to complete.

Here is what you get (The pros and cons are kind of mixed so I'll write them together)

Cute Romance - Our Characters falls in love with the one eyed girl who is being bullied. We get some cute time together and get to help her gain confidence and make friends.

Art/Music - We have a decent amount in the story but we get a LOT more in the extras section after the game and the Trading Cards are VERY cute as well.

Bullying - We find out that there is ONLY one bully... This makes it hard to believe that Sachi got all those injuries just from one person or that she couldn't make ANY friends... IT also makes you wonder why she thinks of herself as a Freak.... IT also feels like most people just sit around and let it continue to happen without stopping the bullying.

Fetish Of SCARS and EATING - Our character will like Sachi's scars and ask to touch them often...The creator says there is a "eating" and "scar" fetish which is why Sachi has so many injuries and is bandaged. (Sachi is the one eyed girl)

Cutting Scenes - By this I mean that when our character got home we skip to when we are back at school, when we go out to the movie on our date it just skips until we are done watching the movie.... This occurs a bit too much when there could definitely have been a lot more content added that would add depth.

Cut Off Happy Ending - The END of the game was kind of random. We don't get ANY closure with it... BUTTTT You will have to complete the game and look through the additional and extra content to find out what happens at the end... ONCE you find this content you will realize the ending and understand the conclusion.

Game Could Have Been Better - The creator mentioned they were going to add multiple routes but didn't because they were rushed to completion... In the extras we do get a lot more images and information about the development of the game. There could have been a lot more added.... 

CONCLUSION:

This game is pretty cute and should warm your heart and maybe make you attracted to the look of injuries.

IF this game had multiple endings, more depth of characters and events, and choices I would highly recommend it but right now I just regular recommend it. Good and Cute Game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198139199259', 'num_games_owned': 414, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1676715391}
review:
Great little slice of wholesomeness! Surprised me a lot with unexpected depth!
I really liked how the character being a monster girl wasn't either left undiscussed or used only for fetish fuel. They gave us angst about her being mistreated for being different, and finding confidence and a reason to live thanks to the kindness of her new boyfriend. 
I wanted to cry at all the sweet little scenes of her experiencing normal happiness for the first time, she acts as if just walking alongside her without feeling ashamed to be with her is the kindest thing anyone's ever done for her. I was cheering for her to realise she deserves all this and more! And the protagonist was surprisingly endearing for a mostly blank slate guy, just from the sheer enthusiasm he had for making her happy. He saw a person in need and was immediately determined to do everything it takes to make her see how wonderful she is, and how she deserves the love he has for her!
The friend characters were also adorable and I really liked Tomo with his unusual take on the tsundere archetype where instead of being overly grumpy he instead pretends to be bored and not care about his friends but whenever they need him he's always there with great support and advice. And it was such a lovely idea to have the two advice friends end up dating too in the end! The double date at the crepe shop was so cute, what a lovely ending!

However, I do have a few things that detracted slightly from the experience:
* This isn't a visual novel, its a kinetic novel. Personally I enjoy both, but having it incorrectly labelled might lead to confusion, I'd reccommend fixing that.
* Music quality is spotty, some tracks are great but the track for tense moments is like five notes repeated over and over.
* The art is a little... uncanny? The combination of very exaggerated cartoony proportions with overly detailed realistic shading makes certain poses look odd. (Akemi's pose with the giant hand) Sometimes Sachi's eye looks like you just grabbed a regular anime eye and stretched it with content aware scaling. The game was so heartwarming that I quickly tuned it out though, it didn't detract from the emotional moments.
* The fetish content. I'm not objecting to the inclusion of it, even though I personally don't have those fetishes and didn't enjoy it at all. I think the problem is more that it's poorly executed. The entire tone of the game is extremely wholesome and the couple's relationship is very chaste with no actual sexual content. You don't even actually see them kiss in the end, you only see them leaning in for it. So it seems completely inconsistant that there's sudden random scenes of feeding each other food or touching bruises which are described in extremely intense sexualized detail when nothing else is. It's just very obvious it's the writer inserting their own fetish appeal, rather than being written to make sense for the characters.

None of this stopped me from enjoying the game though, I just thought it was worth mentioning in a review if like me you'd prefer to skip those particular scenes. But if that's a thing you're into, then I hope you enjoy!

Overall, it's extremely impressive to hear that this game was made in 2 months and I'd love to play any future games by this developer!

author: {'steamid': '76561198129171202', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 60, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1674390919}
review:
Без спойлеров.
Есть русификатор. Кое-какой, но есть.

Линейная визуальная новелла в жанре повседневность, в которой толком ничего не происходит. Изюминкой игры является главная героиня и в общем-то и всё.

Обычное милое и спокойное чтиво на 3 часа, которое может пробить на эмоции, берите по скидке.

Игра и история в ней слишком простая, однако лично мне очень нравится творчество автора (Ray-Kbys), рекомендую ознакомиться. Кроме основной истории автор также делится своими наработками в игре.

author: {'steamid': '76561198838694436', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 258, 'last_played': 1673194989}
review:
Love at first sight is a short and sweet visual novel game, where you follow the tale of Sachi Uchi and yourself.
It has no choices or VAs but it has a really sweet and wholesome story, wich makes up for it.
The game is short so you can finish it on one day, and it does not cost this much.
And I would pay any price for Sachi, she is the core and the heart of the game.
So if you want a sweet short time with a one eyed girl that you will not get enough of then buy it.

I give the game 33 of 42 points.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997375821', 'num_games_owned': 439, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1669950219}
review:
this VN is what would happen if you took the "what's with the eye" gag from futurama and stretched it into a 3 hour game 

Pros:
+ artstyle has a danganronpa feel to its aesthethic and who's more qualified to issue that comparison than someone who's never played a single entry in the franchise
+ the grounded characterization and interactions save the otherwise generic story beats
+ the creator not only has both a scar and feeding fetish but had the brass balls to admit it in the extras
+ Tomoyori is based and Tanaka-pilled
+ The extras are genuinely hilarious and worth the purchase alone

Cons:

- Kinetic novel so once you've found your way around the varied intricacies of left clicking you're pretty much set for life
- The antagonist is so one-dimensional it makes The Room seem shakespearean by comparison
- not having a [spoiler]confession scene with Tomoyori and Akemi[/spoiler] is one of many missed opportunities in this game.
- the storyline explores the character's personalities but the lack of fleshed out side-characters makes the developments feel cheap as a result
- Very short

Conclusion: Honestly, this is a tough one for me. There's definite heart in here that I cannot shake. The author himself admits that he finished this game at the last minute with an estimated development time of two months.

With this in mind, I can't shake the feeling that this could've been a masterpiece with the right degree of polish and care. The potential was absolutely there. Listed throughout the extras were so many scrapped concepts and storylines that just never happened because of the self-imposed deadline which caused the overall quality of his vision to suffer immensely as a result.

Even still, I preferred that this universe actually exists to some capacity as opposed to remaining on the drawing board indefinitely. The overall quality darts between passable to genuinely entertaining on a near-constant basis, but who knows how well-regarded it could've been with more time and effort. 

I don't regret my purchase even if it only provided a glimpse of what could've been.

author: {'steamid': '76561199201054238', 'num_games_owned': 131, 'num_reviews': 251, 'playtime_forever': 494, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 438, 'last_played': 1668691750}
review:
这是一个独眼女孩萨琪被救赎的温馨故事，人物还是一如既往刻画鲜明，各具特色，故事循序渐进，无太大的波澜起伏，相对于一般的恋爱游戏略显普通，唯独人设上较为奇特（独眼）但却深深引起我的共鸣，被狠狠的代入到游戏中去了，不仅仅是因为细腻的人物形象刻画，让人物生动真实，更是因为我身边就有一个这样的“萨琪”，同样是身体缺陷，家庭不和，学校孤立，而且从这种境遇走出来真的需要极大的关怀和巨大的勇气，而且很幸运，她和游戏中的萨琪一样重拾对生活的信心，而且也拥有了活下去的勇气，能见证她的成长，我荣幸至极，祝愿萨琪和她一样，继续坚强，越走越远，冲破生活的阴霾，勇敢坚强的爱这个世界吧。
对于校园暴力绝不能坐视不管，被施暴者一定要勇于反抗，这是自己生命的负责，而普通人也绝不能做旁观者，一定要给予自己力所能及的帮助，有时一个小小的善良真的能挽救一个鲜活的生命，我认为这是任何一个有良心的人都该具备的品质。勿以善小而不为，勿以恶小而为之。
9.6（10.0）亚萨西的通病没法让我打更高分，对于施暴者绝不姑息，严惩肢体暴力和语言暴力，拒绝做“圣母”！

author: {'steamid': '76561198087090645', 'num_games_owned': 4782, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1667976155}
review:
I must admit that what caught my eye about this one was the cyclops girl, and it definitely is a great hook, but that's not all the game has to offer.
Besides the nice art the story is well written and really sweet and relatable despite the odd premise, also the plot is surprisingly grounded, with the only bad thing I can think about being this one song that repeats several times over the length of the game that actually sounds pretty bad, but that's just one in the entire soundtrack. So if you're up for an awkward and cute first love tale, I really enjoyed my time with this VN and can recommend it. Do check the extras after you're done with the main story, there's quite a few things worthy of a look like extra scenes.

BTW, yes there's some fetish stuff in here as you might suspect, but it's pretty tame and doesn't have anything to do with the... eye situation.

review:
Я не могу назвать её плохой - она довольно милая, добрая, и с положительно вложенным смыслом + автор приложил старания при создании, но проблема в том, что она до безумия банальна и тривиальна в плане сюжета - вы абсолютно ничего не потеряете не пройдя её - именно поэтому не могу её рекомендовать. 
P.S. Единственная хоть сколь бы то ни было по настоящему оригинальная деталь это то, что главная героиня является одноглазой - но абсолютно всем плевать на это, никого эта аномалия не волнует и никоем образом не раскрывается.

author: {'steamid': '76561198848079607', 'num_games_owned': 1780, 'num_reviews': 297, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1667536718}
review:
游戏名：ひと目惚れ Love at First Sight。  中文名：一见钟情。

全年龄版游戏。

内容：游戏主要讲述了男主和卡姿兰大眼睛少女恋爱的故事，玩家们吃他们的狗粮就行了。

PS： 此游戏作者与神作希尔薇作者是同一个人，故此画风也相似超可爱的，价格也不贵就当买来支持希尔薇了。

游戏没有汉化，但我保存的有汉化补丁，有需要的朋友可以加我后说明来意问我要。

author: {'steamid': '76561198244318644', 'num_games_owned': 164, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1667397217}
review: Primeiramente gostaria de dizer que essa novel me pegou de surpresa , não esperava ser tão boa quanto parecia , a historia é extremamente comovente e bem escrita , a relação que nosso protagonista tem com os demais foram muito bem construídas de fato , a trilha sonora é bem aceitável para um jogo desse porte , as poucas animações são boas e cada ato que da mais e mais vontade de continuar a historia para saber o que ira acontecer em seguida , de fato um jogo que entrara para minhas novels favoritas , é simples porem feita com amor , não é o tipo de novel onde vc possui caminhos ou nada complexo , é simplesmente uma bela narração contada do cotidiano desses personagens e sobre as dificuldades e preconceitos que  um deles sofre , é divertido , é romântico , é triste e alegre , se eu soubesse o quão bom fosse a obra eu teria comprado no preço total dela e não em promoção , mas ai vai da parte de vcs , eu particularmente acho que vale muito a pena , e recomendo para leitores de novels que buscam uma boa historia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198000760544', 'num_games_owned': 1247, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 419, 'last_played': 1667272052}
review: Love at First Sight is charming enough to draw in interest with a quirky heroine with a genuine story about young love. The art is hauntingly beautiful for a novel of its time and offers more than most modern kinetic novels do with varying expressions and scenes. The story itself doesn't do anything extraordinary with the cast you have been introduced to though however and instead offers the mildest taste of eroguro you can find in a novel of this nature. While the afterword provides explanations as to the faults of the game, I still find myself uncertain as to how I feel in regards to the story. It feels as though Sachi could have been written with any ailment and it would have not affected anything. There are hints to her being clumsy, which would have played well into being a Cyclops, but they are hardly touched upon. I'm unsure if this is due to the original writer's intention or due to a poor translation. Regardless, if you're looking for a cute short story with varied personalities, this little novel may be up your alley especially since it provides additional content to read after the story has concluded.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143406978', 'num_games_owned': 1979, 'num_reviews': 321, 'playtime_forever': 456, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1666650391}
review:
'이상한변호사 우영우'에서는 자폐증 걸린 우영우와 함께 다니는 이준호를 자원봉사자로 착각하는 주변인들이 나온다 
그리고 그들은 이준호에게 동정과 연민 때문에 우영우를 만나는 것이라면 그만두라고 말한다
외눈박이소녀의 사랑, 'Love at First Sight'에서는 우스이 사치라는 외눈박이 소녀가 나온다
그녀에게 호기심을 갖고 접근하는 주인공에게 주변인들은 단순 호기심때문에 접근 하는 것 아니냐고 묻는다 
외모가 다르거나 장애를 갖고 있다고 해서 그들이 사랑을 모르는 것은 아니다
그들 또한 감정을 갖고 있고 결국에는 우리와 같은 인간이라는 것이다 
그들을 특별한 존재로 대하기 보다는 일반인 같이 평범하게 대하는 것이 진정한 배려 아닐까?
이 비주얼 노벨은 단순한 연애물이 아니고 남들과 다른 외모를 가지고 있는 소녀가 주인공의 배려와 애정으로 인해 점차 변화하고 주체성을 갖게 되는 성장드라마라고 할 수 있다  

결론 - 도전과제 매우 쉬움(가이드 참조시 1시간 이내 달성)

author: {'steamid': '76561198108876422', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1662599157}
review:
Forfeit all mortal possessions to Ray-K.
A short and sweet visual novel by an artist with a unique art style. Objectively speaking, it's a short game, with it's main selling point being the unique heroine, and Ray-K's art. It's not a particularly groundbreaking, but it's well done, and an enjoyable read. Subjectively speaking, it's fantastic, and I love it, and when is Ray-K going to make more, the man is a genius. I need more. I'm a goddamn addict for that man's work and I'm foaming at the mouth for more of it to be in English. GIVE IT TO ME SEKAI PROJECT.

tl;dr It's pretty good.

author: {'steamid': '76561199234503461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1327, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1327, 'last_played': 1660294688}
review:
Cute story and characters. I enjoyed it overall.
A nice short story with only one path (no interaction), and I like it this way in that it's simple and can be fully digested in a short time. It has this simple and high school drama feeling and I felt like I was traveling back to good ol' 90s games of this genre (of sorts!). Enjoyed browsing the gallery and post-completion material, though there are times where I wondered whether there could be some kind of quick menu to return to the Extras screen when I accidentally clicked on character profiles (has happened multiple times, and I had to keep on clicking my way out of the text and character expression display).
Also enjoyed reading the author's thoughts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064616944', 'num_games_owned': 379, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 903, 'last_played': 1656864084}
review:
This was a marvelous read.

It's not the usual visual novel game (from admittedly my limited experience with them) as it doesn't have any options, but regardless of that, this is still fantastic. The art style looked great, and the music was good too!

Basically, all of the characters in this game were absolutely great. Sachi do be the cutest girl, and the story was quite good in my opinion, with a nice happy ending. 
[spoiler]Perhaps with one loose thread of the bully that we couldn't fix/help be less violent which is unfortunate.[/spoiler] < Minor spoiler of the bully

In the 'Afterword' section in the extras, the creator says some pretty interesting stuff, which makes me wonder why he decided to not update the game to include all the things he wanted to include and all the cut content. I think that would have been great.
He also says the weird line of 'Don't count on me fixing this version', which I don't understand, but even if it wasn't up to the creator's full vision, what we got was still awesome.

Overall, pretty good story. Not much of an interactive game, so don't go into this expecting that. Instead, go into it expecting a good read/story.

author: {'steamid': '76561199046921200', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 343, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 343, 'last_played': 1656308126}
review:
Ray佬的作品无需多言 绘画很有特色 本作也是一如既往继承了Ray的残缺美和人外属性的爱好 对于这方面有兴趣的肯定不会失望
抛开设定不谈 本作的剧情简单 篇幅较短 整体素质中规中矩  但对于文本以及情感的刻画倒不错（小幸超级可爱）
表现方式上就是传统的静态adv 中间有制作动态过场动画 表现力中规中矩 都是靠优秀的美工衬托
值得一说的是 本作虽然是Ray佬早期作品 但是也在不断更新（人物立绘大幅精美化重做） 截止这篇评测为止是2.0 后续以及先前的版本立绘都有在作者的账号公开 感兴趣的可以自行搜索（我个人觉得2.0的最有味道）
购买建议方面 虽然本作美术优秀 设定新颖 但我看来还是粉丝向作品 篇幅过于简短 对于路人玩家来说 如果有兴趣可以在打折时入手 推一遍也是非常温馨治愈的

author: {'steamid': '76561198859386092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1640983487}
review: É definitivamente uma boa VN, queria que tivesse opções de escolhas mas é só um detalhe. A historia é si é rasa porém muito fofa, é um romance bem básico e direto, é bom, contudo a trilha sonora é bem ruim tanto que em certos momentos eu retirei o audio do jogo e coloquei alguma outra OST para ter mais impacto (No caso a trilha sonora era meio cativante sendo que era um momento tenso, era algo bem desconexo), no geral é sim uma boa VN, vale muito a pena o investimento a história como disse, aquece o coração, o relacionamento do MC com a protagonista, Sachi, é algo muito bonito e tem varios momentos de reflexão e metalinguagem que traçam paralelos com outras situações, como depressão, angustia, não se sentir inserido e até mesmo a busca pela felicidade. Se fosse possivel eu daria uma nota 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061402089', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1638973358}
review:
A very cute VN game about high school romance and overcoming bullying! There's nothing too fancy about the game itself, but the story is short and sweet. I also love the art style of the author, and the music tracks are enjoyable. The author seems to berate himself a lot in the afterwords for the game's imperfections, but I think it turned out pretty good honestly.

Overall, would recommend for a light-hearted read, especially if it's on sale. 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198284342728', 'num_games_owned': 1570, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 436, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 435, 'last_played': 1658388309}

review: 本作女主让人生出很强的怜爱之情，这个作品的优势在这，能让人迅速的投入感情，但是劣势也在这，因为如果只是怜爱之情那么和爱情还是有区别的，不过这个作品完结在了恰到好处的时间点能让人忽略这个劣势。

author: {'steamid': '76561198440193847', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 573, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1638354175}
review:
中文补：1nvgaXnF 
解压密码：cssxsh
汉化者的话：
1.本汉化补丁由cssxsh（创世神小生化）与Kiiro合作制作。Kiiro负责翻译，cssxsh负责录入文本，打包补丁，测试补丁。
2.制作这个汉化补丁的目的是为了给steam版增加可选的中文选项。所以我们在尽量不修改游戏文件的基础上做出汉化工作。
3.另外制作补丁用的是简体中文，习惯使用繁体中文的朋友可能会不习惯，请多多包涵。
4.感谢网络上前辈们提供的Ren'Py引擎游戏汉化教程和汉化工具。
5.汉化补丁是patch_chs.rpa文件，安装时放在游戏根目录下的game文件夹中即可。如需卸载汉化补丁，只需删除patch_chs.rpa文件即可。
6.汉化过程百密一疏，可能存在文本错漏或者bug。如有疑问请通过邮箱cssxsh@gmail.com联系。如有空闲时间我会尽快回复。
7.汉化版本：测试版。
汉化声明：
1.本汉化补丁仅用于学习交流研究。
2.汉化部分版权归cssxsh与Kiiro所有，不得对补丁进行修改后重新发布。
3.汉化使用的字体是文泉驿正黑。官网：http://wenq.org/wqy2/index.cgi 
4.请勿用于商业或盈利用途，不得作为实体刊物的附带品。请支持正版游戏。
5.汉化最终解释权cssxsh与Kiiro所有.

author: {'steamid': '76561198833251447', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 807, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 779, 'last_played': 1636787765}
review:
这是我第一次庆幸我曾经死磕英语了五年...... 五年啊五年 你知道我是怎么熬过来的吗 托福我鈤你先人
嗯嗯 跑题了 对于我这种选择困难症患者来说 这无疑是一款好游戏 因为不用纠结于选哪个结果bad end (因为只有一条线直通 happy end 嘛）
加之相信有相当一部分人是从秃头少女跑来的 若果您看到这条品论 别犹豫了 赶快攒兜里玩吧
糖啊 糖啊 都是糖 
（唯一的瑕疵可能就是完成度稍微拉了点 略剧透-- 最后不能对黄毛重拳出击稍微有点遗憾（个人觉得） 而且玩了之后除了咱可爱的大眼萌妹 我竟然觉得基友还不戳  最后就是要是咱姨的戏份更多就好了 妥妥的外冷内热冰沙雕美人啊 ）

author: {'steamid': '76561198809625029', 'num_games_owned': 101, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1637900772}
review:
Bastante bueno, una novela visual para entrar y salir en un rato
No es nada del otro mundo, excepto a la tierna cíclope que es el eje central de la novela, el arte es bastante bueno a mi parecer y viene de la misma mano de aquel sujeto que ilustra el infame "Teaching Feeling" xD
La historia es simple, pero no aburrida, no soy mucho de estos tipos de "Juegos" pero me enganchó casi inmediatamente, quizás tenga algo por vidas escolares interesantes, en contraste a mi aburrida vida :sad: 
Recomendado, si puedes compralo, está muy bueno
8.5/10

review:
Its pretty short, but it doesnt waste your time. The story is a nice heartwarming one too. You make a few choices, but it doesnt have 50 different endings. I would recommend it if you would like a short and cute romance story with a bit of an odd girl.

This was my first exposure to Ray-K's art, it is very "distinct", to the point where it instantly pops out if you ever see it anywhere. I have to say, Ray-K has earned his spot at the top tier of artists for me with this and some of his other works.

author: {'steamid': '76561199029677066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1628340784}
review:
1 parte PT-BR
2 English part
3 日本語部分


1 parte PT-BR 

Simplesmente uma Obra de arte.

Recomendo jogar.

- Historia - Uma historia de romance simples porem muito profunda - 10/10.

- Arte - O estilo artistico simplesmete e apaixonante traços unicos com cores bem selecionadas. - 10/10.

- Personagems - todos são bem construidos e desenvolvidos. - 10/10.


* Espero ver mais jogos do Ray-k na steam como exemplo.

- Butterfly Affection.
-Teaching Feeling.

entre jogos de historias antigas e novas.

2 English part

Simply a work of art.

I recommend playing.

- Story - A simple yet very deep romance story - 10/10.

- Art - The artistic style is simply and passionate, unique features with well-selected colors. - 10/10.

- Characters - all are well built and developed. - 10/10.


* Hope to see more Ray-k games on steam as an example.

- Butterfly Affection.
-Teaching Feeling.

between old and new story games.

 3 日本語部分

単に芸術作品。

遊ぶことをお勧めします。

-ストーリー-シンプルでありながら非常に深いロマンスストーリー-10/10。

-アート-芸術的なスタイルは、厳選された色を使用したシンプルで情熱的なユニークな機能です。 -10/10。

-キャラクター-すべてがうまく構築され、開発されています。 -10/10。


*例としてSteamでもっと多くのRay-kゲームを見たいと思っています。

-バタフライ愛情。
-奴隷との生活。

古いストーリーゲームと新しいストーリーゲームの間。

author: {'steamid': '76561198133950580', 'num_games_owned': 124, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1631008714}
review:
甜! 甜! 甜!

一本道的純愛劇情 加上獨特的女主角人設是吸引我的主因, 買之前就先預覽過評論區, 實際遊戲體驗也如評論所述: 遊玩過程可以充滿微笑, 全通劇情後心情舒暢! 平常不太購買視覺小說的遊戲, 這是除了心跳心跳文學社以來覺得相當不錯的作品, 値得推薦!
另外, 女主角的個性上偏小動物系, 我見猶憐讓人想保護她這類型的, 但我更喜歡明美的活潑開朗性格, 作者後日談有提到本來要做成一般視覺小說那樣有劇情選項, 但是初做遊戲加上時間不足最後沒有朝多路線遊戲發展, 不然可能有明美結局也說不定. 目前這樣我覺得也蠻好的, 各有歸屬 可喜可賀.

最後, 目前遊戲只有"英文"及"日文"兩種語言, 看不懂的同學請謹慎購買, 畢竟這類遊戲看不懂台詞很難有帶入感, 遊戲體驗會大打折扣.

review:
Очаровательная несчастная одноглазая девочка не умеет разговаривать и ненавидит себя, а гг ояш ее героически спасает от школьницы [spoiler]чем заслуживает бесконечную любовь и возможность трогать шрамы одноглазой  на потеху фетишистам[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198172226653', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1627272305}
review:
[h1]Cons[/h1]
[list]
[*]It's a very short VN with no choices.
[*]The art can be off-puting if you aren't familiar with/dislike gothic aesthetics.
[*]The music is objectively grating.
[*]Sadokawa is a bit shoehorned in, it feels.
[/list]
[h1]Pros[/h1]
[list]
[*]The story is succinct and feels right. 
[*]None of the characters are without flaw, and their flaws are reasonable (except for Sadokawa, whose complexities are very heavily implied)
[*]Sachi is cute. You can satisfyingly channel your emotions through all the predetermined actions that Mamoru will take/do.
[*]The artist's scar fetish is neat.
[*]Sachi and her aunt have a well-written relationship.
[/list]

author: {'steamid': '76561198991971313', 'num_games_owned': 5821, 'num_reviews': 366, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1605386153}
review:
Изначально на других сайтах я ознакомился с другими играми автора, а именно с Butterfly Affection и Teaching Feeling.
Увидев в стиме игру от того же автора, решил наконец таки поддержать его рублём за игры в которые играл ранее и с лёгкой надеждой, что если игра будет коммерчески успешной, то мы рано или поздно увидим их в продаже в стиме.

Купив и пройдя игру не пожалел ни о чём, очень милая визуальная новелла очень милая понравились персонажи в ней. Правда если бы была возможность, то я бы предпочёл заромансить Маюми. 

Рекомендую к покупке и прочтению.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056964275', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 306, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 306, 'last_played': 1621792859}

author: {'steamid': '76561198295160680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1621773324}
review:
I tend to like both pure romance and monster girl series, but I have to unfortunately say this one isn't really worth it unless you have 2 hours to kill and got it on sale.  There's nothing inherently wrong with it, and I really like the art style, but it is very barebones and generic.  Seeing the author's notes, I definitely think I'd prefer this as a manga as they originally intended, since as a kinetic novel it suffers from lacking routes.

Since there are no routes, some things felt jammed together or forced, like the drama around the hour and a half mark that resolved itself within about 15 minutes and was completely irrelevant after, and Rui as a character felt either wasted or just pointless at all.  For a story with emphasis on bullying, there really was not much of substance with that plot.  Also, Sachi got punched in the face and her gigantic weak spot is magically unharmed.

I would complain about the strange obsession with scars and wounds, but I don't really hate the idea, but it felt like the story was sidestepping her being a cyclops and felt like it only mentions it when it's obligated to.  If Sachi was a zombie, I would understand a lot better, but as it was, it just felt like a generic high school first-love romance where the girl happens to be a cyclops than anything of note to do with it.  The sunglasses joke was genuinely funny though.

The art was definitely the strongest point, I'd be down to read a whole series in manga form with it since it's so unique, and perhaps I simply lost some interest because I came in with assumptions that it would have horror aspects to it.

I got the game on sale for $2 and it felt like a 30 minute game, and I didn't get too bored to finish, but I still can't recommend it unfortunately.

author: {'steamid': '76561198361892683', 'num_games_owned': 270, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1625486950}
review: 作者另一部广为人知的作品就是希尔薇，特别的画风一眼就认出来了。作者的癖好是残缺美，希尔薇满身伤痕，大眼萌一只眼睛，还有在本子网站，p站上的无腿，无手，无眼三姐妹···但是可以放心的是故事都很美好······为什么感觉这部游戏这么甜，因为与其他恋爱游戏比，这部是少有的女主有残缺，随后被男主（玩家）帮助，慢慢打开心扉。除了恋爱的甜美，还让玩家多出一种类似于老父亲的溺爱感，（同情心，母性光辉泛滥），不仅想当恋人，还想作为哥哥/姐姐/老父亲/老母亲去照顾她，同时也会让玩家非常有成就感，感觉自己是英雄，干了件大好事。希望在现实中也能保持这份善良

author: {'steamid': '76561198258014411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1620291409}
review:
Alright I'll say it, I'm a huge sucker for wholesome love stories! This game is certainly no exception.

Mainly got this due to the golden-week sale going on. Art looked super cute and liked the idea of 'monster girl' being the main romance option. I put 'monster' in quotes because she is so far from that! The ever shy, meek, and clumsy 1st year, Sachi (or Sa-chan) happens to meet an upperclassman while she's trying to hide away from the world. 

Though this story focuses on the clear romance between Mamoru and Sachi, I'd say seeing the growth Sachi has was so sweet to see. She still has her shy tendencies, but finds strength in standing up to those who have hurt her. Through the obvious love and care she had been deprived from for so long...

Would recommend to get this while it's on a sale. After all, it is a pretty short VN. Finished it in like 3 hours. However, if you're as big of a sucker for wholesome content, then this is a good VN to get!

author: {'steamid': '76561198859464087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1620298424}
review: Si, la historia es linda, la Waifu es adorable, pero quizás la relación precio/contenido no es la mejor, sin embargo tómalo como un modo de ayudar al autor que es el que hizo el arte del ya conocido Teaching Feelings, desconozco si es el que hizo el juego en si pero definitivamente hizo este juego tratando de sacarle el mayor cariño posible, así que te invito a que lo pruebes para apoyar su trabajo

review: Que decir de este juego? es Ray-K. Aquí tienes un juego dulce, tierno y un tanto creepy. Por que ese es el arte y estilo de Ray-K. Muy buen juego, lo recomiendo para que veas un lado no Erótico de Ray-k. Y por que es una muy linda historia. La cosa es simple, si te gusta su arte, si te gusto teaching feeling. review:
Hey hey hey, yo vine a divertirme y pasarla bien, no a llorar :c... Pero fuera de eso, esta obra de Ray-K (su creador) es jodidamente hermosa, (Aunque el concepto de una chica ciclope me parecia extraño y hasta desagradable antes de jugarlo, pero igual me termino encantando c:) pese a su duracion y que no tiene el sistema de decisiones como otros de sus juegos, es simplemente genial ya que si bien el protagonista es independiente de lo que nosotros pensemos o queramos hacer, eso no quita que hay momentos en los cuales uno quisiera intervenir pero no sabria como afrontar la situacion, Totalmente Recomendable si buscas una visual novel con una bonita historia!!!!

PD: RAY-K DESBLOQUEAME DE TU TWITTER PORFA, SI YO NO PIRATEO TUS JUEGOS D:

author: {'steamid': '76561198011333280', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1611505929}
review:
I've liked and followed Ray-K since the beginning, their artstyle and themes. I bought Love at First Sight time ago but just finished it here now. 
It's a linear no-choice Visual Novel (basically pure Visual Novel), with themes about bullying, friendship, love and helping those in need.
With a cute pale one eyed girl~
I do recommend it for it's sweetness and art.

author: {'steamid': '76561198153548662', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 511, 'last_played': 1611394730}
review: Были сомнения по поводу того брать эту игру или нет. Вообще я не любитель ванильных соплей. Покупая эту новеллку точно знала, что здесь они будут. И мне зашло. История повествует о взаимоотношениях между парнем и одноглазой девушкой (очень милой), которая на протяжении всего повествования будет менять свой взгляд на этот мир  и открываться нам. Рисовка просто прелестная и запоминающаяся. Озвучки как таковой здесь нет, музыкальное сопровождение не надоедает. В целом игра довольно длинная и насыщенная на события. Из минусов (лично для меня) могу отметить сливающийся местами шрифт и одинаково прописанные имена. Только на третий акт смогла запомнить имена персонажей и научилась различать их по фразам. В целом все отлично. 9 подвесок на телефон из 10.

review: 没有18+也没有支线，单纯美好的一个故事，Ray-kbys老师的画风是我最喜欢的那种，绷带与伤口、独眼的少女都很戳人XP。

author: {'steamid': '76561199117080679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 623, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1615135605}
review: Рекомендую я эту игру потому что это тупо + ещё одна 100%-но пройденная игра со всеми ачивками в коллекцию, такая никому не помешает. Однако что касается составляющей самой новеллы, тут на самом деле спорный вопрос. Без условно найдутся люди которым очень зайдёт (да что уж там, игре уже больше 5-и лет, и судя по отзывам уже нашлись), но стоит сказать что фетиш, который по факту является главным элементом игры вокруг которого собственно и строится сюжет, довольно специфичен. К тому же довольно сжатое повествование из-за которого персонажи либо не до раскрыты либо раскрыты очень сухо и... пусто я бы сказал, не позволяет полностью прочувствовать некоторые важные эмоциональные моменты, и то что автор новеллы признал это в доп. материалах не означает что это можно ему простить. В самой по себе истории на самом деле нет ничего оригинального, по факту это просто ещё одна ванильная история любви и всем чем она отличается от других это тем что у главной героини один глаз. Вау. Это прям меняет весь сюжет. Ну да история миленькая, ну да добрая если можно так выразится, но на долго в душу она не западает.

author: {'steamid': '76561198389497159', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 256, 'last_played': 1616091665}
review:
This is a short but pretty solid kinetic novel (only 1 route) that should be a simple read for anyone. The story is about what you would expect from a high school romcom with such a character. However, I think the writing is cute and I really liked all the characters. If that is your expectation for this kind of game, then I think you will enjoy it (I mean, you shouldn't really expect any romcom to reinvent the wheels if you ask me). On the other hand, the art style is really unique. I am a huge fan of the artist (ray-k) and while this is one of their earlier works, I still love the style. The music wasn't too special but isn't grating either. The only flaw is that this game was a bit rushed so some scenes felt cut off a bit early, but it didn't really bother me since what is here is good. Another thing is that the dev put their fetish into 2 scenes, but the rest of the game as a whole is still wholesome. 

P.s. Once you finished the game, you gotta check out the extras, it actually has some dialogues after the ending, dev afterword, and some concept art with comments!

author: {'steamid': '76561198097547363', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 356, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 356, 'last_played': 1605993111}
review:
To be honest with you, I really don't know where I stand with this story. It's very... cute, to be sure and it's also rather odd. The story is rather simple and it's really just a kinetic novel, meaning there are no choices whatsoever.

In all honesty, it's a fine enough novel that you can read it and be charmed by the art and especially, Sachi. There really isn't much conflict from this story other than facing off Sachi's bully (if you can even call that a conflict).

The art is fine enough although it really does seem that the artist put their all into Sachi as she was the real star of the show. It really felt everything was centered around her and it felt that nothing else really mattered. Perhaps that's fine for such a straight up kinetic novel.

There are some parts that really needed to be fluffed out and if you're not familiar with the artists' work, you might be a bit surprised by very light ero-guro stuff (particularly, touching a scab) so this is your heads up on that.

Other than that one weird scene, it's really just a very short (~2hrs) love letter to bullied monster girls - in fact, after you beat the game, there are extras where you can read more about the developer's thoughts and feelings about the creation of this game. Nothing against it, but I wish it was a bit longer than what we got. I do like the animated sections, though.

If you're looking for something to kill time with, you should totally check this out!

review:
对于游戏性方面来说由于游戏本身完全没用任何选项只能够当作小说阅读。
游戏本身出现过三个第一人称视角，男主和女主的角色设定表达的还算完善，但是对于反派的塑造和对白似乎有所欠缺，令人无法明白她为什么要这么做，玩家也无从考究她是否曾经发生过什么

author: {'steamid': '76561198005614737', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 285, 'last_played': 1670857563}
review:
这是一部无比甜美的作品。
每个人都并非完美，但我们接受了对方，那么，那份缺陷却好像香料一样，更加的刺激感官。
人物的塑造并非完美，但也都非常丰满，各自有各自的故事。
小幸是个非常幸运的女孩，遇到了护前辈，从一点点开始改变，变成了正常的女孩。
坏人小姐和小幸其实几乎是一样的人，小幸残缺的是外表，而她残缺的是心灵，可惜的是她没有遇到一个护前辈这样的人。
虽然中间有一些小小的怪怪的性癖（笑）但真的太甜了，我跟着剧情一起笑，一起哭，最后的小幸甚至是如此的狡猾♡

买吧，来体验一场，小小的，不起眼，却让你微笑着的爱情故事吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198131701374', 'num_games_owned': 191, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 155, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1604223433}
review:
[h1]Too short, some parts definitely needed fleshing out, but it's overall a very feel-good VN about a cyclops girl.[/h1]

Don't ask me how I know of the developer before I found this on my recommended, but I've been a fan of their "creepy cute" artstyle, so I decided to dip and try it out. The VN is basically about you, Mamoru, and the main girl, Sachi, having a fateful meeting that eventually changes Sachi's life for the better. Over the 2 hours of reading that the VN gave me, it really made me love Sachi and definitely rooted for her happiness. Short it may have been, it was one hell of a ride.

On the topic of its pitfalls for being too short and having some inconclusive writing, I was quite surprised when Creepy Cute did acknowledge the fact and gave clarifications: they created the concept for Sachi in around 2012, and they wanted to use her in an original VN for COMITIA 2014. But Creepy Cute kept on the concept segment for too long and now had 2 months to actually create the game. As a result, the VN lacked a lot of his planned additions and had felt regretful for it. They also said that they wanted to create an actual game after learning from his mistakes on this one [spoiler](cough, [b]Teaching Feeling[/b], cough)[/spoiler]. And as an aspiring dev currently in ComSci 2, I respect that level of transparency.

Overall, despite the downsides the game suffered because of a rushed development, it was still a solid experience, and Creepy Cute really did make me love Sachi and made me want to protect her.

[spoiler]Here's to hoping they remake the VN with the scrapped features he wanted to add.[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198939930276', 'num_games_owned': 67, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 188, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1601383477}
review:
Well, I do acknowledge the fact that this game was created several years ago, and considering how much the Ray-Kbys' coding and art has improved, as well for Kyou1110's music (best example of this is the game "Life With a Slave - Teaching Feeling", which is still getting updates), what I'm going to say doesn't really have any weight. But I should say what I think anyway.

The story is more or less simple, and in some parts it felt very forced and rushed, like Mamoru and Sachi's relationship, but there were some scenes that resulted very, very heartwarming and sweet. 

The music could've had more work put into it, it's kind of annoying to the ear and not that pleasant to listen to. Instead, I opened up my music folder on my desktop and started listening to the Teaching Feeling soundtrack, changing the song depending on the scene, which fixed the problem (but that's not really the feeling a game should give you).

The art was pretty good but, again, I know this game is old, so I won't dig too much on this. I liked the different scenes, but I feel like they could've added more poses for all the characters, aside from their individual scenes (only with Sachi and Mamoru, in this case, which are the only characters that have these separate scenes). Heck, even Sachi's aunt stands in the same position all the same, it looks kind of boring, if you ask me.

I do recommend this game for people interested in visual novels. It's a short game, yes, but it's enjoyable and heartwarming.

author: {'steamid': '76561198429780689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1609026833}

review:
Sachi酱是不幸的。
天生的独眼缺陷，母亲的去世，姨母的隔阂，学校里的恶意，这些充斥着她的生活，一度让她认为自己会给靠近自己的人带来不幸。
但是，她的名字是Sachi啊——她理应是那个最幸福、最幸运的女孩子。
所以那天在楼梯上遇到了你的我，真是世界上最幸运的人。

我喜欢你，臼井幸同学。从今以后，还请多多指教！

review:
终于解锁了全成就，虽然在其他地方玩过这游戏几遍，但steam版有更新画质更好，多了很多新的东西。
女主独眼娘臼井幸真的太可爱了，记得以前看到一位网友评论“她没有给我大女乃子但是给了我一颗大眼珠”不过我看新版小幸的立绘还是有料的嘛。。也没那么小，绷带伤口什么的同样太戳我XP了，虽然很快就没了有点舍不得但那对幸来说才是好事啊。
男主叫护，女主叫幸，希望男主可以守护住她的幸福。

author: {'steamid': '76561198216375948', 'num_games_owned': 178, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 1077, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1077, 'last_played': 1558881467}
review:
有谁能拒绝得了那位女孩的世界呢——我是说Sylvia的世界，在相同的画风中，见识这个略显诡异的世界。所以我最早都叫这款游戏为《Teaching Feeling世界前传》呢。
不过在了解到作者更多的作品以后，感到我很难认同他的xp系统啊。

author: {'steamid': '76561198799356442', 'num_games_owned': 483, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1601654147}
review: A mi parecer no es un juego, ya que no tenés ningún tipo de interacción, pero la historia es lo suficientemente entretenida como para comprarlo, además no cuesta realmente mucho (con 120 pesos  apenas me compro una gaseosa y un paquete de hamburguesas baratas). Leí por ahí que Ray k piensa hacer un remaster, pero no recuerdo que el tipo tuviera nada terminado además de este juego, tiene un montón de proyectos en el aire como Teaching feeling y seguramente seguirán ahí. En fin, el juego vale la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198901343254', 'num_games_owned': 442, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1626233995}
review:
教学楼梯偶遇卡姿兰大眼睛，可爱。
借她漫画，
喂她吃饭，
一起去看电影，
介绍給她朋友，
赶走坏人，
作为回报，她让我触摸她的伤口[spoiler] 奇怪的play [/spoiler]
终于成为了恋人。

author: {'steamid': '76561198220765472', 'num_games_owned': 428, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1595051788}
review:
I need more cute and wholesome games like this. For a game made in 2 months, it's very good. I'm glad there are emotes and trading cards. Of course I wish there was more, like a scene of actually kissing Sachi instead of having to imagine it. But it is what it is, and I'm still grateful for its existence nonetheless. It's not every day that you get to have a cyclops gf. I very much enjoy the extra stuff included, especially being able to see the important scenes, animated and static.

Rant (or something): To get the Japanese playthrough achievement, I had spam my space bar and enter key as fast as I could. Fastest fingers in the West. Boy did I work up a sweat. Worth it though. Gotta have that 100% completion.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012890106', 'num_games_owned': 458, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1644041543}
review:
As far as VNs go, Love at First Sight is really quite empty. It has one route, linear dialogue even without that route, a lot of scenes are missing bonus CG (e.g., items referenced in interactions), and at least one character core to the story is very poorly fleshed out. The author admits that the final product is really quite rushed, and it shows.

On the other hand, I'm a big fan of the art style, and yes pls cyclops girls. The game has some genuine humour, even if it has to play into cliches occasionally. The bonus content adds a nice epilogue to the story.

Unless you're into cyclops girls and have noticed the lack of games in the niche, I can't recommend this at full price, unfortunately. For $15 AUD there are simply better VNs you can pick up with a longer or more engaging story. However, it's a nice couple of hours to spend if you can pick it up for cheap like I did.

author: {'steamid': '76561198801336013', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 533, 'last_played': 1591259421}
review:
[h1]游戏名“Love at first sight”[/h1]
第一眼看到这名字和熟悉的画风时，
感觉是在讲一个喜欢单眼[strike]有特殊XP[/strike]的人,对单眼娘一见钟情[strike]然后社保[/strike]的故事。
但其实远远不是这样的~

[b]貌似我们只需对不被主流价值观所待见的一个人/生物
“魔物娘”,“精灵”[strike]甚至是“沙耶”这个好像印象不是很深，有待商榷,就先不写了[/strike]
付出一点点"温柔",就能轻易地收获到好感,甚至是爱情。[/b]
[spoiler]如果你真有这种想法的话,建议你可以去玩像是Runaway Demon Bride那样穿越到异世界就可以䒑妹子的黄油[/spoiler]
[h1] 但事实并非如此 [/h1]
[b]我们都是有血有肉有灵魂,[u]活生生的人[/u][/b]
我们有自己的情感，自己的境遇，过着不同的生活
但在付出了足够的时间与精力后我们依然可以互相理解
[h1]人有一种珍贵的品质，彼此间可以[b]“共情”[/b][/h1]
那是一种发自真心地去尊重,去关心,去爱一个人之后,才能拥有的体验

[i]勇战中鲁卡的理想,约战中士道的温柔,[spoiler][strike]沙战[/strike]呸呸呸[/spoiler]都并非与生俱来[/i]
love at first sight故事中的男主人公的“一见钟情”也是如此。

[h1]即使这类视觉小说看得再多，我仍能找到一种永远不会腻的温柔”
那是在茫茫人海中,足以让我灵魂得以稍作歇息的
　　 　　　　　　　　　 　✧温馨港湾✧[/h1]

值得一提的是这游戏中“男二”Ochiai Tomoyori-落合知頼的人设真的很讨人喜欢
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2111076772 
[i]长得很高，看似不爱交际，会避免与一般人交往总是愁眉苦脸，一副伤痕累累的样子，但他很帅，而且是一个非常好的人，[strike]上能帮好兄弟出门买套套,下能怒斥黄毛小婊砸给爷爬[/strike] [/i] 真的是很有魅力的一个人~

最后，有些遗憾的是本作语言只有英文/日文,没有中文，会导致一部分读者难以静心地享受这份故事。

author: {'steamid': '76561198996492100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 109, 'playtime_forever': 1013, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 908, 'last_played': 1710644834}
review:
[h1] This was my first visual novel.[/h1]

While I have a pair of nostalgia goggles with lenses the size of the Hubble, I still think it's above average. You're main character is, just like most other visual novels and dating sims, a pretty good guy. He hears a girl crying one day after school and finds Sachi, a first year student with only one eye and scars all over her body. From there he tries to become friends with Sachi and find out who's hurting her. By the end of the game, he resolves her bullying issue, helps patch up her poor relationship with her aunt, then finally reaches second base. 

The villain, a girl named Rui, is literally just Bob from the Outsiders if you've read that book. She just bullies people like Sachi because they won't really fight back, and there are no consequences for her actions because of her wealthy family. She does a serviceable job at getting MC some good boy points. I would've mentioned her aunt since it's an actually interesting antagonist dynamic but she's in the game for like two-three scenes max.

In my opinion they did a pretty great job for how much time they had to work on the game. If you read through the developer notes in the extras menu, you'd find out that the game was made for a convention that was 2 months away when they started seriously working on it. I originally watched a walkthrough of this game, couldn't tell you where or from who. When I saw it was on sale I had to give it a try. Overall, it was just as good as I remembered it. It's not very long at all, I think it took me about 2 hours. I technically did three playthroughs and a bit of digging around in the extras menu after that. I went through the game twice back to back. Once just for fun, the other looking to see if there were any secrets hidden in the background, (I couldn't find anything going through the story) and one more in Japanese skipping through for an achievement.

[b] MAKE SURE TO CHECK THE AFTER STORY BITS IN THE EXTRAS MENU! [/b] 
If you like the art, cyclops girls, and touching scars; then go ahead. Otherwise, wait for a sale or skip it. It's such a shame the creator will never translate his other releases. He's kind of a dick but you can find fan-translations of his other work online if you want.

review:
Let me start by saying that i love a slick and polished VN but sometimes you find that one gem that is a bit ruff around the edges.
This is one of those it's short and has only one route but i can feel the passion and love the developer has for the characters and the story.
All in all is "Love at First Sight" a VN that i consider to be one of my price possessions.

review:
'You cannot judge a book from its appearance (不要以貌取人).'
Ray-Kbys老师所创造的人物正如她的喜好一样“喜欢笑容和眼泪，异形与残缺。” 无论是早年大火的希尔薇也好，还是这部的女主角纱织也好，她们在身体上都有异于常人的“残缺”，比如希尔薇的伤疤，比如纱织的独眼；在与主角相遇前也经历过了痛苦，比如希尔薇被前主人所虐待，纱织遭受校园暴力与家庭和学校的冷暴力，最终麻木并学会了不去思考，抛弃自己拥有的正常感情。 

但是希尔薇和小幸在最后都遇见了一个温柔的人，也就是我们的男主，通过男主与其深入的交流和交往，我们发现她们外表残缺的背后，是一颗温柔的内心：哪怕被世界残酷以待也不去选择憎恨，也没有失去被爱和爱人的能力，愿意为爱的人牺牲和付出。 

是一类美丽的灵魂：安静不怨恨，平和而又细腻。  在她们回归正常生活以后，所表现出的幸福、可爱、开心、善良、感恩让人感到温暖的同时也不禁感叹，与拥有正常外表但暴虐焦躁内心的我们比起来，到底谁才是“残缺”的？“美”究竟应该用什么方式来定义？
所以到了故事的末尾，我们会很容易发现，原来拥有完整肉体的我们，灵魂才是残缺的，而她们肉体上的残缺，并不影响她们灵魂的丰满，她们”残缺”肉体下的灵魂，就如同两块拼图中有凸起的那一块，当我们残缺的灵魂与其相遇时，我们反而变得更加完满了，我们还在以为是我们拯救了她们的”残缺“时，其实才是被她们所拯救了。

Too bad it was rushed, could've been a lot longer. Too bad, I hope a remake/sequel will come out some day.

author: {'steamid': '76561198987547468', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 487, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 460, 'last_played': 1593234096}
review:
忘了是几年前在网上云了这款游戏，偶然想起来steam一搜竟搜到了。想起以前摸的头就买了下来。
两三个小时的剧情。从作者的自白看来，这游戏缺了很多该完善的细节（虽然这并不影响女主的可爱
由于时间的问题，音乐很短，搭配起来并不让人感到非常切合；故事交替太仓促，缺少更为细节的过渡。
但却能把每一个角色的形象展现完整（男主除外   出场不多的角色每一个都有自己的特点，名字也是独特设计的；
故事整体让人感到涌动的温暖，整个剧情体现了作品名“Love at First Sight”所带来的相遇，相知，相守的美好。
所以很希望作者能把他没做完的地方做粗来啊，一个Extra完全不够啊

合徽章不要合第二级！如果你喜欢一级的眼睛，不要合第二级！后面全是物件！不要合！不要合！
合完第二级我的眼泪止不住流

author: {'steamid': '76561197970898913', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 465, 'last_played': 1582500882}
review:
So, what does a romance story with a cyclops heroine look like? Like any other romance story, it seems... 

This lovely, little VN does quite an interesting thing, introducing a somewhat outlandish premise and then building a love story which makes you pretty much forget about its weirdest parts. Sachi's unique feature influences her life in various negative ways but the cool part is that ultimately it's not what defines her. You could switch her with a "normal" low-esteem, bullied girl with a traumatic childhood and would only have to change minor details of the story. Or use a much more realistic disability, like inserting Katawa Shoujo's Hanako in the same place, with a similar effect.

This is both the game's strength and its biggest issue: while the contrast between the outlandish premise and the very down-to-Earth romance gives a very cute and uplifting vibe, it also makes the game extremely by-the-numbers when it goes to the actual plot. Without the interesting artstyle and unusual heroine it'd have been utterly generic (although still well-written and decently-paced). It's also fully linear and short, with around 3 hours of content, even counting all the bonus stuff. Thus, although I really enjoyed and highly recommend checking it out to anyone that enjoys wholesome romance stories, it's probably best to grab it on sale – that way, you'll definitely get you money's worth.

review: Cute and wonderful short kinetic novel about an adorable cyclops girl. You can't help but want to protect and make her happy. Worth a play, certainly moved me. If it wasn't about a cyclops I wouldn't have played it. Don't know if it's worth ten bucks though I got this as a gift from my bestie who knows I love monster people and especially cyclops peeps. The negative points about this game is it's one path and as mentioned before is a kinetic novel which I had no idea of going in so was greatly disappointed. So there's just one path to this game and don't expect anymore.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099623766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1516583629}
review:
Only reason to buy this Visual Novel is in the vague hopes some of the money goes to the developer instead of it all going to the publisher. 

Because! This isn't a game. There's no choices to make. It's just a heartwarming and somewhat short story that deserves to be experienced if you're into what the synopsis says the game is about, and also because of the heart and soul the developer put into everything he could cram into it before he had to release it however many year ago. 

So yeah! If you'd like to experience this game, and actually believe the developer might get to see some of the money from you buying it, do so. 

Else there are...alternatives.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972458635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1579490950}
review:
Words fail me.  I have been an avid fan of VN's for years, and I only just discovered this gem of a kinetic Visual Novel in my discovery queue?  There is no justice, and the gods must hate me.  I even thought that I had thoroughly pored over Sekai Project's listings of their offerings since I have always been a big fan, and still missed this. *sigh*  

Unlike my other reviews, I do not have the words to do this game justice, and I am usually a little verbose.  It is short, sweet, and touching.   [b]Love at First Sight: Hitomebore[/b]  is like a raw gem cut exquisitely, and though I could critique a very few things; they say that the sparkle depends on the flaws in the diamond.  My only big problem with this VN is that it took so long for me to find it.  

Definitely worth the price, and the very small amount of time that I raced through it.  On the positive side; I now have another author to follow around like a puppy.  Meh. It's a living. Take my money!

author: {'steamid': '76561198372176934', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1578995868}
review:
I personally really enjoy works and designs of Ray K. He never fails to inspire me. Usui Sachi, the main cyclops lady of this game might be one of his most simple monster girl designs but she still might be my personal favorite among all of his OC's. She is such a sweetheart, and the entire game was so wholesome.
 The story is pretty short, simple, soft and lovely. You don't need to put any extra efforts to understand the events but it is not boring either and it doesn't take much time because there are no other possible routes so it is a great game to play on your free time. I liked the narrator and the dialogues as well. Even the afterwords of the game was so adorable
Play it, tell your friends about it if possible. It really is heartwarming and i'm pretty sure you won't regret playing it.

And if you enjoyed the narrator or art style just like i did, i recommend checking Butterfly Affection (which is another game by the same artist) out as well. It is way shorter than Love at First Sight, and the visuals are a bit more creepy, but it still was a great experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041165175', 'num_games_owned': 1769, 'num_reviews': 101, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1578181622}
review: Love at First Sight is an amateur project at best, created mainly by a solo developer. In the kinetic visual novel, you experience a generic and rather forced highschool romance. The writing is pretty lousy and the story progresses unnaturally fast. However, thanks to the quick pace of a plot and the gimmicky heroine the experience is easy to digest and entertaining despite its flaws. Depressed damsel tropes are pushed rather hard but in a heartwarming and purely fun fashion. The romance is embedded with oddly endearing moments that focus on strange fascinations the developer has and the entire game seems to be built to fit his own personal taste. However, it's these strange qualities that cause the game to be something a little more interesting than a rather rushed single route love story.

review: 個人的にはめっちゃくちゃ良かったです。というかピクシブでゲーム化前からイラスト見てて、この間ふと見たらスチームさんで配信しているということなのでアカウント作って買いました！ 絵の好みが分かれる、ヒロインの特徴、一本道という事を考えると万人に勧められるというよりかは、好きな人にとってはめっちゃくちゃいいという感じなので、この人のピクシブとか見てみたら参考。

author: {'steamid': '76561198054717077', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1632599888}
review:
“Love at First Sight” is the first Visual Novel game I have ever played… and I loved it. Reading through some of the other reviews, I understand that this game is quite simple (actually just linear) when it comes to it’s story, with no multiple endings or any moral choices. But, maybe that's one of the reasons why I enjoyed it. Other reasons that I enjoyed it are… the beautiful art style (I love the artwork)... the simple-innocent story (made me remember how it is to feel young, naive and hopeful)… the simple yet well written background music… and the characters… especially “Sachi Usui” the One-Eyed-Girl. Also the extra background information (after the end of the game) about the game, provided by it's creator, also made me appreciate the game even more.
If there ever is a sequel to this game with these characters, I'm definitely picking it up. A simple, sweet, and slightly strange, innocent love story. I loved it!

author: {'steamid': '76561198283783168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1577297943}
review:
The author's notes that unlock after the story ends reveal the main flaws of this game.  It was made in about two months, by mostly one guy.  It's cute, but it's lacking CGs and much story beyond a very simple boy-meets-shy-girl romance.  The music is discordant and downright distracting as you try to read.  It's clear that this was a rushed project by an otherwise talented artist.

The roughness of it isn't really the end of the world, though, because the art is dripping with creepy-cute charm.  What really hampers this novel is that it doesn't use its weird protagonist to full enough effect.  This is essentially a very bare-bones romance with a girl with a physical deformity.  She isn't a "monster girl," really, in this story, she's just got a weird face.  There's no supernatural elements at play in the story, no lore on how she got the way she is or whether others like her are running around, nope, just a bog standard romance.  

This would be fine, if they had a really compelling story--actually, tackling romance with someone with a physical deformity by using something like this would be interesting...but the story doesn't really do anything with it.  Sachi is kind of ashamed of her looks, but she's only bullied by one person and everyone else that she meets seems to accept her without a second thought.  There's a bit of a sub plot of her learning to stand up for herself against the bully, but it's pretty undercooked as a plot point and it doesn't really relate to her unique physiology at all...it's the kinda sub plot literally any shy girl romance might have.

The only weirdness the story gets up to is the hero and heroine's...unique way of expressing affection for each other.  Somehow, Sachi got it in her head that the MC likes touching her scars...and he goes right along with it.  She gets a faintly orgasmic glee from it...  And that's it.  He occasionally touches her hand or rubs her forehead and they get all blushy and that's it, on to the next scene.  Like...why?  They make very vague comments that what they're doing is kind of weird, but they don't explore it at all one way or another.

The female friend of the main character has a past with the bully, but we only ever get told the backstory--we never see them interact on-screen.  

I was actually kind of hoping there'd be an anti-twist, like the bully never actually hit Sachi.  Everyone would get all up in arms and confront the bully, only for Sachi to reveal that all the bruises and cuts were from her running into things since she has bad depth perception.  This would have been preferable, imo, because what they went with didn't really have the framework in place to make it particularly emotionally impactful.

Ultimately if you're intrigued by the cyclops girl on the cover, I wouldn't go into this expecting much in the way of interesting monster girl shenanigans.  But if you like looking at nice art and don't mind a story that is basically just fluff, then you can find worse ways of spending 4 bucks when the game is on sale.

review:
作者さんの過去作を巡っていたらこのゲームに辿り着きました。
面白い…心が満たされた。ノベルゲームって、いいなあ……という気持ちになった。
特別単眼フェチという訳でもなかったんだけど、さっちゃん好きだ……ていうか、もう、みんな幸せになってくれ……って思った。
不幸な女の子に手を差し伸べたいという願望が人にはあるんですよ。そういうものを満たしてくれるゲームだった。自分が憧れていた青春というものがあった。輝いている世界だった。

author: {'steamid': '76561197992913640', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 417, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 417, 'last_played': 1484481815}
review:
This is not a game, the design is supposed to lead you through several different endings and affect the story as a whole.

But in the end there is only 1 path and 1 end despite there being other heroines introduced, this is just a small (and sweet) little story that can't even be considered a game in my opinion. It's a really short one too and no matter what i tried I couldn't change anything special to affect the laid-out story, the developers even said that they originally had planned to make it into a proper game but that they decided to give up early on and release it as is.

Its a sweet little story but just now worth a price tag, if you're buying this one you better make sure it's on sale for at least 70% or more if possible. :/

review:
bgm的钢琴声和吉他的伴奏厚重沉默之中带着点轻扬，很符合这个略显沉重的故事，又不掩盖恋人之间的雀跃甜蜜。
作者完成这部作品的时间不足实在让人觉得惋惜，很想看到不同支线的故事。
虽说作者不想再改动这个已经诞生的作品，认为遗憾也是种美丽，我也只能无奈惋惜。
什么是一见钟情？
应该就是这样了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198854251477', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1562161582}
review:
看着希尔薇的画风入坑的，大概想的也就是支持一下作者。

但和希尔薇的伤疤不一样，独眼娘真的有些......诡异（请原谅我的措辞），再搭配上些许传来的奇怪的bgm，让我有时会有些.....推不下去。
也幸好我的代入感没有那么强。

总之，这是一个简单而温馨的故事，虽然可能结束的有些仓促，但如果你能够接受独眼娘的人设，就是好评。

author: {'steamid': '76561198106850662', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1512899521}
review:
Un juego echo por el gran artista de waifus bizarras Ray-K.  Su pagina con sus dibujos: https://twitter.com/Ray_Kbys

Es cortito y divertido, los dibujos son alucinantes a su propia manera, la historia es linda y rara (Fetiches de cicatrices Nani the fuck).

Esta novela visual no tiene decisiones asi que es de leer y leer, tampoco tiene partes +18 no esperes nada cochino y por ultimo el final es muy brusco, esto sucede porque el creador Ray-K no pudo terminar el juego como quiso porque no llegaba a exponerlo a un evento que el tenia que asistir en su momento, el ya a dicho que en algun futuro abra un remaster de este juego, mas largo, con decisiones y con muchas cosas adicionales.
Compralo si te gustan las novelas visuales y para apoyar a Ray para que pueda hacer el remaster.

author: {'steamid': '76561198244387248', 'num_games_owned': 549, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 338, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 338, 'last_played': 1550552201}
review: The creator wrote in the afterword that they consider the game “pretty flimsy,” but I can’t help but disagree.  I feel the story has a good pace and overall I couldn’t be happier after finishing the game.  I really love and adore this game, even if there is only one route and there aren’t a bunch of choices to be made like in a lot of VNs.  It’s a visual novel in the most literal sense, but that’s okay.  For this particular story, I think it’s almost better that there aren’t choices to make that may lead to different endings.  The story of wooing Sachi is more than enough.  In fact, I found the story to be quite cute and moving.  Usui Sachi is adorable and I love her!  I loved seeing her grow as a character.  I also am absolutely in love with the art style and the music!

author: {'steamid': '76561198402497108', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 811, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1560583437}
review:
剧情还是那个剧情，套路还是那个套路，很简单粗暴的烂俗校园恋爱剧情
但是我！就是没有办法拒绝这样的烂俗！整个过程可以说是十分开心了，也推荐喜欢看类似故事的伙伴购买。
就算感觉有点短，明明还有不少的扩展空间，最后以kiss结束略显突兀，总体还ok
国人小伙伴不用太担心英语，可能有部分不懂单词，不会影响理解剧情和阅读，相信我。（就算有不会的也可以美其名曰单词补习）
这个游戏让我傻笑了5个小时，请尽情代入并一起傻笑

author: {'steamid': '76561198065864453', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 443, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1562200432}
review:
a decir verdad me encanto el como esta echo, el arte, la historia, el diseño y la musica. a decir vedad, es una novela grafica muy bonita. me hiso querer abrasar a mi novia jeje, pero en si aunque le falten rutas para seguir como en otras novelas, esto hace que sea mas bonita la historia pues al tener diversas rutas donde tengas diferentes destinos, quitando el sentimiento que te transmite, al ser lineal en la historia esto refuersa la emocion amorosa en la historia y te da esa sensacion de querer proteger a la persona que mas te importa.  lo recomendaria mucho a quien quiera leer una historia romantica y alegrarte el dia. 
esta es mi opinion personal del juego (^w^)/

review:
Great artwork, fun characters, and a sweet story.
(just so you know: It's kinetic, not visual- no choices, just reading)

The protagonist isn't just a blank slate, and the author does a great job conveying his feelings throughout. 

If you like romance, it's worth giving it a look.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047145131', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1553190258}
review:
可愛いは正義。

凄くまともにレビューすると、ゲームとしては、10点中2～3点くらいしかあげられない程度のクオリティです。
ゲームシステムがしょぼい・シナリオが妄想レベルな上にボリュームがない、などなど・・・
まぁ、元々同人であるならこんなモンといえばそれまでなんですが。

個人的には、商業にはない魅力がある素敵な作品で、作者のフェチが伝わってきて
うふふってなる素晴らしい時間でした。

ボリュームやアラに目をつぶり、純粋にキャラクターを楽しむ物としては

満　点　で　す

チョコの味が美味しければ、見た目やパッケージなんかどうでもいいんです。
