author: {'steamid': '76561198025309409', 'num_games_owned': 14496, 'num_reviews': 162, 'playtime_forever': 207, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1543751472}
review:
"Love at First Sight" is a kinetic novel - i.e. a visual novel with just one story path. There are no choices to make, and the only interaction is clicking to advance to the next line of text (and even that can be automated, if desired). It tells a slowly unfolding "first love" story between a somewhat nerdy Japanese student (who, for the most time, acts as a canvas for the player) and a shy girl with an unusual face who is used to others rejecting or bullying her.

I often try to play/read visual novels, but most of them just aren't my cup of tea. The lack of meaningful interaction tends to bore me, the settings and stories are often focused on things I can't relate to, and the writing I often find bland (and sometimes very badly translated). "Love At First Sight" is a rare exception in that I really liked it, I enjoyed playing it in one sitting and didn't even want to take a break.

This happened because the writing of "Love At First Sight" is really good. Not only was it done by someone with excellent command of the English language (which, especially for visual novels, is not a given), it also sports excellent characterization, witty dialog, believable emotions, and some truly poetic descriptions. There is an overarching atmosphere of kindness, caring, and warmth that never leaves the story, even though darker moments also exist. I felt deeply connected to the two main characters and really wanted the protagonist to succeed in breaking Sachi out of her shell.

The game is not perfect though. In the afterword, the author shows some regret that he couldn't spend more time on the game, and yes, some parts may feel a bit rushed. The story is also pretty firmly rooted in the "selfless boy 'saves' girl and thereby earns her love" trope, which tends to make me uncomfortable if the girl just slips from one dependency into another, or if there is no believable explanation how a genuine love (and not "just" thankfulness) would emerge from such a situation. However, "Love At First Sight" steered clear of those pitfalls. The main character clearly does want the girl to be able to stand on her own feet, and the blossoming of love between the two was written in such a tender way that I just couldn't bring myself to spoil it with such considerations even if I wanted to - which I don't.

I certainly enjoyed the 3 hours that I spent with this well-written teen romance story, even though that's usually really not my thing, and thus I find it very easy to recommend this visual novel to other readers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067459539', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 212, 'last_played': 1543757757}
review:
외눈박이 소녀와의 사랑 이야기를 다룬 단편 비주얼 노벨입니다. 선택지는 전혀 없으며, 플레이 타임 역시 길지는 않습니다. 그림체를 보면 알 수 있지만, '실비 키우기'로 알려진 [i]Teaching Feeling[/i]의 일러스트레이터가 만든 게임이기도 합니다. (주의 : 아래 내용 중 가려진 부분은 도전과제에 관한 큰 의미 없는 스포일러입니다.)

[h1]평가[/h1]
[b]장점[/b](이 될 수도 있는 것)
[list]
 [*]우리 업계에서는 포상입니다
 [*]특정 씬에서의 묘사
 [*]트레이딩 카드
[/list]

[b]단점[/b](이 될 수도 있는 것)
[list]
 [*]볼륨 부족
 [*]선택지 전무
 [*]미약한 전개
[/list]

------------이 아래의 내용은 게임을 플레이할지 결정하는 데 도움이 될 수도 있습니다.------------

[h1]볼륨 부족[/h1]
 볼륨이 지나치게 부족합니다. 선택지가 단 하나도 존재하지 않기 때문에 엔딩도 히로인도 [strike]히로인의 눈도[/strike] 모두 다 하나 뿐이고, 내용 전개에 있어서 참신함도, 개연성도 부족합니다. 등장인물들이 전형적이긴 하지만 굉장히 매력적인데, 내용이 너무 빈약해서 큰 의미가 없습니다. 한 시간 안에 엔딩을 볼 수 있을 정도로 짧고, 도전과제 클리어가 목적이 아닌 이상 두 번 이상 플레이할 이유도 거의 없습니다. 오마케에서 말하길 마감까지 시간이 별로 안 남아서 그랬다는데, 그런 주제에 가격은 만 원이 넘기 때문에 제값 주고 사기에는 많이 부족합니다. 그러니까 세일할 때 사세요.

[h1]업계포상[/h1]
 하지만 아인(몬무스), 그 중에서도 외눈박이 소녀가 등장하는 게임을 하고 싶으시다면, 어쨌든 당신에게 선택지는 없습니다. 그 '업계'에 속한 이상 애초에 선택의 폭이 넓지 않기 때문입니다. 또 스크린샷에서 눈치챌 수 있겠지만, 이 게임은 히로인이 외눈박이 소녀라는 점을 제외하고도, 흉터와 상처 페티시라는 또다른 이상성욕 요소를 가지고 있습니다. 주인공이 히로인 소녀의 상처를 (말 그대로) 어루만지는 장면이 있는데, 야한 장면이 아닌데도 야겜에 필적하는 끈적함을 자랑합니다. 또한 이런 특이취향 여러분을 만족시킬 수 있게 트레이딩 카드까지 존재합니다. 트레이딩 카드가 존재한다는 건 이모티콘과 프로필 배경이 존재한다는 거고요. 그러니까 세일할 때 사세요.

---------------이 아래의 내용은 시간이 남아돌지 않는다면 읽을 필요가 없습니다.----------------

[h1]쓸 데 없는 사실들[/h1]
 도전과제 중 숨겨진 도전과제([spoiler]Namako Found![/spoiler])는 [spoiler]오마케에 들어가서 History를 클릭하고 화면 하단의 'FA'를 누르면 해금됩니다.[/spoiler]
 각 챕터의 이름이 모두 눈에 관련된 영문 표현인데, 그 목록은 아래와 같습니다.
[list]
 [*]Catch My Eyes : 눈길을 끌다
 [*]Have An Eye For : 안목이 있다
 [*]Have One's Eye On : 눈여겨 보다
 [*]See Eye To Eye : 관점을 같이하다
 [*]Cry One's Eye Out : 눈이 빠지도록 울다
 [*]Up To One's Eye : 할 일이 눈까지 차오르다
[/list]
 작중 주인공 [i]마모루[/i]와 히로인 [i]사치[/i]가 보러 가는 영화는 아마도 [i]에리히 캐스트너[/i] 원작의 [i]하늘을 나는 교실[/i]이 아닐까 추정됩니다. 등장하는 만화책은 모르겠습니다. 아시는 분 제보 바랍니다.

review: It's a great game that doesn't take too long to complete! The story warms your heart, and the characters are endearing. The only problem I had was that the music loops way too quickly. There's only a six to ten second loop for each scene, and that get's rather tiresome after playing for forty-five minutes. I had to mute it for a little while, but the silence is a little weird.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027863771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1463040022}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198402565740', 'num_games_owned': 351, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1538510559}
review:
一款很温馨治愈的游戏，一开始看封面以为是猎奇向的故事，没想到这么暖，虽然和我预期不符，但是玩下去感觉还是不错的。说几个戳到我的点吧：

1.主角邀请妹纸和他一起回家的时候，妹纸喃喃的说了一句门口见。妹纸因为只有一只眼睛，而且遭遇过欺凌，内心是很自卑的。平时在学校也尽量降低自己的存在感，可是却答应了主角在学校门口等他的要求，而且愿意和他一道回家。可能从这个时候开始主角在她心里已经是特殊的存在了吧。

2.妹纸被校园暴力了，午餐木有了，两人分食主角的午餐，共用一双筷子吃饭w甜哭啦！

3.偷瞄彼此

4.约会前主角的忐忑，约会时的牵手，还有细数女主掌心的伤疤那一段真的太有爱了w

到了女主视角的时候泪崩了，因为真的好幸福呀……为她感到开心

最后，我喜欢画风和文本【虽然故事真的有点老套，但是文笔和小细节可以，但是音乐实在是……不只是不好听，甚至有点精神污染了……

PS：英文文本很简单，高中水平也可以顺畅的读完，所以放心大胆的入吧~

author: {'steamid': '76561198862438396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 146, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 105, 'last_played': 1540910710}

author: {'steamid': '76561198297031240', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1535775589}
review:
甘いｨｨｨｨｨｨ!!!


この作者さんの作品はTeachingFeelingからで、絵・雰囲気がものすごく好きです。
Love at First sight（ひと目惚れ） も買おう買おうと思っていて買ったのが去年のサマーセール。
そしてプレイしたのが今年の夏終わり、なんでなんでしょうね……。


さておき、この作品はサイクロプス（ひとつ目）の女の子と主人公がイチャイチャと甘ったるいものを見せつけてくるゲームです。
ひたすら羨ましい、羨ましいんだぁぁ。

その女の子、さっちゃんの可愛さにはプレイヤーの語彙力も冷静さも滅びます。
終わったころには汗だくでした、うわお。


そんな感じにテンションMAXで読みつつ世界にのめり込むこと本編2時間ほど、おまけ&実績回収30分で大体2時間半～3時間クリアじゃないかと思います。

ホイールで読み進められないシステムは僕的には少しだけ不満でしたがなんら問題ないです、さっちゃんは可愛い。


続編もある、らしいので楽しみに待っていましょう……。

author: {'steamid': '76561198056609473', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1534759424}
review: Love at first Sight what can I say hmm I guss I should start with this I've read a lot of visual novels now and in all that time spent on them I have seen a lot of good and bad ones this is a verry good one now for the reason it's good Heart this is one of those VN's where you can see and feel the heart efort and love that was put into this game the auther did make it in a hurry but I think it would be better for him to tell you about that him self in the extra's but rushed or not it's good the characters a loveable and relatable the art is unique but good for the time he did this in and the story will have you on the edge of your seat the whole time if you can conect with even one of the 2 main characters witch isn't that hard in my opinion so knowing all that can I recomend this game to you HELL YES buy it read it and lose your mind over the drama and the creepy cutness of this game it is good

author: {'steamid': '76561198184030843', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1533803420}
review:
Вот вроде бы и сюжет не блещет оригинальностью, и сама новелла короткая, НО автор просто какойто волшебник. В своих произведениях он умудряется создать удивительную иллюзию, заполняющую возможные дыры в сюжете/графике/музыке/здравом смысле. И поэтому я считаю, что поддержать автора за другие проэкты,я думаю, стоит.

[h1] 1. Графика. [/h1] 
Рисовка сносная, выполненная в "своей стилистике". Блин, ребят, люди тут целые игры или сериалы с таким графонием или даже хуже, делают (например, батальные сцены в наруте, нарисованые как курица лапой), так что для новеллы сойдет.

[h1] 2. Музыка. [/h1] 
Понимаю, времени было мало и делали вдвоем, но музыка убивает. Сойдет, но мне под конец чтения было практически физически больно.

[h1] 3. Сюжет. [/h1]
 Банальный. Больше нечего добавить. Это мы видели в Катаве (Ханука привет), во втором проэкте автора, и много где еще. Но все же он не раздражает и не вызывает зевоты.

[h1] 4. Сексуальные фетиши автора. [/h1] 
Хм, тут все сложнее. Лично меня шрамы не возбуждали до прочтения данной новеллы, и не возбуждают после. Но ВО ВРЕМЯ чтения эти моменты показались очень горячими. Вот может автор передать магию момента и создать нужную атмосферу, талантливый засранец!

[h1] 5. Дополнительные материалы. [/h1] 
Тут автор распинается почему произведение кинетическое, короткое и не глубокое. Плюс показывает рабочие материалы к игре. Интересно вышло, придало какую то душевность произведению. Автор работал один целых два месяца и справился, как справился. В одном из дополнений он говорит, что мечтает вернутся в прошлое и набить себе морду, для более серьезного отношения к работе. Надеюсь, это желание сбудется =)

[h1] Итог. [/h1] 
Помоему, получилось не хорошо и не отлично. Думаю неплохо, правильное слово. Что то среднее, если по циферной шкале. Конечно, я не буду вспоминать это произведение долгими зимними вечерами и думать о перепетиях сюжета. 
Но я не жалею о потраченном времени, и рад что потратил деньги на данную игру. 

[h1] Рекомендую для фанатов автора, Ханоко, и сексуальных девиаций, направленных на циклопичность, шрамы и увечья.  [/h1]

P.S. Есть русификатор.
P.P.S. Тема циклопичности не раскрыта. Просто смиритесь.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034256207', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1533834584}
review: I don't play visual novels as much as I'd like to but this was an enjoyable little story with some charming characters.  The game certainly feels like more could have been improved upon or more story beats could have taken place.  Still, I really enjoyed the time getting to know Sachi.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198318630963', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 191, 'last_played': 1531501576}
review:
[h1]"Love at First Sight"[/h1]

ตัวเกมก็ตามชื่อเรื่องเลย เป็นเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับความรักครั้งเเรกนั้นเอง! เเต่เปลี่ยนจากตัวละครฝ่ายหญิงที่ธรรมดาๆ เป็นสาวน้อยตาเดียวขี้อายไม่กล้าสู้คนเเทน
เนื้อเรื่องก็ออกเเบบเป็นวิชวลตามท้องเรื่องทั่วๆไป เริ่มจากพระเอกของเราไปเริ่มเเอบชอบสาวตาเดียว เเละไปวุ่นวายกับการเเก้ปัญหาพร้อมสวีทกับสาวเจ้าเข้าให้ จากนั้นก็ค่อยๆพัฒนาความสัมพันธ์อันเเสนหอมหวานเพิ่มมากขึ้นเรื่อยๆ จนกลายเป็นความรักที่ชวนมดขึ้นจอเลยทีเดียว? สำหรับตัวภาษานั้นใช้ศัพท์อยู่ในระดับไม่ยากนักเเละเนื้อบทของเรื่องนี้ก็ไม่ถือว่ายาวมากนัก เหมาะสำหรับนักอ่านที่ต้องการความเเปลกใหม่!? เเละไม่ชอบอ่านอะไรที่ยาวๆ นั้นเอง ใครอยากลองเปลี่ยนเเนวจากวิชวลปกติเป็นเรื่องนี้ก็พอจะหอมปากหอมคอดีกันเลยทีเดียวว มาถึงเรื่องภาพบ้าง ตัวภาพส่วนใหญ่จะเป็นภาพนิ่งซะเยอะจะเป็นเเนวอ่านลูกเดียวเลยมากกว่า เเต่ก็ขยับท่าทางอยู่บ้าง เเต่ก็มีฉากภาพเเบบวิดีโอมาเติมส่วนที่ขาดไป ส่วนในเรื่องของเสียงถ้าบางคนเป็นสายอ่านเเล้วหลับบ่อย ก็อาจจะหลับให้กับเรื่องนี้ก็เป็นได้เพราะดนตรีมันช่างทำให้ง่วงซะจริง!? เเต่ยังไงก็เถอะ ถ้าลองอ่านเเล้วคุณจะหลงไปกับความน่ารักของสาวน้อยตาเดียวคนเดียวคนนี้เเน่นอน!!!

เนื้อเรื่อง 10/10
ภาพ 7/10
เสียง 6/10

ปล. ควรซื้อตอนลดราคาเนอะ

author: {'steamid': '76561198016453886', 'num_games_owned': 177, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1530202487}
review: The game was on special offer so I thought to give it a try. For little over 2€ it was worth the money, but I wouldn't pay over 6€ for this. The story is sweet and I loved it. Artstyle might be a turn off for some people but I liked it. The biggest short comings for this are the shortness and linearity of the story (only one path and ending) and the music which might start to annoy you if you are a slow reader. Otherwise highly recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271629668', 'num_games_owned': 468, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1530113069}
review:
海外の人曰く「なんでヒロインがサイクロプスなんだ？」
とは言ったものの自身も「サイクロプスがヒロインってバカゲーにしかならん」
と思ったけど訂正する。バカゲーではなかった。
ストーリーはよくある展開なんだけど独特の絵のタッチも相まって結構ドキドキする内容だった。
この価格でこのストーリー量はちょっと微妙なところはあるだろうが案ずるなプレイヤー！
私が自信を持ってこのゲームをおすすめしよう。
一つ注意点をあげさせてくれ。このゲームには性癖を歪める可能性がある表現が出てくることがあるので
それでもいいと言う方は購入をおすすめしよう

author: {'steamid': '76561198143942964', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1529844841}
review:
" Не смотря на внешность, всегда есть человек, который тебя полюбит." Наверно это один из выводов, который можно сделать пройдя эту игру.
 Хоть эта новелла довольна странная ( Не говоря о фетишах к ранам), но всё же она хорошая. Я думаю существует много людей похожих на главную героиню ( и нет, я не о глазе ), которых также унижают и презирают. В конце истории новелла показывает, что таким людям нужно стать сильнее и суметь постоять за себя. На протяжении всей игры с этим помогал главный герой. В жизни также - всегда найдётся, кто-то кто протянет руку помощи.
 Я не скажу, что эта лучшая новелла в которую я играл, но она явно стоит внимания.
 7 шрамов и ран из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198117389013', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1529637619}
review:
After completing the entire story, I have comedown to say that this is probably my all time favorite visual novel. Its a linear story, as stated from the developer, but its down quite well to keep the player interested without deriving away from the plot; I find the art style pleasing all through out the story; the characters are all also unique in their own ways, thus allowing players to being able to set a personality for a specific character and recognize them immediately; the music is great although it wouldn't hurt to have a few more tracks present.

All in all, I would definitely recommend this game to anyone that's interested in visual novels. Sachi is number one waifu.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972297308', 'num_games_owned': 4497, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 174, 'last_played': 1558732201}
review:
Short and sweet visual novel.

You play as Mamoru, a high school student who falls in love with Sachi Usui, a shy girl with only one eye who is covered in scars.

The story is simple and you do not have to make any choices throughout the game, but the main girl Sachi-chan is likable enough to carry the game by herself.

A problem that I often have with short visual novels is that you don't really get to know the characters well enough to care about them, however I did not have that problem with this game. Sachi makes you want to protect and care for her.

It took me 2.5 hours to beat the game + read through the extra content. I recommend checking out the extras which include a couple of additional scenes, some illustrations, as well as work notes and comments written by the creator of the game,

Recommended.
(However since the game is fairly short you might want to wait for a sale)

author: {'steamid': '76561198399854316', 'num_games_owned': 201, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1514023815}
review: 对于这种恋爱类型的游戏我玩过的并不多，可能也就只有希尔微和宫本光吧。之前买这款游戏也完全是出于猎奇，再加上对steam底线的试探（其实以为会和希尔微很像）。玩了大约半小时才发现，这是一个完全不一样的游戏。主角独眼的设定看似很奇怪，给人一种物种的隔阂感。然而其内心的细腻确实许多人都无法比拟的。在不断的交流和生活中我更多的了解到了SaChi，也真正喜欢上了这敏感的，与众不同的女孩子。剧情不长，成就也很好拿。如果你是抱着希尔微那样的想法这款游戏可能并不适合，但它是一部更为优秀的恋爱游戏，值得一试。

author: {'steamid': '76561197990132633', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1528146496}
review:
This game is an example of why Steam should have a more "neutral" option when it comes to recommendations. 

The game, overall, is fine. It's quite short, it feels a bit rushed as far as the story goes, and there's bits that seem like they could have been fleshed out and explained a bit more, but it's not a bad story, at all. It involves your pretty standard "shrinking violet" trope for the main female lead (i.e. incredibly shy -- but cute -- girl is incredibly shy until the right person comes along and helps her blossom into a capable female who can stand on her own two feet when the time comes when she's with her friends). 

Some of the music isn't all that great. It could be really repetitive, didn't really have a clear direction, and the melody didn't go anywhere in several of the tracks. There were a few tracks that felt really jarring and dissonant which didn't really fit the mood very well or the song. The only way I can really describe it is, at times, the melody lines just felt like they were sort of like a "guitar solo" randomly jumping between notes rather than having some interesting progression that "takes you somewhere." If there's anywhere that the game really suffered, I'd say it's probably the music. There were one or two tracks that did fit, pretty well, but others weren't very good and the tracks either felt like they were from your typical really simple VN or they were really jarring to listen to. "Evening Particle" and "Side Statement" being two tracks, in particular, that felt really jarring and unnatural to the mood.  

The art style is unique and looks interesting. Stylistically, though, I'm not sure that it fit the game, very well. I actually liked the art style, but I felt like it would fit best in a game with a more serious tone or in a game with a darker mood like a horror game or something. It's the type of style I would expect to see in a game with a darker theme, but it worked alright in the game, even though it sort of felt a little out of place. 

Most of the character designs are pretty nice and I felt like they fit each character and the setting fairly well. [spoiler] I did feel like Sachi's clothing on the date was a bit gaudy, though. I think the design could have been simplified a little bit such as removing lots of the bows on it. [/spoiler]

I wish the story had been fleshed out a bit more. It was far too predictable. I was expecting that the game was setting up for a twist at the end, but there wasn't one and the ending just didn't feel very interesting. [spoiler] I was thinking that Sadokawa and Sachi's aunt were being created as "diversions" of some kind to make the player think that Sachi was being bullied or abused only to reveal, towards the end, some surprising twist such as Sachi had intentionally given herself the wounds. For instance, she may have been extremely depressed because of her appearance and, due to having been bullied at school, feeling like her aunt hates her and was mean to her, etc. she ended up intentionally injuring herself because she believed that it would be better for everyone if she had never been born and if she believed that she was a burden to everyone. Then, the MC would help her discover that she's only been looking at her circumstances "one way" -- her single eye could be worked into the dialogue a bit -- and that she needed to see things from a different perspective and see just how much her friends and the MC cared about her and needed her. I think something like that would have been an interesting twist and gave it a meaningful ending. The way the story is set up, you're expecting that there is a bully at school and then, sure enough, there is one and it gets "settled" sort of at the end. [/spoiler] The ending also felt a little rushed and abrupt. I was expecting more to happen, but there wasn't really anything else. 

If you're looking for a short (~2 hours) and simple romance involving a incredibly shy but cute female cyclops, then it can't hurt to try it out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045222794', 'num_games_owned': 570, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 294, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 294, 'last_played': 1494959697}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049069540', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1528062652}

author: {'steamid': '76561198080758365', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1525468674}
review:
I have mixed feeling about this game, but I can't say I regret my purchase. Not one bit.
I say game, but it's more like a novel with visual accompaniment, rather than what we define as a "visual novel" I say this because there is not a single choice in the game past the main menu. Moving on to how I feel about the game itself, it's really fun. I had a great time just playing this through, chatting with my friends along the way. The writing isn't superb, and if you don't like the artstyle, there isn't much to incetivize you other than the interesting female lead. The game is fairly predictable, which is a good change of pace, ironically. If this game is ever on sale somehow, or you can get it for cheaper than $10, and anything caught your eye (haha eye), then there isn't a reason not to get it. Personally, this character is memorable enough to make my list of "top 10 girls that aren't real and will never be which makes me sad 'cause nobody loves me list" In conclusion, you may regret your purchase if you only bought this out of morbig curiousity, but will probably enjoy the experience nonetheless.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078180691', 'num_games_owned': 959, 'num_reviews': 190, 'playtime_forever': 117, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 117, 'last_played': 1527356022}
review:
제작자의 독특한 성적 취향을 알 수 있는 게임 Love at First Sight입니다. 스토리는 대략 그냥저냥 살던 주인공이 우연히 왕따를 당해서 매일 3층 옥상에 있는 사치를 보고 한 눈에 반하는 이야기로 시작됩니다. 

제작자의 상처 페티쉬를 드러내는 장면이 없다면 그럭저럭 즐겁게 감상한 편입니다만, 이 게임의 중요한 과정인 악역에 대한.. 왕따에 대한 극복 과정이 조금은 과하게 쿨하게 끝나지 않았나 싶습니다. 물론 사치는 훌륭하게 대응하고 극복한거같긴하지만 악역이 너무 쿨한 반응을 해 얼탱이가 좀... 

후일담으로 들어보니, 제작자의 사정으로 2달 남짓한 개발 기간이라고 말해서 대충 왜 그런지 이해했습니다. 좋은 게임은 빨리 빨리 나오지 못합니다. 다른 아쉬운 점으로 들자면 가격이 내용에 비해 조금 비싸다고 생각됩니다. 스토리가 좋게 좋게 끝나서 다행입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140577680', 'num_games_owned': 476, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1526779082}
review:
This was a great experience to read first hand (and not on YouTube), even though it’s a little shorter than I had hoped.
But, that’s to be expected with how many people actually worked on this (and it was a short amount indeed).

I think Sachi is adorable, and she fit a perfect description for what I was looking for in a reference.

Originally I just wanted to see this for a project I’m working on, since I’m not good with pacing in love stories.
This has all the good effects and turns for what I needed, and especially since the story is great.
I HAVE noticed a few things about the author (or creator, if you wish) that would be seen as odd (me, not so much, I like it).
They even flat out mention their fetish in extra content (even if it wasn’t already apparent).

But, since it’s so short of a game, I don’t recommend this game casually at full price, I only managed to get it half off, but it’s still nice to get on your library!

I’m not a critic (so don’t take me too seriously), but I would rate this short story based on my literary knowledge as:
7/10, being that it’s a Japanese story about becoming friends with someone who is different, and it warms my heart how well it’s made to portray that angle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198431235726', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1642394597}
review: En un genero tan gastado y que sobrevive por la auto-inserción del jugador en el protagonista, es lindo ver que este peculiar juego trata al menos de darle una que otra carcterística humana a Mamoru y toma un concepto que bien podría tener un enfoque parodico para hacerlo una linda historia de amor. Conclusiones, para nada es innovador o algo por el estilo pero lo poco que lo diferencia del resto de juegos en su género son detalles positivos, sin duda lo recomiendo; Tanto para fans acerrimos del genero como para aquellos que buscan un concepto un tanto peculiar. (6/10)

author: {'steamid': '76561197972694609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 310, 'last_played': 1524772908}
review:
Love at First Sight is a 200% vanilla romance story, sweet, gentle, with a happy ending and an adorable girl to fall in love with. 
... and that's it, really, there's nothing much else going on. It is short (around 4 hours long) and it doesnt have any additional routes, but it's definitely a nice read to pass a spring afternoon, hugging a one-eyed girl with her average problems at school - bullying, that is. Maybe wait for a discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198203217180', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 328, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1521303645}
review:
和独眼妹子恋爱的视觉小说，画风很独特但是习惯了感觉还挺不错的（希尔薇什么的其实我没玩过，虽然久仰大名），剧情本来以为会有点黑暗结果根本甜掉大牙（墨镜！把我的墨镜拿来！要闪瞎了！）。

其实这作一年多以前还没汉化的时候就买了，本来想着啃生肉的，结果玩一半就扔到一边了，最近突然想起来，然后就发现汉化出了，于是打了汉化补丁又从头把它读完了，感谢汉化组的努力，就喜欢这种不覆盖原有内容，只是增加一个语言选项，还不影响解锁成就的汉化补丁。从作者的后记来看，独眼妹子小幸本来是作者画的原创角色，后来才游戏化（所以本作也没啥剧情，就是卖萌加发糖），这种把自家孩子做成游戏的感觉真好啊，以及虽然作者几乎是一个人制作很不容易但我还是要说，BGM真的挺单调又难听的，之前生肉没啃下去大概也有一部分原因是这个吧（不要找借口）。

author: {'steamid': '76561198037142019', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 336, 'last_played': 1520429133}
review:
Привет!
Перед вами довольно короткая и простая, абсолютно линейная история про одноглазую девочку, рожденная в кратчайшие сроки неизвестным японцем с горящим пуканом, проживающем на территории Америки. По-большому счету, это всё, что можно сказать об этом произведении. 
По пунктам:
- музыкальное сопровождение ... слабое 4/10
- оригинальность истории ... нет. 1/10
- оригинальность Сачи 10/10
- оригинальность второстепенных персонажей 2/10

Большим бонусом ко всему отмечу совершенно незаурядный фетишизм ГГ, который не раз заставил меня улыбнуться на протяжении этой истории. И автор неплохо поработал над меню игры, что так же неплохо.
Я остался доволен (Сачи решает)

author: {'steamid': '76561198000054380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 319, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 319, 'last_played': 1518430856}
review:
This game is nice and sweet, albeit rather short and
with a couple tracks sounding somewhat off:

Morning Particle starts off nice, but sounds kind of off-key or maybe it's the piano chord in the background.
As for Hopping Steps, not sure if the bass bit fits and the kick/drum seems a little too powerful/prominent.

The rest of the BGM seems alright. As for artwork, it's neat. Though it would've been nice to have more, it's understandable. It's nice to have animations in, even if it's something wrapping up/opening the chapters.
All that said, it's fairly decent - given the time constraints and considering the amount of people working on this.

I wish I could give this a slightly more neutral review, so I'll simply say it's a 6.5-7/10 all things considered.

I hope Ray-K and kyou1110 aren't disappointed with the reception and criticism.

里面有最新的汉化进度，再次感谢汉化的大佬（就是汉化得太“暴力”了，滑稽，苟......）。
不想解压的可以用这个链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1sm0aXRJ 密码：brfo 这是我下载好的版本，不用解压的文件。[b] 汉化补丁的文件名为 patch_chs.rpa ，将它放在本地文件夹中的game文件夹中，再在进入游戏后的设置（options）中选择“chinese”，游戏即可变为简体中文。	[/b]顺便一提，游戏成就涉及使用英文及其日文进行游戏，想要做成就的朋友请在设置里设置其他语言，再通过“ctrl”进行跳过即可达成（不过我建议还是自己看看，单词都不难），以下为个人评测部分。

[h1] “这是一个没有红花茶的世界，女主也不是一吃三明治就阵亡的体质，但是，她却更加特殊。”	[/h1]
作者是Ray-Kbys老师，另一部作品是我们耳熟能详的希尔薇，目前已为2.01版，当然老师还有别的作品，也都非常有魅力，我就不一一赘述了。这部“Love at First Sight”日文原名“ひと目惚れ”，早期画风更加有“特色”，我们现在看到的已经是修改过几次的版本了。
Love at First Sight中，女主角为独眼[strike]萌物	[/strike]，从游戏中我们得知，其母系一脉为正常人，所以让我们来猜猜父亲是......咳咳，扯远了，表面上，我以为这会是一个讲述有缺陷的人怎么变得坚强获得爱情的深刻故事，结果被塞了一嘴狗粮......而且还是两对，堪称暴击。游戏流程并不长，但是很甜，所以请大家乖乖坐下来吃糖就行了，这个暖心的故事不会让你失望。看作者自述，好像因为时间问题所以砍掉了不少支线，个人感觉挺可惜的，不过在游戏的“画廊”（extras）中含有大量有趣的后日谈等内容，但是请在主线结束后品尝风味更佳，何况这里还涉及三个隐藏成就，请务必不要错过。

P.S.我要不要写一篇汉化全成就指南呢，伤脑筋......

author: {'steamid': '76561198048021290', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 125, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1515350336}
review:
-약간의 스포가 담겨있습니다-

게임을 모두 클리어 하면 메인 화면에서 엑스트라 항목을 선택 할 수 있게 되는데, 거기에 보면 과거 컨셉아트를 볼 수 있습니다.
작가는 시간이 부족했기 때문에 많은 것들을 잘라냈고 역량부족으로 전부 담을 수 없었다... 라고 이야기를 했는데 차라리 개발 기간에 여유를 두고 자신이 원했던 것들을 집어넣었다면 아마 지금보단 수 배는 더 높은 퀄리티의 작품이 나오지 않았을까 하는 아쉬움과 작가에 대한 원망이 많이 남는 작품입니다.



장점

- 잔잔한 스토리와 큰 기복없는 진행, 거기에 귀여운 여주인공. 하지만 놀랍게도 이것이 전부이다.

단점

- 지루한 일직선 진행방식
- 몇 없는 등장인물들의 행동과 표정변화
- 적은 분량
- 왜 있는지 모르겠는 악역
- 1~2개를 빼고 이상한 배경음악들
- 부족한 그림 디테일 (않이 후반에 이모랑 사이도 좋아졌고 악역도 전학갔는데 거 너덜너덜한 여주 교복은 왜 안 고쳐주시는 겁니까??)

작가의 팬이거나 외눈박이 성향이 아닌 사람에게는 추천하지 않음 
위에 해당이 되더라도 세일 기간이 아니라면 사지 않는 것을 진심으로 추천

author: {'steamid': '76561198086166592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 448, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 448, 'last_played': 1514871427}
review:
Es una historia linda, con personajes que te caen bien, aunque de pronto hay situaciones que parecen forzadas y salidas de la nada.

Pero algo hay que tener claro, aqui no se toman decisiones puesto que este juego va de simplemente dejarse llevar por la historia que el autor quiere contar, la cual como dije, esta bastante linda.

Si pueden adquirirlo en oferta es una muy buena forma de matar el tiempo.

review:
За красивой обложкой кроется абсолютно безвкусное чтиво, которое вгоняет в тоску. 
Клише, непрописанные персонажи, скучное повествование, не раскрыли потенциал фичи "циклопности" девушки, вокруг которой, между прочим, все и крутится (по идее). 
Мой совет всем людям которые пилят новелы: Если уж вы и придумали какую-то фишку привлекающую внимание - то постарайтесь подать это лучше чем десятого сорта школьную недосантабарбару. За визуал (красивые спрайты, потому что фончики ни о чем) ставлю 2/10.

review:

幸が薄く背が低く内気で気も弱い。加えて単眼といった個性を持つが故に、普段から俯き下ばかり見ていた彼女が、主人公と出会うことで顔を上げ、一歩を踏み出します。

author: {'steamid': '76561198049734003', 'num_games_owned': 758, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1512034702}
review:
Love at First Sight is a kinetic visual novel, and thus you are presented with a linear story without branching narratives or choices. Its focal point, our single eyed Sachi, makes for a very cute VN, and her whole character was adorable. Even with a single large eye she was able to melt my heart. However, the weak writing made for a rocky read.

The art in this game is a little hit or miss, with the best sprites and CG going to Sachi (of course). The sprites for other characters felt lackluster or had proportional errors which made them look a little strange or stiff. The one thing I think the art does well is capture the tone of the surroundings, which is not something VNs focus on. The sprites come off as dark and a little dull looking, using lots of grey tones, but as the story's mood shifts these sprites begin to warm up with brighter colours to complement feelings such as happiness. It's a really nice touch, and blended the art style together with the backgrounds and emotions the story was trying to convey. Furthermore, this VN has really nice background music, and sometimes it was pleasant to just let it loop. I definitely think this is one of the VN's strongest traits, as the tracks could shift between scenes but never felt boring to listen to.

Concerning the writing, the game was free of spelling or grammar errors, and the characters were written with mostly distinct voices, which become apparent later on in the game as there are some POV changes. However, despite all the good things I've said so far, this game has weaker writing. This is explained in the author's afterword as due to the fact the game was rushed, and I think it shows in the game. Characters don't get fleshed beyond what we're presented with except for Sachi, and a lot of the development between Sachi and Mamoru kind of just happens, rather than a good steady progression of their relationship. Of course, with a game focusing on our one eyed heroine, Sachi would get the most development, but even then it is not done in a natural or satisfactory way, and her arc (which coincides with the antagonist's arc) ends in a rather anticlimactic tone. The good things I can say concerning the writing were the changes in POV, giving us insight to several characters, and tidbits of characters doing things that indicate depth to them (but as stated earlier, it's never expanded upon).

What drew me to this game initially was the heroine, but aside from a few mentions of her eye it doesn't really come up much and doesn't seem like much of an impediment to her. I would have thought she would have been tormented and hated the single eye she had, but she doesn't really get bullied over that so why is her eye not a stronger trait in the story? I feel like this was a critical piece of writing that should have been included into the plot.

Every way I look, I just see a lot of missed potential. Sachi is great as a character, but if the writing had been stronger and the characters had more depth, this game could have been fantastic. I want to love this game, I really, [i]really[/i] do because Sachi is absolutely precious, but I cannot recommend this game, especially for the high price it's asking for. The game, aside from being a short play at around 3 hours, offers nothing beyond mediocre writing and characterization, which is unfortunate. I would like to see the dev go back and polish this game or add something new, because I think an overhaul of this game could make it well worth the $10 price. If you still wish to support the dev, I recommend getting this game on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198410818482', 'num_games_owned': 1137, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 871, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1537786588}
review:
一开始我是接触了Teaching Feeling（以下简称“TF”），被那奇异却又迷人的画风吸引，慢慢开始了解作者RayK。怎么说呢，她的画风就像榴莲（原谅我这个不恰当的比喻），喜欢的人觉得魅力无穷、赏心悦目，不喜欢的人则觉得画风很恐怖、鬼畜，各有所好，不好评价。

当然，一款游戏不能只靠画风，这款游戏的剧情也无可挑剔（个人意见）。虽然[b]整个游戏只有一条路线[/b]，[spoiler]但是作者在后记里提到过这个游戏是在参加什么展会前的一个月赶制出来的，如果时间能充裕一点她就可以做几个分支。[/spoiler]但是情节还是非常棒的。我一直对作者的编剧能力非常赞叹，无论是TF还是Love at First Sight（以下称独目钟情[spoiler]我还挺喜欢这个译名的[/spoiler]）,题材很普通，但总是能散发出不一样的魅力。

然后就是游戏的主题。无论是TF还是独目钟情，亦或是那部存在性有待考察的“Butterfly Affection”，作者一直在宣扬“救赎”这一主题，尽管她画的人物都不能符合大众所说的“正常”的标准，但玩家都不会把她们当作怪物，甚至为她们付出真心。[spoiler]作者在Twitter上（或者Pixiv，我不太记得了）说过“喜欢恐怖又可爱的生物”，可是我一点都不觉得可怕啊，好失败啊（笑[/spoiler]

买这个游戏我多少还是抱着点补票的心理，玩了两年盗版的TF，想买但是找不到梯子[spoiler]而且我对搭梯子买TF这事有点抵触[/spoiler]，只能在Steam买下这款游戏以表心意，但这只是个开始，如果TF在Steam上发售，不打折我都要买，就算只有日语版我也要买，不在Steam上发售我就以后出国去日本的时候买。

If you are an English-speaker,to summarize,what I said before is:if you're interested in visual novel and bishōjo,you can buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198184247991', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 176, 'last_played': 1514800058}
review:
[h1]純愛ラブストーリー(本当)[/h1]

そういえばpixivに単眼少女のイラストが上がった時、一時期話題になったっけ。
その人の作品か。
なるほど。

単眼少女がヒロインだが、身体の特徴に対して深く切り込んだ場面も波乱もなく、
ビジュアルがなければ教科書のような恋愛ノベルゲーム。
一本道だが、実績を取るには英語版もプレイする必要がある。別に読まなくても(読めないから)Ctrlキーで飛ばせばOK。
Steamでの販売にともない、キャラクターがスマートにリメイクされている。
個人的には元の方が好みではある。

そんな感じの意見はあったけど、作者があとがきで書いていたことが概ね疑問に当てはまっていたので、ここで特筆すべき点はない。
やっぱ時間がなかったというのは大きかったようで、予定していたより小さくまとまってしまったらしい。

同人ゲームとしては妥当な価格設定だが、Steam(商用)のボリュームとしては定価だとお高く感じると思います。
セール時にどうぞ。

author: {'steamid': '76561198145977508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1511204475}
review:
ニッチなジャンル「単眼娘」を題材にした希少な(唯一の？)恋愛アドベンチャー。
本編は二時間もあればクリアできる程度のもので選択肢も無く一本道ですが、単眼娘好きはもちろん不幸属性の女の子に優しくしてあげたい紳士淑女の皆さんにはぜひオススメ。ゲーム自体は単純な紙芝居ものですが、製作者さんの個性的ながらも可愛い女の子のイラストと、優しいお話は価格に対しては十分な出来だと思います。また個人的には各章冒頭の短いアニメーションの可愛さがたまりません。
pixiv時代からヒロインの幸ちゃんを応援してきた身としては感無量。元々コミティアで頒布されたものを買ってプレイしていましたが、ついついこちらでも買ってしまいました。明美(主人公の友人)の立ち絵など、細部で変更があったのかな？　コミティア版の記憶が曖昧ですが、ちょっとだけ立ち絵などの修正は入っているかもですね。本来は選択肢による分岐などの構想もあったそうなので、いつか「完全版」も遊んでみたいと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198396849986', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 884, 'last_played': 1580188618}
review:
我老婆，不许和我抢！！！！
太可爱了，尤其是眼睛，真水灵～
咳咳咳～回归正题！
这是一步画风猎奇但是故事十分暖心的治愈系作品，不过各种的删减故事变得很短，这是一个非常伤心的问题！
不过有兴趣的还可以玩玩这个作者其他得作品，也很温馨，不过由于作者的个人因素，能不能接受是另外个问题了～
反正我还是挺喜欢的，我的第一部入门galgame就是希尔薇，不过至今为止（2.01版本）还是没有给出一个正式得结局，只有插入文本得结婚版或者改编得魔改版～
最后再说一句：小辛（臼井 辛）是我得！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198276977828', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 231, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 231, 'last_played': 1510990652}
review:
Hello, FRiends!  

This is my first time reading a kinetic novel! (As opposed to otome.) Also, my first time as a male character wooing a girl. And you know what? It was wonderful!

[h1]The Wonderful[/h1]
[list]
    [*]The one-eyed girl, Sachi, is adorable!  So many cute moments!  There's a scene[spoiler]while she's being fed,[/spoiler] when she blushes and scrunches up her eye, that made my tummy do little flip-flops!  It makes you want to playfully tease her a bit more just to get those adorable reactions.  Her learning how to smile and trust is absolutely heart warming. 
    [*]Though she does have social problems, it's not so much based on her appearance.  Even her bully[spoiler]just despises aspects of her personality.[/spoiler]She has problems even a two-eyed girl might have, which makes it relatable.
    [*]The art is lovely. I'd call it quirky.  Refreshing to look at.
    [*]All characters have fleshed-out personalities. (I want to know MC's friends!)
    [*]It's not a heavy story--more like a fairy tale.  Though I admit, first seeing her and her wounds/bandages is alarming.  You can see those for yourself on the store page before you buy.
    [*]The English is flawless.
[/list]

[h1]The Not so Wonderful[/h1]
[list]
     [*]Short!  Finished in 3.5 hours.  As cute as it is, there's no way I'd wanna pay $9.99 for this--it's just too short.  I got it for $2.49 at 75% off which was a steal!  I wouldn't pay more than 5 bucks for it.
[/list]

[h1]...And the Weird[/h1]
[list]
     [*](mild spoiler)[spoiler]There's a plot device where the MC touches her wounds and scars to become more physically intimate.  It kinda reads like a sexual encounter...without the sex.  I felt like I was watching somebody's kink.  Not horrible--just odd.[/spoiler]
     [*]There's an author's section where the creator apologizes for the shortness and quality.  That's the whole topic.  Apparently, she was rushed to meet a deadline to paticipate in some project. (Maybe a convention?)  It's a bit bizarre to include an author's not-so-short apology for the game you just purchased.  
[/list]

[h1]The Verdict[/h1]
     I can't recommend this visual novel enough.  If you like cute, sweet, and sentimental--without breaking your heart--this is the game for you. Just don't pay full price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154301298', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 199, 'last_played': 1510534114}
review: Being a fan of the horror, guro, and oddball stuff, this game was a no questions asked purchase. It's incredibly sweet and within  an hour you'll fall in love with Sachi and her beautiful eye yourself. The story has a single path (no choices) but is well written and focuses entirely on character development. The artwork has a slight sketchiness to it that compliments the overall look and feel. The music is simple but doesn't overstay its welcome during the game's short playtime. I highly recommend this to people who enjoy a nice and romantic story with a bit a touch of something "different."

author: {'steamid': '76561198084096007', 'num_games_owned': 446, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 736, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 736, 'last_played': 1615902500}
review:
[h1]Девочка-циклоп или горящий дедлайн на кончиках пальцев.[/h1]

[code] Знакомство с данной игрой началось на просторах очередной распродажи. Сама новелла представляла для меня кота в мешке, ведь я просто брал понравившиеся предметы по скидке. Но вот, захотелось перепройти, а заодно описать детально, что всё-таки ждёт других. [/code] 

[h1]Первый миг.[/h1]
Запустив Love at First Sight, весящую 261 мб данных, вы видите короткий список функций на английском и задний фон в качестве освещённого чердака школы, слышите лёгкую простенькую мелодию на пианино, а также обнаруживаете игру в оконном режиме. Если последнего нет, то скорее всего она развёрнута с соотношением сторон 4/3. Полазив в нехитрых настройках, понимаете, что изменения разрешения экрана здесь нет.

«Чёрт с ним» - говорите вы, начиная искать русификатор. Тот, рабочий, легко обнаруживается в руководствах. Ставите его, и можно начать исследовать произведение. 

[h1] Минуты соприкосновения.[/h1]
Если вы играли ранее в новеллы, то заметите окно диалогов и описания. Здесь оно крайне минималистично: голая рамка. Никаких функций, отдельных кнопок вроде «убрать интерфейс» или «сохранить» нет. Это может вызвать дезориентацию и непонимание. Из любопытства, а может, вспомнив старые советы, стоит нажать Esc. Вот здесь всё на своём месте. На этой странности можно приступить к осмотру внешнего вида.

Что можно сказать здесь?  У игры есть характерный «грязный» стиль – всё выглядит потёртым, с выходом покраса за пределы контура предмета, с мазками кистью и пятнами прорисовки, соседствующие c обычной тенью и блеском. Фича это или просто недоделка не могу определить, но второй такой новеллы точно не припомню. «Ладно» - говорю я, задумываясь над сюжетом.

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2425778918

Он здесь проще простого если начистоту. Идея полностью выстроена на существовании скромной потрёпанной девочки-циклопа, испытывающей сильные трудности в общении. ГГ знакомится с ней и заводит дружбу, даруя радость и счастье (девочка-циклоп, циклоп-девочка, люби её люби, держи покрепче и носи на руках.) Действие же получится максимально камерным – всё происходит в пределах одного района, а охватит сюжетной веткой шестерых человек максимум. Ожидающие хитросплетений могут покинуть новеллу, а я продолжаю говорить об особенностях.

[h1] Проверка отношений.[/h1] 
В новелле существует аж два фетиша. Первый, это собственно, красующаяся на обложке и уже упомянутая особа. Обратите внимание – целое произведение, построенное на лелеянии уставшей бедняжки. Странно, извращённо по внешнему виду, но мы же без категоричных недовольств в сторону ксеносов и других? Да, а поэтому ничего кроме милого. 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1184265264

Не удивляемся смотрим на другой фетиш. Он поменьше размером и подходом , но тоже присутствует – тяга шрамам. И это что-то напоминающее детство, где прежде чем сковырнуть надоевшую корку, терпишь пока всё внутри восстановится, и уже потом убираешь «кожурку». 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2425777616

В плане по-настоящему хороших вещей, новелла затрагивает щепетильную тему дружбы и травли. Конечно, это не более чем пустяковый остаток серьёзной проблемы, но всё же она самую малость существует. В некоторые моменты  появляется вполне осязаемые прямые мысли о молчании общества или излишней помощи от чужого человека. К сожалению, недолго.

А теперь самое главное. Я полюбил данную новеллу не за прошлые особенности, а за честное признание, хранящееся в дополнительных материалах. А именно горящий дедлайн из-за лени с непониманием пополам, срубленным замыслом с развилками (именно поэтому новелла кинетическая), переросшая заявленная работа в увлечение автора, ограничение задумки вкупе с историей развития замысла. На фоне гордой в своей простоте повествующей части, это смотрится удивительно честно и в какой-то мере восхитительно.

И вот, когда за 4 часа вы прослушали всё что можно, заполучили статус идеальной игры, я надеюсь на ваше понимание, насколько прост этот проект и рассчитывает на самую малость. Другие блистают особенностями, имеют провалы и пытаются выехать на задумке, беря чем-то отчётливым, выраженным . Этот не пытается заставить себя купить, но старается просто понравится. В какой-то мере это мило и прекрасно на фоне индустрии склок и обманов.

[h1]The end.[/h1]
Простенькая, незатейливая кинетическая новелла с жизненной предысторией. Это не победа, даже близко не фаворит успеха, но зато хороший пример что случается по мере разработки казалось бы даже самого лёгкого в предприятии проекта. Купите по скидке, пройдите и оцените.

author: {'steamid': '76561198209054329', 'num_games_owned': 151, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1508169334}
review:
新型4级英语学习资料，3.5小时全成就通关，短小精悍十分甜蜜的小故事。（mm吃狗粮还吃的这么开心(´+ω+｀) ） 十分适合我这个学生党抽空来品味这类游戏，毕竟经常因为时间问题中途弃坑(´;︵;`)。人物的设定我很喜欢，女主给予人一种强烈的保护欲，作者后日谈也有写到人物名字的含义，画风奇特新颖而熟悉，女主十分可爱啊（我为什么要说这画风很熟悉 （滑稽），7首BGM，3小时的剧本相当于一场电影吧，对于国区38块这个价格来说我是觉的很合适的，美区10刀对我来说有些小贵吧..（毕竟我不是在那边生活。真爱党买买买，忠实于自己的信仰）总体来说，这是一款十分甜蜜暖心的视觉小说。评分9/10
希望作者能出下一款让我们眼前一亮的游戏吧（我当时的身体仿佛已经被掏空了。滑稽）

author: {'steamid': '76561198140526204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1570115176}
review:
Il est trop court, 1h30 est c'est bouclé, même en etant un bréle en englais et assisté par google translate.

donc, directement l'essensiel: qu'attend ton d'une visual novel? on attend que par la simple interaction du clic, le jeux nous face croire à des choix qui sonts en réalités fait par le personnage. c'est comme lire un livre, c'est sa sinuosité qui nous empéche de nous poser des questions. là, sa n'en à rien: l'histoire et extrement linéaire, elle ne surprent que tres peu et est vraiment trop tipée. et la profondeur, parlont en: le seul endroit où vous pourez trouver de la profondeur, c'est dans les readme du menu avec l'auteur qui dit qu'il aurai voulu aprofondire cette relation ci, celle là, le background de la persone si, de la personne là... la seul chose que l'on se dit c'est "mais pourquoi ne pas l'avoir fait???".

sinon, pour ceux qui souhaitent s'initier, c'est l'une d'es plus accessible auquel j'ai jouer, autant pour l'histoire que pour le registre de langage.

review: 对没错，我他娘就是喜欢希尔薇才来的。画师Ray-Kbys所刻画得的角色大多都是这种小小的令人怜爱的可怜女主。小幸很不幸也很幸运，一旦接受了独眼娘这种设定。就会感觉她可爱的不得了。虽然流程很短但是是一款很棒的游戏，强力强力案例！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198195547933', 'num_games_owned': 393, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 589, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1506443319}
review:
При всем уважении к авторам, я не смог насладиться музыкальным сопровождением, поэтому играл под свой бгм.
Касательно истории - она проста, предсказуема и, как говорит сам автор в послесловии, "могла бы быть лучше", если бы у него было достаточно времени на разработку. А так. за те 2 месяца, что у него были, он проделал огромную работу, чтобы завершить игру.
В целом, хочу поблагодарить автора за работу. Прочитать эту историю один раз было маленьким приключением.
Как итог, я бы поставил игре 6\10.

review:

『 ღ Gameplay Hours :: 3 Hours』

"Creepy cute" slice of life, romance VisualNovel. Art and cyclops girl are the only 'creepy/horror' part to the VN. Story is a bit bland and plain for the $10 price tag; worth the art and badge items if you get it on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009391977', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 239, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 239, 'last_played': 1505337347}
review:
cute little game which can be 100% completed within a few hours. while i can't really say it's worth the $10 pricepoint , if you catch it on sale for $5 or less i'd say it's well worth it.

The art style is cute and touching, the music is unmemorable but unobtrusive, and the character story and dialogue is heartwarming.

there are a couple of extras like art, in-game movies, and concept designs which unlock normally through the linear and kinetic play through so you dont' have to worry about missing anything.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293956505', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1484300743}

author: {'steamid': '76561198262164526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 241, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1504160177}
review:
This game isn't necessarily bad, it just isn't that great, and is pretty uninspired in my opinion. 

I bought this game when it was on sale for $3, at that price, I would say it was worth it. The story was cute, if a bit short, and it was generally entertaining, but for it's regular price of $10...it's definately not worth your money. There are at least half a dozen VN's on Steam that I could recommend for the same price or less with better art, better story, longer play time, etc. 

I think it's kind of sad that this game turned out the way it did, because I really do think that it had potential, but even the author admits that the game was rushed and was lacking in several departments. Had the art been cleaned up a bit, included some different routes, and just been given some more depth to the story, this could have been a great game, but as it stands, it's just an interesting and unique concept that didn't move far beyond that.

Unless you're super into monster girl stories, like the anime meets Tim Burton art style, or you have an injured girl/scars fetish (The author's words, not mine), then you might enjoy Love at First Sight, everyone else should just move along.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257299483', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 328, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1707949579}
review:
Tells a really warm and heart-healing love story. The hero along with his friends is nice, and the story itself is also about pure love. Once you accept the character design of heroine Sachi's cyclops, she is just one of the most ordianary girls in the world (her eye is not included of course, lol) who wants care and love. This is it.
Today is Double Seventh Festival, the Eastern Valentine's Day. Sachi has got her love, and I hope you, who are now sitting in front of the screen, will too get true love.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064248346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 348, 'last_played': 1503887865}
review:
[quote=author]A pure, heart-warming romance game where the apple of your eye only has one eye![/quote]

[b]Is it a game?[/b] Not really. There are nothing that you need to do, no choices you need to make, all you have is a story to read. This is not a game, but a short visual novel for you to waste a little time on.

[b]Is it a good story?[/b] Yes, if you wish to see a short, sweet story of "something popped out of a fairytale" then i say go for it. The story give me a vibe of [url=https://www.katawa-shoujo.com/]Katawa Shoujo[/url] as well (for obvious reasons).

[b]How would i describe my experience reading this?[/b] The story is nowhere near perfect, that much is certain. Certain parts feel rushed and you can see the VN potential of being something greater had it the time to be polished. The author explained this issue in the VN itself, but here the short version:
[spoiler]This is the author first attempt at making something in a game/VN format. The author is a Japanese living in America, and their English is not great. They only have about two months to work on this project before barely turn in before the deadline for Comitia, not to mention being mostly a one person project (they only had help with the soundtrack). Due to time constraint, the VN's full potential of being a full-fledged "game" was gone. This finished product only feature one path where the main character woo our cyclops. Should you search up the author and his artworks, there are pieces that indicate the VN to having multiple pathways with multiple "unique" girls to interact and potentially romanced. Sadly, all of these features are scrapped, and the author was not happy with the result.[/spoiler]

[b]Should you buy it?[/b] Admittedly, the game is not worth the $10 price tag only because the missed potential that it could be. My recommendation is to wait for a Sale and purchase it for some feel-good reading session. Such as when i let it sit in my Wish List for over a year (mostly because i forgot) until i saw a 70% Sale. Got it for $3.

author: {'steamid': '76561198398215758', 'num_games_owned': 234, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1059, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1058, 'last_played': 1525880217}
review:
1.是个十分治愈的故事
2.幸真的是太可爱啦，第一次被这种类型的游戏人物萌到。这就是大眼萌妹的魅力吗ww
3.不过主角的兴趣，不，应该是作者的兴趣太糟糕啦[spoiler] 居然喜欢摸别人伤口[/spoiler]
4.对于我这种三分钟热度的人来说，这个故事的剧情长度刚刚好。
[spoiler]5. 真弓[strike] 阿姨[/strike]姐姐居然是我整个故事最喜欢的角色，我是不是没救了QAQ[/spoiler]
6.感谢汉化组的付出，让我这种文盲也能顺畅地进行游戏剧情ww

author: {'steamid': '76561198400402053', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1503474648}
review:
Rating: 7/10 ("Good")

Recommended for: People who enjoy VNs, people who enjoy romance. I would not recommend this to a first time VN reader.

Love at First Sight is a bit of a tricky visual novel to review. Let's start with the good and neutral parts.

The artwork is its main selling point. While it could be considered amateurish, it has a lot of charm and I like it a lot. The backgrounds, CGs, and character sprites all have a similar quality to them that make them pleasing to the eye. The soundtrack is, at best, adequate. The story is told in multiple short "Acts" that have a small animation utilizing a CG or scene from the previous "Act". There are no choices to make throughout the story.

Love at First Sight's plot is very cute and heartwarming, and has a lovely message and overall theme. It was an enjoyable read despite its somewhat strange subject matter, which is the primary reason I don't consider this a good pick for new visual novel readers. The characters were also a joy to read about even if they didn't have a lot of depth.

But..and this is an enormous but...Love at First Sight just isn't worth the price, whether it's the full one ($11 CAD) or on sale.

The primary reason for this is that the story just isn't very memorable. Sure, it's sugary sweet and more slice of life than anything, but the only thing you'll really remember about this story is that the heroine is a cyclops. Other than that, it is quite similar to other tales of its ilk, and I could predict the "twists" that came with it.

In addition, I read the novel in just about 2 hours, which feels too short for the price, especially full price, and [i]especially[/i] when more memorable visual novels are available for [i]free[/i] (see CUPID).

So, despite the fact that I honestly consider this novel to be "good", I really can't justify the price, and can't justify a "recommendation". Of course, feel free to snatch it up and read it when it's on sale, but don't go buying it at full price. You'll likely feel disappointed.

Now I feel bad for marking this "not recommended". Oh well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100876339', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1500144670}
review:
[b]Love at First Sight[/b] - милая новелла, повествующая о нашем ГГ (Усуи), случайно встретившим забитую и весьма стеснительную девушку-циклопа Сачи[spoiler], заверните её[/spoiler], что учится в той же школе, что и наш ГГ. На протяжении сей хистори мы узнаем о семье Сачи, о Усуи, о его друзьях. И, разумеется, мы увидим как развиваются отношения нашией парочки, eheh.
Лично у меня на новеллу ушло часа три, при неторопливом чтении и полном погружении в происходящее. Ачивки в игре легкие, карточки профитные.
На этом обзор заканчивается, но, если же говорить об эмоциях, что были во время игры, то...
ЧЕРТ,
ЭТО ЖЕ

ОГО, ЭТО НОВЫЙ АУТФИТ!
AWWWW МИЛО!

МИЛО!

МИЛО!

author: {'steamid': '76561198100249298', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 315, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 232, 'last_played': 1503459410}
review:
前段时间在Pixiv上偶然关注到画师Ray-Kbys，然后知道了Love at First Sight。
“笑顔と涙が好物。異形や欠損もラヴ。”——Ray-Kbys本人是这样说的。
不得不说和其它原画相比，这部作品已经称得上是清新且淡雅了。

虽然很难称得上是神作，但是总的来说是很有意思的一款游戏（虽然叫轻小说可能会更加贴切）。
至少一旦接受了独眼娘这种设定，女主还是莫名萌的。

硬要说缺点的话，那么就是剧情短的出奇，但是请放心，只有日语英语的这种贴心设定是可以恰到好处的延缓你的游戏进程的。（雾）

看了其他人的评测，我决定翻墙去入Teaching Feeling，据说是R18作品，十分激动，十分激动。
以上。

author: {'steamid': '76561198309903897', 'num_games_owned': 1212, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 210016, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2226, 'last_played': 1644989508}
review:
萍水相逢，续写情缘、
那一天你在楼梯哭泣，安静沉默，楚楚可怜
那一面你在班级门口，左顾右盼，心怀感谢
那一次你在回家路上，眉头微皱，关心问怀
那一回你在电影院前，羞涩微笑，一目留颜
那一秒你在红枫树下，嗔泣动心，为爱痴情
那一天你在教学楼下，期待心许，一吻定情
不在意别人如何评价你，不在乎多少人因此反对。
与你相遇，好幸运。
忘不掉初次见你的紧张和心跳加速
忘不掉一起回家时开心和美好时光
忘不掉楼梯口前的畅谈和梦幻回忆
更忘不掉誓言后的一目钟情
望眼明眸流盼，又见花儿烂漫。
臼井辛，我的爱~

author: {'steamid': '76561198327901000', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 283, 'last_played': 1677354422}
review:
This is a qualified recommendation; I wouldn't buy this game, unless it is on sale.

Anyway, this a short, sweet and simple game that does what it sets out to do in telling a sweet and simple story. A puddle of chocolate, with a side order of touching angst; the heroine is for better or worst a most troubled and sympathetic woobie, which is the main draw of the game. If you want to vicariously rescue a tragic and unhappy one-eyed schoolgirl step right up.

When I said simple and short, I really meant that. The game has the simplest backstory, though side characters are decent, and I've heard some praise the hero for being active; perhaps that's why the game ends so quickly. Too quickly, and far too suddenly; any good ending should look forward somewhat into its characters' futures, which this game does not do. But apart from that, what little the game sets out to do, it does.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035444225', 'num_games_owned': 1856, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 762, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 762, 'last_played': 1499238259}
review:
1本道のビジュアルノベル。日本語入り。
薄幸の単眼少女さっちゃんを餌付けしイチャラブするお話。
濃密な甘さである。

個性溢れる絵と謎のフェチを植え付けられてしまうストーリーは絶賛に値する。
また、章ごとの幕間(いわゆるアイキャッチ)に差し込まれるアニメーションの愛らしさに心を奪われる。
それこそ、タイトル通り「一目惚れ」。

誤字脱字が散見されたり、音楽が味気なかったりするが、それ以外で十分魅せる遊んでみて良かったと思える1作だった。

review: A very cute, yet short kinetic visual novel. I'll remark that the protag is a bit of a d*ck early on but gains a better attitude in general later. Also why is everyone rude to Akemi for no good reason? She's great fun tbh. Music is bizarrely off-key and sounds like me when I try to replicate a song I /think/ I might've heard, which kind of makes it great in it's own right. All in all not a bad pick up! Sachi is positively adorable and the writing ain't half bad either.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067906461', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1087, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1087, 'last_played': 1462279087}
review:
Искал значит я самый обычный симулятор свиданий, но черт дернул искать ее в стиме. После просмотра кучи визуалок, я так и не нашел ничего годного. И тут я увидел необычную обложку. Одноглазая девочка, хмммммм, такого я еще не видел - вот, что я тогда подумал. Защел на страницу продукта, почитал отзывы, ну и понял, что нужно брать. Проходил с большим удовольстмием. Ладно, что- то я тут расписался.
Сюжет 6/10 Видно, что не доелан из-за сроков
Рисовка 9/10 Готов молиться на рисунки Рейки 
Стоит ли брать игру? Определенно стоит!!!

review:
In [i]Love at First Sight[/i] you play as a second year Japanese high school student named Mamoru. Only a couple of months ago he had to transfer to a new school, but he has already found good friends in Tomoyori and Akemi. However, he meets a strange girl a year below him, named Sachi, in a hallway. She is strange in that she is a cyclops; she has only a single, large eye. In addition, he sees that she looks injured or beaten up as she is covered in wounds and wears tattered clothing. She does not have any friends, but Mamoru decides to be nice and spend time around her.

This game is a kinetic novel, a type of visual novel with no branching story lines and only one ending. It can be played through as fast as the player can read it. I would estimate that it would take the average person around two or two-and-a-half hours to get through the whole thing.

To start off with a positive aspect of this game, I thought the artwork was fairly good. It manages to be a pleasing combination between cute and creepy at the same time. The colors used in the game are more on the darker side giving it a kind of creepy feeling, but the design of the characters is rather cute in contrast.

Unfortunately, most other aspects do not work well. The writing and characters are always the most important parts of any visual novel and the quality of them in [i]Love at First Sight[/i] is very mediocre. All of the characters in this game are incredibly two-dimensional and types of clichés that we have all seen before. You have the protagonist who is little more than an empty shell nice guy self-insert for the player, Sachi who is the shy and lonely character you help, Akemi who is the one bubbling with energy, Rui who is a standard fare school bully, and so on. It is especially annoying when none of these characters are ever fleshed out. This is very true with Rui as she comes off as the most clichéd type of bully imaginable who is angry all the time for no real reason. The Sachi character really should have been developed more considering the whole quirk of the game is her character. Aside from her appearance, her unique characteristic of being a cyclops has almost no bearing on the story at all. She could have been depicted as a normal person with two eyes and the exact same character traits and the story could have played out the same. It is just a major disappointment to not see this aspect used at all.

And that brings me to the other major problem with the game: the story. All in all, it is a very predictable high school romance story. The player-character meets a cute girl, they spend time together, go on dates, and be happy. I really do not think I am spoiling anything here. Nothing of substance happens in the story. There are no plot twists, no major developments. Even considering the short length of the game, this was a chore to complete.

Alas, even the music itself is not that great. It quickly became repetitive and irritating.

There is one other aspect that I must comment on. In the bonus content that is unlocked after completing the game, the creator is pretty open about the fact that some of his fetishes (he mentions eating and scars) made their way into the game. A few scenes in the game depict Mamoru touching Sachi's various scars which was awkward enough during play, but knowing the creator's intentions just gives the scenes even more negative connotations. Is it really necessary to depict a girl with injuries just to satisfy some weird fetish? This type of writing is really inexcusable and should have been left out.

Overall, this game is a disappointment. Though the artwork is pretty good, the other major aspects of this game totally failed with a boring and predictable story and clichéd and forgettable characters. This game is definitely not worth the full asking price of $9.99. I bought it 75% off during the summer sale and I am not sure if it is even worth that considering the short length. I am honestly not sure whom I would recommend this to other than maybe visual novel fanatics who want a cheap game on sale.

author: {'steamid': '76561198220045651', 'num_games_owned': 320, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1249, 'last_played': 1531993303}
review: 是个非常纯爱清新的游戏，剧情方面单线但看完让人感觉心中暖暖的，可以当作一个短篇小说来看。语言方面无论是日语还是英语，只要稍会一点，再借助一些翻译工具查询基本上能无碍游玩，几乎没有晦涩难懂的词汇，建议学过一点日语或是英语成绩较好的，能接受这个独眼设定的可以考虑尝试一下。

author: {'steamid': '76561198174787941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 137, 'last_played': 1498400695}
review: The story is great if you want cute romance novel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054365658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 323, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 323, 'last_played': 1498406884}
review:
So far it's a very light time investment, and the content is not objectionable.  I'm about half way throught the game; which I bought for 75% off during the summer sale.  The general writing and the dialouge are somewhat below the average quality of more polished visual novels, but the artwork and the characters have a certain charm.  Without a doubt there are better visual novels to purchase and spend your time consuming; but I wouldn't begrudge anyone who claimed to sincerely enjoy this.  I'm checking the recomend box, but I'f you don't play this through immediatly, I suspect it will languish indefinately in your backlog.

Edit.  I played through the entire game in 5 hours.  I'm changing my recommendation to No.  This just doesn't offer anything unique that hasn't been done many other places in much higher quality.  If you want to support the author then feel free to make the purchase, but "Love at First Sight" is immediately forgettable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017056865', 'num_games_owned': 912, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1495369810}
review:
Maybe 9.99$ is a little too much for this game, so I think you should get it when it's on sale.

Anyway the game is decent. Sachi is cute and the art style is very peculiar. This peculiarity  and the cuteness are the strongest point of the game, since the story is quite plain, the music are... well, pretty low budget and there aren't many CGs. The achievements are a little buggy, too, but you can just click around and they'll unlock sooner or later.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310096725', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1495269374}
review:
While as stated by other reviewers that the length of this kinetic visual novel is indeed short. It wasnt really bug me much since I have played a visual novel far shorter, shallower story written compared to this one.

As an intro, the story is about how MC stumbled upon a mysterious one-eyed student girl, who's crying alone by herself with scars & injuries marked all over her body, only to be revealed later that she's become a victim of bully. And of course as a MC, white knight role is his priority to be uphold. As the story progress, romantic relationship developed between them, heartwarming & cute scenes come into their everyday lives.

There are several subjects that can actually be expanded & explained more (the game developer said himself it was a bit of rushed due to time factor) such as the bully's background story, MC's friends & the girl's relatives which I felt not satisfying enough. According to someone in discussion board, a sequel is in progress.. so yeah, will looking forward to find out the answers in the next installment, hopefully.

Overall, it's still nice & enjoyable for a simple audience, my advise is, purchase it on discount price, give less expectation & you are good to go. (But of course my review alone is not enough to give clearer view about this game, try refer as many reviews out there before you make decision)

And yes, despite her look, this one-eyed girl is harmless & adorable. Must protect :')

author: {'steamid': '76561198037702453', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1493406952}
review:
This is a heartwarming journey~
Sure its a little rough and seems rushed, but that was admited and regardless, the overall quality of the story and work is, in my oppinion, Delightful!

In one sitting, Reading casually, (stopping to gush/laugh every now and then) the journey lasted about three hours. A worthwhile investment for a few hours of entertainment and life enriching. 

My eyes have been opened by more possibilities and I feel like ive grown as a person from experiencing this.

There may not be any "choices" to be made like traditional Visual Novels, So it felt much more like a book. But Id say that isnt a bad thing! And if anything allowed me to focus on the character's interactions and THEIR choices, rather than worrying about what my own might do to the story.

I bought (and generally noticed) this title while it was on sale but would definitely pay full price and think It deserves more credit when put into perspective, its a piece of art!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198078223002', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 884, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 884, 'last_played': 1460146451}
review:
Una corta, un poco inquietante al principio, principalmente por el estilo tan oscuro del artista, pero definitivamente una historia llena de amor y cariño,que si gustas, puedes probar. 
No niego que en un principio tuve mis dudas al comprar este juego, lo había comprado únicamente por estar en oferta y los aparentes comentarios positivos, pero no me arrepiento para nada. 
Una novela visual algo corta, pero con tanto misterio que no hay momento en el que dejes de preguntarte '¿qué pasará luego?' 
Tristemente no es un juego muy largo o profundo, el mismo autor dijo que estaba contra el tiempo, si te preguntas en algún momento quién es la chica cíclope, cuál es su origen, no se explica en ningún momento, no es un juego que haya que jugar con ese motivo, si no para disfrutar una linda historia romántica.

author: {'steamid': '76561198302360800', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1491538584}
review: Cute idea but overall not very interesting. I like the artwork. Sachi is adorable and the animated cutscenes inbetween acts were extremely well done(though why Tomo kept winking when he doesn't seem like the type to wink was kind of annoying) but thats really about it. The music and characters were pretty generic. Shy girl, over excited girl, stoic boy, woman in suit with no feelings and bad girl; though I did like that the bad girl had her own chapter showing her side of the story and the over excited girl actually fought someone which was unexepected. The idea of a one-eyed girl is pretty cool but you could remove that from the story and nothing would change. Sachi could have just been shy and awkard and it would have been the exact same story so I wish that would have been explored more. Maybe show why she only has one eye, have people be more surprised that there's a girl with one eye hanging around. I mean it wasn't even the reason Sadokawa was beating her up, she was beating her up. It's also not even really a game, there's not even any questions to answer or anything, which from what I understand the maker of the game wanted to have but didn't have the time so maybe if they ever come back to this they can fix that to make it more interesting. If you want just a quick story to read I would buy this but if you want an actual game this is a no go.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067790576', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1491761086}

author: {'steamid': '76561198067189801', 'num_games_owned': 584, 'num_reviews': 309, 'playtime_forever': 301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1491371437}
review:
This is a kinetic visual novel, but I didn't mind much because it's SUPER F*CKING CUTE!

Like, seriously, this silly, little VN made me smile a bunch because it was just too adorable. It's a simple, but unique story. It's about a cyclops girl in her first year of high school in Japan who is brutally bullied by a classmate until she meets the main character. Over time, the cyclops girl and the main character develop feelings for each other and they're super cute about it. It's a very charming story and I really enjoyed it.

The artwork has an interesting style, and there are cute, little animations that happen between chapters. The Extras section of the menu is really cool. It features commentary from the developer and also additional scenes that happen after the main story has ended. There's also nifty additional art from the developer. 

I definitely recommend such an adorable VN!

author: {'steamid': '76561198318426063', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1489829217}
review:
Sachi: "Why do you have to be so nice ? Stop it ! It's alreay hard enough to accept that you're going to abandon me yourself !" 

...I know what she wants me to say, and I know I can't say it.

I have to tell her everthing that's on mind. I didn't realize it until just now, but I know why I want to be with her.

Then I say :

"I... I love you. Sachi. "

author: {'steamid': '76561198137562987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 823, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1507385567}
review:
不知道该怎么说，目前已经玩了8个小时了，感觉像是过了一个世纪。没有人物配音，但是背景音乐却极度魔性，那种似乎是在循环然而又好像没有循环的旋律（没错，就是1：11的介绍视频里那段）带来强大的催眠能量，使我感觉随时都有可
______________________________________________________________

距离此评测的发表日期过去了一段时间，哼~没想到吧，我又回来啦！又玩了1个小时，不擅长英语的在下对于这种日常剧情很是难过。女主角叫臼井幸，是作者的看板娘，作者很喜欢画各种猎奇的女孩子...
有人在回复里说我睡着了，如果是那样的话，怎么可
[spoiler]能把这篇精彩的评测发出去[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198094984484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 377, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1548004318}
review:
さっちゃんを全力で守りたくなるADVです。
980円で販売しておりますが、内容的にはそれでも安いんじゃねえか！？って個人的には思いました。
読むのが自分は遅いので4時間ちょいかかってますが、普通の人で早くて１時間から３時間ぐらいで読み終わると思います。
ただ、１週して思ったことといえば何度も読み返したくなると思いました。
なのでこの後もう一回読んできます。さっちゃんかわいいよさっちゃあああああああああんうおおおおおおおおおおおおお！！！

review: I put off playing this game for a while because I didnt think it was going to be interesting.Boy was I surprised.This is the first novel story that I played in one sitting.The characters are wonderful and cute.They are different enough that talking to each one feels new and fun.The story is told in a really good way and pace.I was hooked, you really start to feel for these characters and hope things turn out well for them.I really enjoy love stories like this.I personally would love if this kind of love story happened to me.Plus the achievements are easy enough to get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198326326811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 418, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1568641018}
review:
说实话。我是非常喜欢这款游戏的。但是！没有中文！也没有补丁！这让我一个英文渣的不行的人怎么办！！！！我除了一边翻译一边玩我还能怎么样啊！。 
故事流程可能不长。不过里面内容比较有趣。有着平时朋友们之间的打趣。还有一些奇奇怪怪的谈话内容。总之我很喜欢的啦！

author: {'steamid': '76561198069159152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2420, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1488447263}
review:
A short novel with an engaging main character who catches the protagonist's eyes one day when she is crying in the stairwell. A tad incomplete in spaces, but all in all a beautiful read and a satisfying conclusion to her bullying and other issues. Hints that this relationship will stand for a long time.

The main character's most obvious feature is an interesting way to tell a tale about how differences on the outside do not really matter compared to what is on the inside. In some ways, Sachi reminds me of Hanako from Katawa Shoujo or Aeka from Yume Miru Kusuri (though without the sheer hell that Aeka goes through... or the extremely satisfying way she snaps at her bully in the end [which was so deserved; seriously what that bully attempted...]).

I have to recommend this for any romantics out there. Or for that matter romance readers (it seriously is in the vein of some of the sweeter ones).

author: {'steamid': '76561198103997484', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1537624156}
review:
(MIGHT CONTAIN SPOILERS) 

I want my own Sachi.

It's a cute story. I like how the main character (Mamoru) is just genuinely interested in our one-eyed heroine. Sure, he was surprised -- like any normal human being would. But then he wasn't weirded it out by it and was kind of like your average guy falling slowly in love. I like, love, adore his friend, Tomoyuki because he's so tsundere and smart. The dialog he shared with Mamoru is (to me) really well thought, and felt like they had been friends for a long time. It might be a bad thing though, because our MC had just known him for 2 months but they could already share thoughts, in a way. 

As what the author explained at the end of the game, this game could've been better if there was more time. So I was left a bit unsatisfied when it ended because it felt short. Still, it was a sweet journey with a very ... funny, interesting fetish put on. The EP you unlocked later on that talked about those fetishes are very cute too. I'm not into that but I can appreciate and wish happiness to the couple for sharing such ... ideals.

The negative notes I have about this game is how easily the conflict between the bully is solved (then again, time was limited for this game to be made), and Akemi's character isn't my best friend type. I think I relate more with Tomo and I can't stand overly energetic people but, hey, as a manga / fictional character, she works. She falls into that archetype so this is just preference issue, is all. 

That said, I really wished that the author makes updates to add to the game to make it better and add more archs that was claimed to have been cut due to time.

OVERALL: Don't expect much from this "rushed" game. Think of it as a light read that you can pick as you're waiting for another game to load. Very casual, one-route game, no choice-making, literally visual novel game with interesting cast.
