review: 最初是被别人安利的这款游戏，因为没有汉化所以就一怒之下入了正（大雾），身为一个英文渣来玩这种英文AVG简直作死（喂！自我吐槽就到此为止吧）总而言之，这款游戏非常简单，纯爱的剧情，2、3个小时的阅读量（虽然我现在5小时还没推完TUT），接受了设定之后女主其实挺萌的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198009485246', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1455522337}
review:
This sure was a strange experience. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) 

The game itself is a very limited Visual Novel. There's only one path to take, you have no conversation options and it's basically just a pimped out graphic novel for you to click through. The story is a bit lackluster and "typical" as far as <insert yourself here> VN's go. 

Even after all these faults, why do I recommend this game? Because I learned a lot about the process and how this game came to be via the bonus content that you unlock after finishing the game and I have a lot of respect for the creator and how he handled his situation. This is basically a one-man-show and he created it in the shortest time period. Mad props.
Also: The art style resonates with me. It's creepy-adorable and I kind of want to see a full color graphic novel type manga from this creator. 

PS: I'm glad the creator specified in the bonus content that he has a fetish for feeding and scar touching. If you find those things a bit odd, some scenes might make you a bit uncomfortable. I got a bit weirded out but hey, who am I to judge. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

author: {'steamid': '76561198019433534', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1479998224}
review:
First thing's first this game needs a preface; "WARNING - May result in cardiac palpitation, do not play if you have a weak heart!"

That being out the way, this is an extremely charming little VN with some slightly unusual subject matter which sould be pretty obvious if you're looking at this. It's a short VN, one route, no choices, some neat extras, on paper nothing special. 
However with the rather unique subject matter of wooing a cyclops, some scenes that touch on some rather awkward subjects (nothing particularly explicit, violent or gruesome, just to put your mind at rest), the very fitting art style and instantly lovable heroine that you just wanna hug and protect and take home with you it all comes together as a very enjoyable read. 
It's a little bit on the short side, however it is well worth picking up if you're looking for some light romantic reading with a twist.

Again - Please consult your doctor before playing if you have a history of heart problems. May cause severe bouts of the HNNNGGGGGGGGGs. You have been warned.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044974782', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1451923162}
review:
このゲームおすすめはできませんが、おもしろくないという分けではありません。
ヒロインは魅力たっぷりなので単眼好きにはたまらないでしょう。(私がそうだ！)

ただ、ストーリー自体は一応完結するもののかなり中途半端な所で終わり、分岐等も全く無いため
2時間もかからずに全ての要素を閲覧できてしまい、ボリューム不足を強く感じました。

またヒロインは単眼ではあるものの、それが直接的にストーリーと関わっている部分が
思いのほか少なく、単眼である必要性をいまいち感じることができなかったのも残念な点でした。

正直なところ、980円での購入はよほどの単眼好きでないとおすすめできませんが、
セール中で半額ぐらいになっていれば(個人的に考える)適正価格に近くなりますので、
購入しても損はないと思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198064572896', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 185, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 185, 'last_played': 1453536844}
review:
A fantastic kinetic novel that really breaks the mold.

It was such a refreshing game! Everything I watch/play now with anime style has become so un-creative, pullling the same stock character types into the same scenarios and using the same jokes over and over. This game defies that trend, and is the first truly creative anime game I've played in a while. Not just because of the cyclops thing, but because the characters don't fall into the same personality tropes you see everywhere else. Really nice to see something unique again.

And yeah, the main girl is absolutely adorable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029554617', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1450824641}
review:
Even if you forgive the short length and lack of player choice, the writing does not do the game's premise and disturbing art style any justice.

It is as barebones "boy helps bullied girl gain confidence" story as you can get, with no interesting characters. Were you looking for a tearjerker? Something like Katawa Shoujo? Keep looking, you're not finding it here

author: {'steamid': '76561198025913007', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 132, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 214, 'last_played': 1452418260}
review: Love at First Sight is a short, cute visual novel.  I wouldn't put it in the category of "must read" by any means, but I enjoyed my time with it.  The behind the scenes material that unlocks after you beat the game indicates the author was rushed when making the game, and I think it shows.  It is a complete experience as is, but it really could have used more content.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976363039', 'num_games_owned': 221, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 278, 'last_played': 1453026061}
review:
Ich kann diese Visual Novel allen empfehlen, die eine wirklich schöne und manchmal traurige Liebesgeschichte lesen möchten.
Mich hat die Geschichte doch stark an die Hanako Route von Katawa Shoujo errinert und ich kann daher allen Katawa Shoujo Fans Love at First Sight wärmstens ans Herz legen.
Leider ist diese Novel etwas kurz geraten. Ich hätte gerne noch etwas mehr Zeit mit Sachi verbracht :-(
Schön ist, dass es nach dem Durchspielen noch ein paar Extras wie Hintergrundinfos und zusätzliche Szenen gibt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154545285', 'num_games_owned': 440, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 423, 'last_played': 1452955406}
review:
単眼少女に恋をするノベルゲーム。シナリオは2時間程度。

あらすじ：とある高校に転校してきた主人公、『福永護』がひょんなことから校内で噂されていた単眼少女『臼井幸』と出会い、その瞳に引きこまれていく。

内容
見てわかる通り単眼という割と特殊なジャンルなので好みは分かれるかも。
しかしヘビーなストーリーという訳でもないので、特に抵抗がなければ女の子のために頑張ってアプローチをする男子高校生とコンプレックスを抱える健気な女子高生のラブコメとして楽しめると思う。

見づらいけれど、既読スキップ・Autoモードは画面の左上にあるので

選択肢等のない一本道のストーリー。

英語版
http://azusantiara.com/2016/01/19/love-at-first-sight-review/

author: {'steamid': '76561198245825852', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 518, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 512, 'last_played': 1465114057}
review:
GOOD!! I'm not really good at english.So I use dictionary app many time while playing.
But I have a good time playing this game.

อะนะ จริงๆผมซื้อเกมนี้เพราะอยากจะหาเกมเนื้อหาภาษาอังกฤษมาฝึกภาษา แล้วถูกใจภาพนางเอกก็เลยซื้อ
และเกมนี้ไม่ทำให้ผิดหวังคร้บ เนื้อเรื่องสนุก เลยเปิดดิกฯแปลไปเล่นไปได้อย่างเพลิน

จะเห็นว่าแต่ละคนรีวิวไม่ค่อยพูดถึงเนื่อเรื่อง เพราะเนื้อเรื่องแต่ละจุดนี่อารมณ์ประมาณ "เอาจิงดิ" เกือบตลอด
การเปิดเผยเนื้อเรื่องแค่นิดหน่อยก็อาจจะทำให้เสียมู้ดในเกมได้ เพราะงั้นเชิญลองได้ครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198037003719', 'num_games_owned': 4057, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1452015073}
review:
《Love at First Sight》是一款日式視覺小說遊戲，也是由網路爆紅的情色遊戲《奴隷との生活》製作人Ray-K打造的校園戀愛喜劇，不過本作為全年齡向的作品，大家就不用對不存在的十八禁內容產生過多的期待。從遊戲大標題來看，大家一定可以理解到男女主角為何會成為戀人，正所謂一見鍾情（Love at First Sight）是真愛，轉學來到新環境不到兩個月的高中二年級生〝福永 護〞，因緣際會之下發現刻意躲在屋頂遠離人群的獨眼少女〝臼井 幸〞，為了協助封閉自我又疑似遭到同儕霸凌的獨眼少女，轉學生開始去認識與關懷對方，試圖幫助孤獨的少女回到人群，重拾幸福快樂的高校生活，不過始料未及的是，兩人萌生超越友誼的情感，成為甜死人不償命的熱戀情侶。


先從女主角的形象說起，〝臼井 幸〞擁有一顆充滿魅力的大眼球，玩家隱約能看到隱藏在破舊制服之下的皮肉傷，最後搭配小動物個性讓這名獨眼少女成為惹人憐愛的小兔子。如果大家先前有關注過製作人Ray-K早期作品就會發現他非常喜歡帶有殘疾屬性和心理病態的女性角色，如果要說《奴隷との生活》的女主角〝希爾薇〞是身體充滿傷疤且失去情感的欠損少女，那麼〝臼井 幸〞就是因長相與常人不同而遭到大眾排擠的怪胎，她就像是醜陋的鐘樓怪人，只能躲在無人知曉的地方等待真正理解自己的人出現。


接下來談談劇情，校園生活沒有甚麼比培養同儕關係來還得重要，因為長相被同學霸凌的〝臼井 幸〞成為了學校的幽靈學生，除了同班同學以外，其他班級的學生幾乎沒有真正看過她的廬山真面目，甚至就連師長都鮮少知道這名學生的存在。直到某日，轉學生〝福永 護〞在放學時間時聽到屋頂傳來微弱的少女哭泣聲，這才讓兩人相見，一開始全身滿佈傷痕的獨眼少女無法信任他人，直到她發現對方不是來者不善的惡人，這才逐漸打開心房，兩人雖然沒有直接說出口，但是心裡早已明白，對方就是命運中的另一半。


整體來說，本作雖然在故事展開上沒有太多亮點，劇情起伏平淡沒有明顯高潮起伏，就是一對笨蛋情侶在到處放閃搞曖昧，但是不得不說本作在登場人物立繪與角色性格描繪都令筆者感到非常驚艷，就連探討校園霸凌議題更是一針見血，現實生活中無時無刻正在發生校園霸凌，即便這幾年來政府不斷宣導反霸凌活動，霸凌案件非但沒有減少反倒是逐年增加，最糟糕的是學校為了保護校譽總是會要求媒體封鎖消息，甚至要被害人和加害者的雙方家長私下和解息事寧人，這些都是作為家長的人父人母不樂見的結果。總而言之，《Love at First Sight》不是一款感人到止不住淚水的悲劇作品，也不是賣弄女性肉體殺必死大放送的紳士作品，它是讓你發自內心想要疼愛飽受煎熬少女的真性情之作。


優點：
+畫風討喜，女主角惹人憐愛，淚汪汪的大眼睛超級可愛。
+英文翻譯字幕的文字用語簡單，大約是國中程度的英語程度。
+討論校園霸凌議題，批評人們只因為對方長相不同就欺壓他人。


缺點：
-故事敘述平淡，少了高潮起伏讓人想跳過一些無趣的劇情橋段。


結論：閃光彈等級Max，遊玩時請配戴墨鏡，可惜這些機會都不是屬於我的。


網誌圖文好讀版：
http://mgrim214.blogspot.tw/2016/01/love-at-first-sight.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198025124478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 211, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1451627754}
review:
노예와의 생활 -Teaching Feeling- (속칭 실비키우기) 로 유명세를 탄, 일러스트레이터 겸 게임 제작자의 전작이다.

개인제작자+시간에 쫓김의 결과인지 결과물의 플레이 타임이 괴멸적인 수준. 느긋하게 다 봤는데도 4시간 선에서 마무리가 된다.

그래도 이 작가 특유의 일러스트가 귀엽고, 스토리도 무난하게 오따쿠 미소가 지어질 정도는 된다. 브금은... 뭐...



실비키우기 때도 느꼈지만, 작가의 페티쉬가 아주 노골적으로 느껴진다. 

비정상적 상태인 (귀여운) 여주인공에 대한 부성애를 자극한다 해야 하나?

그나마 이 인간 픽시브 등이 일반인 출입금지 구역인걸 생각해보면, 일반인과의 타협을 위해 많이 참은게 느껴진다.


도전과제 난이도가 거의 없음 수준이므로, 도전과제덕후들에게도 추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056559386', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1451481135}
review:
打开门见到的是一个古怪的男人。
正在我感到疑惑时，古怪的男人突然张口讲道：“这款游戏并没有<<奴隶少女希尔薇>>好玩！”

author: {'steamid': '76561198154971709', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1451101708}
review:
Before i say anything, i'd like to say that Sachi (the cyloptic love interest of the story's protagonist) is just [b]adorable![/b] I don't care how creepy i'm gonna sound for saying that! While i was reading through this visual novel; i kept thinking, "aww, it's  just so damn cute and adorable"

In all seriousness though, if i had to use one word to summarize this visual novel, i'd call it cute. The artstyle is really nice and well done. The music is a bit meh but it does what it needs to do. Though there's nothing explicitly NSFW in the story, there are a few on the nose moments; it kinda makes the game feel more innocent and cute. 

Unfortunately the game is really short, about one to two hours, maybe three if you're a really slow reader or just admiring the art. Furthermore, the game feels rushed (what with its two month development period) and incomplete with lots of things being left out, it feels as if the game is like an unfinished canvas, it just needs a little more. The story is also pretty generic as well as being linear but that's a slight nitpick. 

Honestly i wouldn't suggest buying this game at full price but it's definitely a cute little love story to buy on discount. 
I really want a sequel!

author: {'steamid': '76561198082963736', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 133, 'last_played': 1451351171}
review: whilst this visual novel does contain alot of cutesy scenes and is pretty enjoyable, the length and pricing is just too much too recommend it. at best this is around 2 hours long, and whilst this is an enjoyable 2 hours there just isnt much there, and the pacing just feels off ever so slightly, as if the story itself is rushing to be over and done with. next theres the pricing, this just flat out isnt worth £7. now if the games on sale for 50% off then maybe, but for its full price no, you're better off buying undertale if you havent already. Whilst this is a pretty good visual novel, there's also some better stuff out there, such as katawa shoujo, which features 5 girls with 5 routes, has around 10 hours or so of story. and its freaking free. which just makes justifying buying love at first sight almost impossible. if you're a fan of visual novels and have some left over cash, wait for a sale and by this, overwise stay away.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970956242', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1527684283}
review:
Bahahaha, what is this? What am I playing?

Okay, so the writing in this is goddamned awful. Exceptionally clunky dialog and the protagonists "oh noes I have to protect the poor one eyed girl" is honestly a joke. Thank god I bought this with money from the steam trading market.

The art work too, I just… what are these expressions supposed to be telling me? I don't know, and I am not sure the artist did either.

I've been unnecessarily harsh on other VNs before, but man, this one takes the cake. this is a big fat solid "NO!" from me.

review: The art style really fits the tone of the story of the mc first meeting a monster girl. At first it seems like a dark and griddy or even creepy thing for as we are raised to thinks that monsters are freakish, but as the story progresses you see that it is actually the opposite and the art style starts to become less griddy and more lively. It's a nice little read all and all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091309142', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1451153710}
review:
海外の方には馴染みないかもしれませんが
日本でバカ売れした伝説のアダルトゲーム
『～奴隷との生活～ Teaching Feeling』
の作者がその前に制作した作品です

この作者の特徴として
【ヒロインは不幸な少女だが自分とその周りの人間は善意の塊の様な人々しか居ない】
と言うハートフルな世界観が特徴です！

今作はとてもハートフルなノベルで
一つ目の少女とそんな少女を厭わない優しい人々が
銃撃戦や悪行略奪や政治闘争や平和を護る事に疲れた貴方に素敵な時間を与えてくれるでしょう
(値段の割に内容物が少ないので上記に本当に疲れたと思った時に買うと良いでしょう)

ちなみに
トロコンが非常に簡単なのも魅力かもしれませんね！

author: {'steamid': '76561198239556700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 329, 'last_played': 1449803247}
review: This was a really cute and heartwarming story. Sachi is really adorable, and I really liked the efforts made by the other characters to help her gain friends and even a boyfriend. There were some pretty funny moments in the story that added to the warm feelings I got from playing it. The story seemed kind of short, and I thought the developer could've added some more plot events for the story to be longer and more complete. But what was in the visual novel was great. I do think, however, that the developer should create a sequel to this visual novel that depicts Sachi and the main character advancing in their relationship. Despite the short length of the novel, I do still recommend playing it if you're looking for a cute romance story.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990635634', 'num_games_owned': 468, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1474284787}

author: {'steamid': '76561198015197286', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1449519300}
review:
Просто изумительная визуальная новелла. Отличная история, милая главная героиня и приятный рисунок. Единственный минус - это короткая продолжительность. 
Игра хорошо воспринимается на английском языке. Руссификатора к сожалению нет, но не бойтесь играть на английском. Структура предложений не сложна и понятна. 
Всем ценителям жанра настоятельно рекомендую к ознакомлению. (10/10)

author: {'steamid': '76561198014973977', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 170, 'last_played': 1449476068}
review: Not really a game at all, as it has no interactivity like a traditional dating sim. It's just a pure visual novel. So just keep that in mind going into it - maybe grab it when it's on discount. It forgoes the usual tropes of these kind of games though, and favors story over blatant titilation; it is a very sweet story also and Sachi is just too adorable <3

author: {'steamid': '76561197994375379', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1448850591}
review:
Love at First Sight is a fun little story. It's not deep, but it has some amusingly self-aware fetishy moments (eyes, scars) and a neat concept for anyone who likes the whole moe monstergirl thing. Unfortunately, I'm not able to recommend it. After less than two hours of play, I'd seen every scene and acquired every achievement. There is no replay value, there are no alternate routes. There is no clever twist - every plot development is visible from a mile away, and there aren't very many of them to begin with. The characters are flat, one-note cliches, and the final conflict in the story consists of the antagonist (who has no motive) just... deciding to leave, forever. It's cute, sure, but it's also short and kind of boring.

At £6.99, I absolutely can't recommend it. I got it on sale, and I still don't feel like I really got value for money.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038266297', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1453315971}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999473643', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 309, 'last_played': 1448957957}
review:
Games not too bad. Worth picking up on sale.

Went into this game thinking it was like katawa shoujo meets monster girls. You can tell that the developer was kinda rushed on the game, because there really isnt much to the story. Unfortunately theres only one path but who really cares, you're playing the game for the cyclops girl. My only other complaint is with the limited amount of character portraits for everyone else, but then again you bought this game for the cyclops girl.

If you want a short yet different VN that you can play between other games pick this one up. If you want a VN that has a long well thought out story with multiple endings, save your money for Clannad.

review:
A short 2~ hour story about a cute cyclops girl. The characters are pretty endearing, which is pretty important for a VN. Main character comes off slightly.. zealous at times and this game is sorta a lowkey awakening to a scar kink.

The auhor himself noted that he felt that in certain parts it's rushed with lack of art because they DID rush this out for a deadline, but what's here is definitely quality and will look forward to any future works

author: {'steamid': '76561198041911206', 'num_games_owned': 1262, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 383, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 383, 'last_played': 1448718219}
review:
very cutsey game with more or less believable characters. took me a few hours to finish the entire thing but then again i'm not a fast reader so some might finish it faster. the music is great as well, very relaxing and perfect if you're just looking to read something and wind down. 

another good thing was that there was character development on both ends. even you as the hero who normally is a bit stale in these kind of stories does have some development.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057152364', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 359, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1448776031}
review:
Despite the time-limited development of 2 months of serious work, and the 2-man dev team of Ray-Kbys and kyou1110 (kyou helping with most of the music, Ray-K doing everything else), this visual novel manages to produce a touching-yet-refreshing story, with a cast of 6 underused-stereotype characters and more than decent writing in plot and character development. As a personal fan of Ray-Kbys' artwork, this piece displays some of his most inspired 2-D animations, which are short, but are used to astounding effect. This being a fairly short piece (I finished all content within 5 hours), hearing that this may have been a full-blown dating sim game with a branching story (if Ray-K hadn't procrastinated until 2 moths before) raises my hopes that Ray-Kbys may try his more determined hand at a full-blown dating sim one day.

I highly recommend this game to anyone who likes vanilla romance visual novels, people who like cute anime games, people who like unique artwork, people who are into injury/cyclops girls/sickeningly sweet romance fetishes, and just people with good humor, as this VN displays all these qualities and more. Just enough character development is placed into the story to entice veteran 2D romance enthusiasts and critics of the genre alike. As an added benefit, the cards for this game sell for nearly as much as the game itself on 50% off atm, assuming you don't wish to collect them for the rare adorable-cyclops-girl Steam backgrounds, so buy away!

Well worth $5, still worth $10 for VN enthusiasts. You're supporting an excellent and unique artist, after all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105623476', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 501, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1479888400}
review:
A sweet romance story that was both funny and sad with a consistent pace and tone.
I will admit that it was short and some of the characters weren't fleshed out as much as I hoped they would but after reading the history of this game, the creator appeared to have a limited time frame to work on it. Despite that, it is still worth reading if you enjoy romance stories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198168320690', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 322, 'last_played': 1447642826}
review: Strongly recommend this. Short. simple and sweet. Love at First Sight is, as you all know, about a girl with one eye and an average student who fall in love. Music is pretty average, but if you take the time to go through the extras you'll know why, this game was made in under two months, which makes me love it even more actually. Art style is absolutely amazing, fell in love with it at first sight, heh. The story itself is also very well written, it feels rushed at times, and I wish I could've seen more of Mayumi-chan and Rui, but I guess that's what happens when you have a very short time limit for making a VN. I give Love at First Sight a 9/10. If you have $10 laying around and want to read a heart warming, cute story, you cannot go wrong with this. A must buy for anyone that like VNs.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002520406', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1527250883}

author: {'steamid': '76561197993468742', 'num_games_owned': 268, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1446983482}
review:
一款甜甜的校園戀愛故事，女主角慢慢向男主角展開心胸的過程，不由得讓人嘴角一彎微笑。就像是在看一隻因人類受傷的小狗，遇到一位仁慈的主人，重新建立起信心和信賴關係一樣，非常令人憐愛。

缺點是因為作者時間關係，劇情後期轉得太快，一下就收尾了讓人覺得很可惜。欺負人的金髮假不良感覺有一段故事，本來還希望她跟女主角合好變好朋友的……

author: {'steamid': '76561198036316241', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 292, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1457016623}
review:
두 눈이 멀쩡한 것 빼곤 딱히 생김새가 나아보이지 않는 주변인들에게 박해를 받던 우스이 사치라는 이름의 외눈박이 여학생과 인연 및 사랑을 맺는다는 스토리의 비쥬얼 노벨 Love at First Sight (한 눈에 반했어)입니다.

비록 여주인공의 일반적이지 않은 외관에 볼쾌한 골짜기가 형성이 될 수 있지만 단지 구멍 하나만 없다는 것이 다를 뿐 우스이 사치도 우리처럼 똑같은 감정을 가지고 있으며 우리와 마찬가지로 죽창에 한방 맞으면 사망하게 되는 같은 인간이기에 외모가 다르다는 사소한 차이만 극복할 경우 여타 다른 사랑 이야기처럼 순수한 사랑을 나누는 체험을 할 수가 있다고 생각됩니다.

다만 이 게임을 플레이하다가 중요한 장면에서 어머니가 제 방으로 들어오셨는데 역시 아무래도 어머니께 이런 게임을 한다는 걸 들키면 안 될 듯 해서 급한 마음에 우에하라 아이가 등장하는 AV를(AUKG-174) 화면에 띄웠고 다행히 어머님은 평소의 저인줄 알고 별 말씀을 안하시고 가서 위기를 모면했는데

이처럼 안타깝게도 지금의 사회는 외눈박이 여성을 수용하는 단계까지는 되지 않았기 때문에 이 게임을 플레이하려는 분들은 저처럼 만일의 상황을 대비해서 AV 영상을 트레이 상태로 설정해놓은 후 플레이하시길 바랍니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016684171', 'num_games_owned': 676, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 207, 'last_played': 1561698182}
review:
When you look past the strange heroine, [i]Love at First Sight[/i] is a pretty straightforward high school romance VN. There's no ero in the game itself, but it has a few ero-guro undertones that might be off-putting for some. Even so, there's a certain soft grace to it all; Ray-K's painterly style brings warmth and tenderness to every scene, catching the restrained giddiness of young love in a way that might be lost with cleaner, flatter designs. It is, in a word, comfy.

The characters are likeable, for the most part, with Sachi standing head and shoulders over any run-of-the-mill moeblob love interest. She invites sympathy and the urge to protect, but her vulnerability never really grates. The music doesn't stand out by any means, but its gentleness supports the cozy atmosphere well.

There is very little beyond the story's single path, unfortunately — about two hours of content in all. Even the most casual reader will chew through it quickly, and depending on their tastes, they'll probably be left wanting more. It's perhaps not enough to warrant the full $10. But if it's on sale and you have five bucks to spare, time spent on crisp autumn back-streets with a cute cyclops girl is time well invested.

Admittedly, I might be biased here; that wide, bottomless eye will ease open your chest and grope the scars. But isn't that the point?

Pick this up if you enjoy cutely macabre aesthetics, monster girls, romance, and if you see it on sale.

---
+ Cute monster girl heroine
+ Cozy autumn setting
+ Warm, comfy art style
+ The extra features serve as a fun little epilogue and development backstory
+ When you're done with the story and extras, check the creator's Pixiv for a bit more

- Only one story path
- That one path is a little bare-bones and straightforward
- At 2-3 hours, the VN is extremely short — perhaps too short to justify a $10 price tag

author: {'steamid': '76561198004018408', 'num_games_owned': 685, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 328, 'last_played': 1616412221}
review:
[h1] Кто сказал бы мне, что я буду в это играть хоть пару лет назад - я бы не поверил [/h1]

Хочется начать с упоминания того, насколько же сама игра похожа на главную героиню - робкая, боязливая, боясщаяся внимания. Игра была сделана всего за два месяца фактически одним человеком (помощь была оказана лишь при написании фоновой музыки), и получилась довльно греющая сердце история. В ней нет ни развилок, ведущих к разным концовкам, ни секретных персонажей, ни разношёрстных знойных девиц. Из этой игры вполне можно было бы сделать мангу, но, как сказал сам автор, слишком много мороки с редакцией и прочей оффициальной волокитой. [b] Но что же на счёт самой игры? стоит ли она того? [/b].

[h1] Да, она того стоит. [/h1]

Нам рассказывают историю о странной девочке, плачущей на ступенях лестницы, ведущей на крышу. Заурядно? Скорее всего, если бы не одно [u] но[/u]. И от чего-то это кажется шокирующим по началу, и столь обыденным спустя некоторое время. Но ведь ты не хочешь обидеть милашку тыча в неё своим пальцем? Конечно же нет. Вот и наш протоганист не хочет. Более того, он хочет подружиться с ней. Всё ещё заурядно? Какие мы придирчивые. Рисовка выглядит не слишком ярко, но и не блёкло - как раз для истории вроде этой, фоновая музыка прекрасная, диалоги и стиль повествования очень и очень хороши.
И потом... Зачем ты всё ещё это читаешь? Неужели ты всё ещё не [b] влюбился в эту милашку с первого взгляда? [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197992717766', 'num_games_owned': 803, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1581511125}

author: {'steamid': '76561198002588282', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1677719686}
review:
"Love at First Sight" is a great feel good game. The characters are well crafted and the dialogue is expertly written. I greatly enjoyed this game and definitely will rewatch it whenever I need a pick-me-up.

My only complaint it takes about an hour to finish the game; however, it leaves one wanting more. While I do not see a sequel being possible; I would love to see another story/game be made with this unique perspective.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979724838', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 376, 'playtime_forever': 230, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1446444347}
review:
A pretty basic short story of boy meets cyclops, boy falls in love with cyclops. No branching paths, and by the author's own admission was kind of a rushed project that might've been better suited to a manga release. I have to give it some serious credit, though, for actually being a visual novel that's about story rather than baps, comically revealing swimsuits, and H-scenes that otaku of all ages will scream at Steam for censoring.

Music is at best unremarkable and at worst gratingly repetitive, the dialogue is extremely redundant at times, story is quite short, and the whole DO YOU WANT TO TOUCH MY SCAARRRS thing that keeps coming up is, even if self-aware, somewhat unsettling. That said, worth a lark on sale if you want to hear the story of the cute cyclops girl.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028066044', 'num_games_owned': 907, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1446443454}
review:
I really love this game and not because its  a visual novel dating sim, but because it does something out of the ordinary that most visual novels stay away from and have a "Monster girl" genre. Its a nice change from the usual dating a childhood friend, school friend, senpai or a workmate and has you dating a Adorable girl by the name of Sachi Usui who was born with only one eye. 

Most Dating sim visual novels dont have monsters girls in them, i do know visual novels that do have them but this visual novel wouldn't be considered a "Monster girl" dating sim because the Sachi is anything but a monster. Just a misunderstood girl who was bullied all the way through school because of her eye, and this really hits home on a personal level for me (not the eye thing) and made me grow to like Sachi even more. I wont ruin the story in this review/reccomendation but if you are looking for a Visual novel dating sim with nice artwork, lovely soundtrack and a very adorable love interest you should definately buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149781549', 'num_games_owned': 214, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1048, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 994, 'last_played': 1448465517}
review:
劇情是描述我們的主角(福永 護)，在偶然的機緣下，巧遇了全身是傷，躲起來偷偷哭泣的女主角(臼井 幸)
為了能和她成為朋友，也為了能夠幫助她，所發展出來的一段愛情故事。

在遊玩的過程中，會出現刺眼程度不同的閃光劇情，至於最讓人無法直視的地方是哪裡，就請玩家自行體會吧。

[h1] 優點[/h1]

遊戲的畫風相當的獨特、精美，讓女主角最有魅力的部位(眼睛)，充份展現出它的魅力所在。

而在過場動畫中，更是將這項特點充份發揮。
自己會不自覺的將注意力不斷地放在女主角的眼睛上。
[spoiler] 而個人覺得，裡面的每一張CG圖都很有收藏的價值。[/spoiler]

隨著玩家看到劇情的後面，會出現關於Love at First Sight的幕後花絮。
玩家可以透過幕後花絮，更加瞭解有關於Love at First Sight的資訊。

[h1] 缺點[/h1]

遊戲裡面只有英文及日文，且人物沒有配音，對於外語可能不太好的玩家，可能在觀看劇情時，會比較吃虧一點。

除了卡片上的CG圖，遊戲裡大部份的CG圖，都只有女主角(幸)，其他人物並沒有CG圖。

[spoiler] Love at First Sight的卡片，上面有著在遊戲裡沒有的CG圖。
如果玩家想要看到更多不同樣子的幸，可以考慮收集卡片。	[/spoiler]

[h1] 總結[/h1]

整體來說，以10美金購買這款遊戲....我覺得有點不划算。

不過，如果你覺得有著清澈透亮的眼睛的人外少女，正是你所追求的話...
那我非常推薦你，一同觀看這段清澀的愛情故事。

author: {'steamid': '76561198001482341', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1603413454}
review:
Love at First Sight is a simple romance visual novel, and its a very adorable one at that. While it may not have the action, cast, or production budget of bigger name VNs, I actually prefer small and simple ones like this. The whole thing is over in about two to three hours, but it manages to tell its story well enough.
Starting with the positives of the game, the between-chapter animations are adorable. The very first time I saw one I let out an audible squeal that I am not ashamed of. Theyre simple but well executed in ways that will make your heart melt. Continuing with the uguu-train, Sachi herself is a very adorable love interest and easily one of my favorites, even out of bigger name VNs that Ive played. Although her character isnt anything new, the person who made the game knew what they were doing and how to use Sachi for maximum effectiveness. I would take one Sachi over a hundred Sakura Matous any day. 
The supporting cast of the VN is also very enjoyable, however scarse they are. There is only six named characters in the entire VN, and while that is a disappointing thing, the cahracters are all likeable enough that you wont even care. Akemi and her explosively cheerful attitude and Tomo's indifference play off of each other like poetry, and I really enjoy seeing characters like them. As stated before, Sachi is one of my favorite VN characters. She makes my heart sing. The main character, Mamoru is bland as white bread, but that is of course to be expected of a VN protag so that the reader can realte more. If he went around kicking puppies, then I dont think many people could relate.
Unfortunately after the good must come the bad, and Ill start with the worst offender that youll be dealing with the whole game: The music is terrible. It sounds like a cheap MIDI on a fifteen second loop. I understand that the game was made by a single person, and I understand that you might not be an author AND a composer, but its still a negative.
The plot is a standard VN highschool plot: Boy transfers in, boy has small or nonexistant group of friends, finds outcast girl, helps her come out of her shell, kiss kiss fall in love, and then help her overcome her main issue in the story. If youre expecting twists and turns, then you are a fool. While the plot and character archetypes are all very known by this point, I do have to mention that they are all well done, especially for how long the VN is.
For the praise I gave Akemi earlier, I must tack on some sins as well. The game doesnt allow her to be as expressive as she is due to the limited facial expressions and poses that it provides. This doesnt detract from her character of my enjoyment of the VN, but it does leave me wanting more out of her that I will be unable to have.
Now we have to get to the elephant in the room: Why does Sachi have two tear ducts when she only has one eye? Huh? Seriously though, the elephant is the scar scenes. I had no idea I was into that kinda thing, but it's said you get a new fetish everyday, right? While the "normal and well adjusted" people playing this will inevitably be very weirded out, I welcome the scar scenes for all they are, and enjoyed them. I didnt see it as Mamoru just being a creeper, but instead as a show that Sachi trusts him enough to let him touch her in places she's been hurt at. That being said, the fact that Mamoru himself points out to the reader how strange it is to be doing it does not actually make it any less strange. In fact, shining a light on it like that only brings more attention to it, as opposed to letting the scenes flow natually as they should.
Overall Id say this visual novel is fairly high on my list, as I enjoyed it immensely. It may just be my love of monster girls and apparently scars talking, but I give this game a very deserved 8.5/10. Id highly recommend this game. I look forward to seeing more of this creator's work in the future and wish the best for him.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098123538', 'num_games_owned': 159, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1443118474}
review:
To typowa gra-opowieść. Zero wyborów, po prostu przewija sie kolejne sceny. Ma jednak parę zalet:
- historia. Prosta do bólu, jednak czasami takich potrzeba żeby się oderwać od ratowania smoków i gwałcenia księżniczek.
- grafika. Trochę "horrorowa", ale na szczęście użyto sporo ciepłych kolorów co łagodzi wrażenie. Pasuje do historii i głównej bohaterki.

Minusy:
- muzyka. W sumie to raczej melodyjki MIDI. Nie, żeby były złe, ale dobra muzyka znacznie poprawiła by odbiór histori. Taka jaka jest to równie dobrze mogłoby jej nie być.
- historia mogłaby być trochę bardziej rozbudowana.

author: {'steamid': '76561198188748931', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1467464220}
review:
没想到还能在Steam上看到这款游戏，必定是要买来支持的。
虽然单线而且流程很短，但真的十分精致，立绘、CG、背景以及每章节的过场动画都恰到好处，除去部分日式表达，英文版的行文也比较流畅，人物的性格塑造与内心活动的描写也让人很有代入感。
美中不足的是BGM着实有点猎奇了，后记上作者说除了BGM以外都是他本人做的，恐怕跟这有一定关系吧。
整个故事的氛围就是温暖人心的，尽管说幸薄还有牵扯到校园欺凌的问题，但登场角色都在积极地面对并与伙伴们试图解决这些事情，使得这些设定并没有把整个故事搞得非常灰暗。尽管画风也不像个王道纯爱的画风，但这作毫无疑问是在讲一个很治愈的校园纯爱故事，投入进去后就会发现女主角不管有几只眼睛都无所谓了……
可惜还是短了点啊，感觉一些线索都没走完的……

author: {'steamid': '76561198123447378', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 273, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 273, 'last_played': 1438418177}
review:
A really cute VN about a cyclops girl. That's about it really.
There's only one path, and no choices, so some players might find it pretty lacking. The story is also pretty short. Personally, I thought the art was great, and the characters were really cute. It's definitely worth the time if you have the patience. If you're the kind of person who wants the most for their money, maybe wait until it's on sale. Other than that, no visual novel collection is complete without this adorable addition!

author: {'steamid': '76561198052251624', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 271, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 271, 'last_played': 1440723972}
review: Love at First Sight is a lovely little static visual novel. The story is cute, the art is very well done,  and is generally all around good. As stated in the afterword of the game, it gives off a bit of a rushed feel towards the end. If anything, buy this game to support the artist and developer so he can make more cute games in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019153071', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1440530719}
review:
Love at First Sight is a Romance Visual Novel. It had a development time of 2 months and it clearly shows.

Starting with the positive, the art style is very charming and I loved the design of all the characters. The visuals work very well in favour of the slightly dark yet mostly heart-warming story.

The music is fine, Nothing outstanding in terms of a VN. I wasn't bothered by it and really enjoyed a couple of them despite their short looping time. There isn't much else in terms of sound though, and there is no voice acting.

In terms of the story the primary flaw would have to be the length. Easily the most common complaint at this point. I finished one playthrough on a leisurely pace in 1 hours and 30 minutes. $10 for less than 2 hours of playtime is undeniably a steep price. Other than that, the conflict of the story resolves itself very abruptly. Everything just feels rushed. (Which as the Author has stated, it was)

Personally I enjoyed the experience but I just cannot recommend buying it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198075849256', 'num_games_owned': 284, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 607, 'last_played': 1440200434}

author: {'steamid': '76561198117811581', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 135, 'last_played': 1440245285}
review:
Love at First Sight is a definite must have - doubly so if it is on sale. While the story itself is fairly generic, that is hardly the point of the game. The game is about Sachi growing and finding happiness, which is handled absurdly well. The supporting characters are well done as well. They actually felt like living, breathing people as opposed to the common Mary Sue. 
The game is short, I'm not going to lie about that, but there is not a problem with a short game; problems arise with poor pacing, which usually goes hand in hand with short length. That is not the case with L@FS, while the game only took me two hours to complete, the pacing was impeccable. While I would love it to be longer, thats not really an issue with the game but more that Sachi is really cute and I didn't want it to end.
Seriously, the pacing is good enough that they could extrapolate a 6 or so episode OVA.
The extras were fun as well, with I believe 4 additional scenes available that gives a nice epilogue to the characters and an afterward by the author. 
Seriously if there is one thing I will say about this game is that it has staying power. You might play it once, possibly twice, and it is short, but in that short time cements Sachi in the reader's hearts.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011429592', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1441168964}
review: A great visual novel with turly enjoyable characters. The story is well paced and you can easily relate to the chracters emotions. I'm so happy to have got this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029646472', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 309, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 168, 'last_played': 1451185927}
review:
I first became interested in this game because of its somewhat unique visual style and I thought the love interest was cute. When I first started I was worried that it would be a story that was really focused on pity as the foundation of a relationship, but I was very pleasantly surprised with what it turned out to be. It was a very beautiful story and it gives me hope.
It is a straight up visual novel with no dialogue branches, which I don't mind. However, it has multiple shifts in perspective, which I really, really enjoyed and gave the game a little more depth. If you think that it looks interesting at all, go for it. You won't be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024707099', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 459, 'last_played': 1440026960}
review:
I'm not really understanding all the negative comments about the price point for this game.  I spend $10 on a volume of manga and get about the same amount of content as this game gave me; except this game was one complete package with a cute, although rushed, ending and little animation scenes that almost gave me a heart attack from diabetic shock.  Anyways.  Actual review.

As I said above, the novel is a complete package, although it does feel a bit rushed (which the author recognized and apologized for).  However, it is a very sweet and cute story about love between two very different people (except for their seemingly shared scar fetish... still don't get that).  It sadly doesn't touch on the WHYS or HOWS of Sachi's existence as a monoeye, mainly focusing on their relationship and the drama she faces in school from being bullied and at home.  But she's such a cute and endearing character that you don't even really mind that.  All in all, I think it's worth the $10 I spent on it, and I'm hoping that the author revists this character and this world that he's built for more novels, hopefully improving or re-releasing this game with more content, new routes, etc.

Please note, to fully appreciate the game.. you probably need to already have some sort of positive bias for anime waifus and monstergirls in general.  'Course.. if you're actually looking at this game in the store.. you probably do already, haha.

11/10, would feed omelettes again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032041583', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1439970234}

review: Pretty short game(Beat in about 90 minutes of reading the text at a normal pace[boy was this an intreseting 1am]). It gave me feels though so I'd say pick it up during a sale.Thoygh if you really dig monster girls and feel good stories pick it up for 10$.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026880255', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 630, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 623, 'last_played': 1570735407}
review:
Love at First Sight is a very simple, yet very well done Kinetic Novel (Visual Novel without choices, straight line from beginning to end). It has a warm atmosphere that grows warmer with each chapter. If you've played Yume Miru Kusuri you will know what I am talking about, and if you liked that one I recommend this to you as they are similar. 
The game is very short and the topic and style at hand aren't exactly meant for the starter/regular player. If you have more experience with Visual Novels this might be a great experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087927384', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 1240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 261, 'last_played': 1659301527}
review:
A wonderful visual novel with a story that seems the same old romance plot but it will capture you thanks to a very well done artwork and surprisingly good characters. Unfortunately it will end too soon leaving you wishing for more, especially after the funny extras!
The price is not so nice compared to the playtime, but a movie dvd costs often more and is shorter so buy it if you like the genre because it’s really worth the price.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Una bellissima visual novel con una storia che sembra la solita banale romance ma saprà coinvolgervi grazie ad un artwork ben fatto e a dei personaggi incredibilmente ben sviluppati. Purtroppo finirà molto presto lasciandovi crudelmente a volerne ancora, soprattutto dopo gli spassosi extra finali!
Il prezzo non aiuta l'acquisto vista la scarsa longevità, ma alla fine un dvd di un film costa di più e dura di meno quindi compratelo se siete degli amanti del genere perché saranno soldi ben spesi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027965701', 'num_games_owned': 840, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 596, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 342, 'last_played': 1453055288}
review:
Ich hatte am Anfang ein paar bedenken. Vom Setting, vom Aufbau und der Story an sich. Nach etwas längerer Zeit nach dem kauf hab ich mich dann endlich durchgerungen es zu spielen.

Der Zeichenstil ist mal was anderes. Etwas rustikaler aber dennoch sehr schön anzusehen. Das Charakter Design ist etwas... Klischeehaft aber nicht zu überzogen! Und somit kein Moment an nervig. Die Story ist... sagen wir vorhersehbar aber auch kein Stück langweilig. Die zwischenmomente zwischen den beiden (Sachi und dem Protagonisten) ist sehr süß und verdammt romantisch. Vom kennenlernen bis zum ersten Kuss. Einfach unglaublich süß die beiden... und ich sag das als Kerl :D

Wie dem auch sei... ich kann das Spiel jedem nur empfehlen. Es ist ein sehr schönes, zwar lineares, VN aber dennoch sein Geld wert! Würde mir mehr solcher settings wünschen!

Okey, primero lo primero, vez esas horas jugadas, eso es lo MAXIMO que dura la historia, no hay otras rutas, no hay otros finales, esta la historia y se acaba, es un juego corto.

Dicho eso, la historia es descente (nada increible), el juego no tiene errores, el arte es unica, en fin, es un buen juego, es una historia descente pero compralo en rebaja o algo, mi recomendacion es que no gastes en esto mas de lo que gastarias en un comic o un librito chico porque eso es mas o menos lo que va a durar.

review:
A good 5 hour distraction of a game. It feels rather bare-boned in terms of the illustrations for each character and you may find yourself wanting to mute the music which is inoffensive, but amateurish. 

However, Sachi the one-eyed girl in the game, is likable. The two friends of the protagonist are also surprisingly well drawn out.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985926092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1220, 'last_played': 1435946200}
review:
Let's get this out of the way: Yeah, it's pretty short. Everyone's touched upon that. I'm sure Ray-K feels that it should be longer, too, but as he lays out in the afterword, he gave himself too short of a deadline. Having to make almost every aspect of the game himself, from the story to the art to some of the music, it fell short of his own expectations. Honestly, even I was a little disappointed by the way the story abruptly ends without resolving some important and interesting plot threads, but after reading the included words from the creator, I felt a little more sympathetic. 

However, even if it's a little stunted, it's extremely charming. I don't remember the last time a VN like this has made me go "HHHNNNNGGGGGGHHH!!!!" over a character so many times. Sachi is unbelievably cute, with irresistably sweet moe elements slathered on so heavily I think I almost went into cardiac arrest. The protagonist's name is 'Mamoru,' or 'to protect,' and you'll almost certainly end up following that sentiment. Once I learned about Sachi's problems, I immediately had a burning passion to protect her and make things better for her. She's mind-bendingly cute. I don't know how she [i]wouldn't[/i] melt the ice around your heart. The artist clearly has a deep passion for her, and it shows; the romance with her has a lot of impact. Others have mentioned that her one-eyedness isn't 'utilized' enough, and she could easily have any other disorder; however, I feel like not focusing [i]too[/i] much on her specific disorder made the romance feel less directly fetishistic, which worked out well. 

Other than the heart-explodingly adorable heroine, the art is very charming and somehow satisfying to look at. The story is a little simple, but it's very sweet, a heartwarming sort of tale with a few little surprises and victories to keep you going. I found the banter between Tomo, Akemi and Mamoru to be a little tiring sometimes; as much as I liked the three of them, they kept going through the same tired routine of chastising Akemi for being too energetic over and over again, and their banter felt a little hackneyed. Still, they were charming, too, and it all left a good impression.

There's an antagonist character, and I won't give too much away, but you'll absolutely hate her at first. Then there's a section which might change your mind a little, and then just when it seems we'll get some character development... the game just ends. It ends on a much-anticipated scene, too, so again, I can't say the ending wasn't a letdown, but the rest of the game makes up for it. 

What else? Well, there's not much else to it. The music is a little discordant at times, but not unpleasant, easy enough to listen to. The backgrounds are all nicely drawn, there's some nice little animations in between the chapters, and the cute bandage-themed UI really adds to the game's charm. There are some surprising moments of fetish play related to stroking Sachi's scars, but it actually turns out to be pretty cute, and the game never veers too much into indecent territory to ruin its sweetness. While the protagonist was a little generic, I really appreciated that he wasn't creepy or perverted like most VN protagonists. He had a sincere desire to protect Sachi, and it was easy to empathize with him. 

So, overall, it's a short story and it could use a little more fleshing out, but I certainly don't regret the purchase. It's totally bursting with charm, and will definitely lighten your mood. I'd love to see Ray-K try his hand at a longer work without so much deadline pressure, and I would absolutely adore seeing more of Sachi in general. I highly recommend this game if you need a sweet, heartwarming pick-me-up; a good, old-fashioned heaping helping of soul-cleansing moe, with just enough of a macabre twist to give it a unique charm. That gleaming eye will definitely stick in my memory for a long time to come.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130308348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 331, 'last_played': 1435021822}
review:
元はピクシブで絵として書いていたものをゲームとして作者が起こしたノベルゲーになります
単眼娘+傷というなかなかニッチな層に受けそうなゲームになっています
ゲーム自体は選択肢なしの紙芝居的ノベルになります
独特なヒロイン、独特なイラスト、少し不協和音交じりの音楽
これらがマッチして世界観が綺麗にまとまっています
作者の話によるとこれでもだいぶ削ったらしいんですけどね

ヒロインが傷だらけなので「バイオレンスな描写が多いノベルはちょっと・・・」とか思ってる人でも大丈夫です
作中ではほぼそういった痛々しい描写は出てきません
それどころか世界観は暗めで統一されているのに中身は優しい世界です、いじめっ子が一人居るだけですかね
エクストラにてキャラそれぞれの後日談が語られるのも個人的には◎
実績がプレイするだけで一通り揃うのも積みゲーマーにはうれしいですね
隠し実績も複数個あるので探してみてください、
ちなみに自分は１つがどうしても分かりませんでした

悪いところを上げるとすればメッセージ送りのタイミングというか暗転後クリックしないと場面転換しない
ボイスが無い
ってくらいですかね、暗転したまま画面を眺めて待ってることがちょくちょくありました
とは言っても自分がノベルゲー慣れてないからってだけかもしれないですがね

何にしても文句なしで自分はおすすめします
ノベルゲーなのに一通りまた読みたいと思ったのは初かもしれない
余りの楽しさにわざわざ作者を探し回って直接お礼を言いに言ったくらいですｗ
その時嬉しいことを教えてもらいました、なんと現在続編の作成中とのことらしいです
完成は未定ですが一ファンとしてのんびり待ちたいと思います
不思議だけど優しい世界の「一目惚れ」の世界を皆さんも体験してみてください




単眼娘可愛いよ単眼娘、伏し目がちなのも上目遣いもﾊﾞｯﾁｸﾞｰ（死語）

author: {'steamid': '76561198052784971', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1434969727}

author: {'steamid': '76561198065455947', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 297, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 297, 'last_played': 1434975029}
review:
This is Italian review. Sorry, I don't think I have the ability to write a english review.

-

Per alcune persone il concetto di 'acquisto una Visual Novel di due ore per 10 dollari/Euro' è troppo da gestire.
Per essere stato creato in un periodo così limitato, Love at First Sight certamente offre opere d'arte di qualità, scrittura, e una colonna sonora adeguata.
Lo stile artistico riesce a torcere molte Novel in stile anime, in qualcosa di un po più 'scuro' e tetro come ambientazione. 
Inoltre, è stata assolutamente una prodezza trasformare una 'ragazza liceale ciclope' in un personaggio adorabile il cui l'occhio risulta essere il punto focale della storia. 
C'è una manciata di CG esclusivamente di Sachi, e anche un paio di brevi sequenze animate tra gli atti. 
In tutto, è sorprendente vedere la quantità di sforzo della casa di creare una Novel che, a primo impatto, ti farà pensare al fatto che sul mercato ce ne siano di migliori, ma se vi capita uno sconto a 5€ o anche meno, questa Novel potrà farvi compagnia per un pomeriggio.


PRO
- Trama e disegni abbastanza singolari.
- Comparto sonoro eccellente.

CONTRO
- Longevità.
- Mancanza di decisioni.

Voto: 7.5/10

Link alla recensione: http://www.phgtech.it/2015/06/love-at-first-sight-recensione.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198038742118', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 215, 'last_played': 1434924564}

author: {'steamid': '76561197990667086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1438467798}
review: A good, short Visual Novel. No choices while you go through it, but still a touching story. The characters were adorable as well. The one thing that I wish had been played more into would have been the whole eye-situation. As another reviewer mentioned, it could have been replaced with any other disability. That being said, for what it is and the amount of time the creator had to put it together, I think it was well done. And if the creator happens to read this, here's to maybe seeing another game like you mentioned in the Afterword.

author: {'steamid': '76561198200269831', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 523, 'last_played': 1445293262}
review: Now then! I have seen too much picks from this VN in different places into web and I was really happy when someone told me that it is a GAME. I really like artist's style and characters design at all! I have read one or two negative reviews and they was about story in this novel is very boring and typical. So I can't say, that it isn't an ordinary school drama, but I think that its a really kind and kyuute story with simple, maar  deep and pleasant chars. All their emotions and feels described very clear and accurate. All of characters feelings are realistic and time to time playing this game I felt like WHOA, I CAN UNDERSTAND IT, I HAVE FELT IT! So in mah opinion it's really cool! Talking about the music I can say that it isn't genre I like, because it is a justice MIDI-compositions, but, after all, they aren't bad. It is only one thing in the game I was really disappointed: THE RUI'S STORYLINE. It's just unfinished. Maybe I have a mistaken opinion, but I really don't feel depth of this part of story. As for me Rui is  a sophomoric detail that was made to complete Sachi's shape. Despite this fact the game is a good one and I recommend it for playing. I hope mah review can be useful.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010177568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 175, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1434238299}
review:
Nah, it's just another stupid romance VN that uses cookie cutter insertprefixhere-dere traits to sucker you into thinking it's good because the girl is cute. Her being a cyclops isn't an interesting twist, it can be exchanged with any disability and used as plot device to move the story, in this case bullying. I don't care. I've seen it before and I know where it's going without having to finish it.

I have higher standards than that

One out of five Lennys

author: {'steamid': '76561198015171654', 'num_games_owned': 1083, 'num_reviews': 308, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1434111729}
review:
I just got done playing through all of this game and I just have to say...


OMYK! THAT WAS SO CUTE! OMYKOMYKOMYKOMYK *SQUEE* 

I kind've want to be a one eyed girl now and find my sweet, sweet, desu love, love time in real life! 

Ok. So you don't REALLY play this game. It's a VN through and through so you mostly click to unfold more of the story but with a cute story like this, WORTH THE SOLID 3 HOURS! It's definitely on the lighter side as far as stories go but don't mistake that for lacking depth. The characters are well developed. Even the really side characters. The story felt really complete and leaves you wanting more. I do hope there will be a sequel. And I do have to mention that music was was great and added the perfect atmosphere. I'm glad there is an "extras" tab where I can listen to the songs as well as see the history behind this game as well as other fun tidbits.

Oh. SPOILER ALERT! To those trying to find one of the hidden achievements, specifically Namako Found, click on the gallery. When you see the bar at the bottom of the screen, move your mouse to the far right and FA will pop up. Click it and BAM! You are welcome. 

So what are you waiting for? BUY THIS GAME ALREADY! :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198216407052', 'num_games_owned': 120, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 477, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1658757447}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197995966568', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 167, 'last_played': 1464140902}
review:
I first saw early development images of this VN while they were just still images on Pixiv a few years back and loved the art style.  Excited to see it had made its way to Steam I immedietely purchased it.

The story is extremely cute and beyond already loving the art style the animated Act transition scenes took an already good VN and made it even better.

The story runs about 2-3 hours depending on your read speed but there are enough extras in the form of development CGs, notes from the author and even a set of extra scenes that come after the end of the main story that I easily added another 45 minutes to an hour just taking my time enjoying them.

For 10 dollars this game is absolutely worth it for all art content you get on top of the story.

I only wish there was a way to craft more than 5 badges for this to show my support even more.

Very excited to see what new works the developer will create in the future!

My personal wish? I'd love to see an after story DLC/patch added just to get more of these great characters!

author: {'steamid': '76561198042997868', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1433432151}
review:
Review originally publish at http://theotakujudge.com

Whilst browsing Steam’s ever-growing visual novel library a new release titled Love at First Sight caught my eye (no pun intended.) Published by the folks at Sekai Project, this high school romance chronicles the blossoming relationship between a shy girl named Sachi Usui and a transfer student called Mamarou. What is so distinguishing about this generic plot I hear you ask? Well, if the game’s picture hasn’t given it away already, Sachi happens to be a Cyclops. The novel’s leading lady was born with a single giant eye and no nose… although that isn’t too odd, as anime characters tend to be lacking in the schnoz department. Love between a human and a monster girl sounds weird to me, but then again what do I know? Monster Musume sells by the bucket load so clearly there is a market out there for geeks who lust after mythological creatures.

OVERVIEW

Our unorthodox tale of love begins with Mamarou bumping into a tearful Sachi. The ocular challenged cutie is feeling low, as a nasty classmate has been tormenting her. Although taken aback by her distinct appearance, Mamarou cannot get Sachi out of his head after their inaugural encounter. Wanting to get to know her better Mamarou begins to meet up with Sachi during recess. After learning that Sachi is an avid reader he begins to woo her with a stockpile of manga before eventually asking her out to a movie. Ah, so that’s what I have been doing wrong. I keep wasting money on flowers and chocolates. Next time I try to court a beauty I will shower her with comics instead.

Love at First Sight’s supporting cast, which you can count on one hand, includes Mamarou’s two best friends. Akemi is a bubbly lass blessed with a motor mouth and is the polar opposite of Tomonori who is much more reserved and sombre. Although likable, Mamarou’s chums are fairly one-dimensional and no I’m not talking about the way they are drawn. The same applies to Rui – the bully who picks on Sachi. Always seen with a scowl on her face, she is presented as a stereotypical troublemaker who preys on the meek. Perhaps the most fleshed out character from the bunch is Sachi’s aunt. She is initially presented as a cold-hearted foster parent, but the novel’s later chapters reveal that her relationship with Sachi is a bit more complex than that.

VERDICT

My rating for Love at First Sight is three stars. It’s a sweet short story brought to life by some striking artwork. Creepy Cute is the artist responsible for creating the novel and it must be said that he lives up to his moniker. Although the graphics have an eerie quality to them he still manages to make the scar covered Sachi look adorable. Even though the story is sold on starring a mono-eyed girl the narrative doesn’t dwell too deeply on Sachi’s looks and reads like a standard teen romance. The only thing weird about the plot is Sachi’s fondness for having her wounds caressed. Is this a clever way of exploring intimacy without resorting to potentially controversial sex scenes? Nah. In the extras section the author openly admits to having a scar fetish.

I would award Love at First Sight a higher score if it weren’t for its steep asking price. The whole thing can be read in just two hours, which isn’t great given that the download costs £7.00. A bit more content would have been nice, especially as Sachi’s final confrontation with Rui feels a tad rushed. Due to time constraints (the whole project was made in a couple of weeks to meet a convention deadline) there are also no branching paths to explore, which hurt the title’s replay value. Those quibbles aside, I still give Love at First Sight a thumbs up. Sachi’s plight should resonate with any readers who suffer from shyness, victims of bullying or anyone who has self-esteem issues pertaining to their physical appearance. Don’t let the cost put you off sampling this treat. If money is an issue “eye” recommend waiting for an inevitable Steam discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044498830', 'num_games_owned': 1061, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1433403937}
review:
"Love at First Sight" is the first game created by the developer "Creepy Cute" and the game certainly lives up to the Devs name.

It's a well-written and adorably sweet story that I enjoyed from start to finish. The characters were all likeable, save for one, who was still believable in her horribleness. If you're after an affordable and well-done story about two people falling in love, then this Visual Novel is certainly one to grab.

Definitely looking forward to more titles from this developer.

review:
Psst! Haters? I LIKE this game!
Yeah and I never write reviews. But there's so much pooky doo on the discussions and some srsly weird reviews. It's a lvoe story. And it addresses the concept of bullying - so why are the bullies doing the commentary? Maybe they need their own sandbox. Since it's a story, any discussion of plot is a spoiler. author: {'steamid': '76561198017228113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 827, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 574, 'last_played': 1473018803}
review:
Everyone has their own tastes and opinions.
I will not say what is right or wrong but at the same time I will not apologize for my opinion. Beyond this point I will try not to delve too deep into the story as to spoil it but some points in the story I feel essential to this review.

The point of reference for my opinion is that I think Clannad and Clannad After Story are the best works ever. No play, movie, opera, etc. can compare.
I'm not an expert on anime or trying to say that my opinion is the way it must be, this is just my point of reference.
With that in mind, I picked this game (VN) with no great expectations.

I was blown away by this simple beautiful story.

There are only 6 characters (other than minor players) in the whole story.
The drawings are simple but I think they are elegant. They convey the right mood at the right time in line with the story line.
The music simple as well, but I found it to be moving similar to the music in Clannad.

The heroine in the story has a physical deformity and suffers at the hands of a bully. The bully, as all bullies do, sees a weakness and attacks leaving injuries and scars. If you have never suffered at the hands of a bully, you probably cannot truly feel the plight our heroine goes through. The bully does this because our heroine is weak, but I think she is so strong to keep going and not give up. But she is not aided by anyone until our hero shows up. It's sad but this is a story that plays out so often for real everywhere. In the story no one says or does anything. I think that is just as bad as the bullying itself.

Anyway the heroine is scared physically from the attacks. These are physical scars but I see them as emotional scars. So when there is reference to our heroine asking the hero to 'touch her scars' I don't see that as a 'fetish' on the part of the author. I see that as her letting the hero into her most vulnerable spot - her deepest feelings - and he is touching the scars on her very being. Again I see this on an emotional level not physical and I don't think any two people can be closer than that.

Other characters in the story blend well with the plot. One of the hero's friends is very outgoing and one is almost zombie like. I think many people can relate because I think many people have friends like that. Throughout the story they stay true to character but you also watch their characters develop. The aunt of the heroine seems aloof but as the story develops, her character really comes through. Then there is the bully. Enough said.

This has been referred to as a typical high school romance type situation. But I got so much more out of it. I really liked the character development and the story line. I thought it had depth and though it appeared simple it was actually quite complex and elegant. In the end I wound up playing this straight through from start to finish in about 5 hours (not the fastest by any means) but I just couldn't stop. I thought it was that good.

SPOILER ALERT:
It was just nice to see a VN like this where the good guys win - ordinary people (even our one eyed heroine) doing extraordinary things. I wish my act was as together in High School as these characters.

The author offers apologies for shortcomings he sees with the 'game'.  Though it is not really a game but rather a VN, I still see this as a great experience that I would have gladly paid triple the amount to play. I hope he will make another because I just thought this was that well done.

author: {'steamid': '76561198070952397', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 320, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1477637653}
review:
単眼娘の幸ちゃんとイチャイチャラヴラヴするノベルゲームです。
ストーリーは一本道で、選択肢もありませんので、ゆっくり読んでも２時間程度でクリア可能です。
お話の方も、重すぎたりはせず、サクッと読める内容になっています。
物足りないと感じる方もいるかもしれませんが、自分はこれ位が好きだったりします。

あまり長い文章を書くのが得意ではないので、この作品の一番オススメする所をお伝えしておきます。
全７章で構成されているのですが、各章の切り替わり時に幸ちゃんのショートアニメが流れます、この幸ちゃんの可愛さと言ったら、言葉では表現できないので、皆さん是非ご自身の目で見ていただきたい。
そして布団の上でもだえ転げていただきたい。
お話の盛り上がり時に入る一枚絵を動かしてくれているのですが、本当に本当に本当に幸ちゃんがカワイイ。
幸ちゃんが可愛すぎて可愛すぎて、もう何て言ったら良いのかわかりません。

これをプレイした人は間違いなく単眼娘の属性を得ることになるでしょう。
それと傷フェチという新たな性癖も獲得するはずです。

とりあえずタイトル通りひと目惚れしちゃった人は迷わずポチってください。

author: {'steamid': '76561198006269309', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 210, 'last_played': 1432792588}

author: {'steamid': '76561198022334786', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 264, 'last_played': 1692762282}
review:
"Mamoru only had eyes for Sachi and Sachi had only one eye for Mamoru..."

Where to begin...  First i'd like to say that 'Eye' love this game!   This game is one of the sweetest, charming, cutest and heartwarming games ive played in along time.   The only complaint i have is that it's too short and that it's lacking polish in some parts of the story.  But other than that the game is amazing.   The characters are deep, well fleshed out, and very likeable.  Especially Sachi the cute uni-eyed heroine of the story.  She is such a breathtaking character regardless of how many eyes she has.   and the ending romance scene is so heartwarming and touching.

At first first glance I thought this would be just another melodramatic grim-dark game that would be highly depressing and sad.   ALOT of those flood the market nowadays.  and although there is a bully character who harasses Sachi,  This game more of a heartwarming boy-meets-girl where the girl just so happens to have only one eye rather than a dramatic "Good People Die get over it" story such as Game of Thrones.

'Eye' recommend this game to anyone who loves heart-warming romance stories with a happy ending.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025677654', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1432495073}
review:
這是我的第一篇評論，如有不妥請多見諒。
這是很普通的校園戀愛遊戲，不過主角是可愛的單眼娘。

劇情方面我就不劇透，不過是很溫馨甜蜜的劇情。
可惜有點短，也沒有任何分歧選項可選。
人物性格也因劇情長度而顯得有些平面，這點有些可惜。

音樂方面十分令人舒心，很搭配遊戲內容。
遊戲介面也沒有相當大的問題，硬要吹毛求疵的話，就只有重看之前劇情的Log部分作得有些瑕疵。

作為單人獨立製作的作品，我認為完成度已經頗高了。
然而，就劇情的長度以及遊玩時間，我並不認為值得以10鎂買下它。

但是，就已僅僅一個Pixiv繪師的小小幾張圖衍生出一個作品，我覺得其努力以及熱誠是值得花這10鎂的。

而且，男主角跟女主角之間的閃光有夠沒羞沒操的w
希望作者能夠推出更多的劇情，或是更好的遊戲。

推薦給喜歡單眼娘的人外控、喜歡純愛閃光的玩家。

author: {'steamid': '76561198188719961', 'num_games_owned': 367, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1470718611}
review:
A short but very lovely game. I fell in love with the main heroine, I have a thing for Cyclops Girls (and scars).

The art is nice, I also like the mini cinematics for each act.When I saw it, I went cuteness overload.The music is also well made, it fit most of the situations. My only problem is that, since the game was short, I felt that some of the story was rushed. But nonetheless, the story was cute and sweet. I'm just so happy  bought this game, it was really worth it.

I really recommend this game to those who love Cyclops Girls and Cute Highschool VNs. I also recommend this if you want to experience cuteness overload.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967763387', 'num_games_owned': 559, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1432461304}
review:
เป็นเกม Visual Novel สั้นๆไม่ยาวมากครับ ถ้าอ่านไปเรื่อยๆ 2-3 ชั่วโมงก็จบแล้วครับ
และเกมนี้เป็น Kinetic Novel คือไม่มีตัวเลือกบทสนทนาให้เลือกเลยในเกม
เหมือนเรานั่งอ่านนิยายแบบมีภาพประกอบมากกว่าและฉากจบมีฉากเดียวแต่คนสร้างเกม
ก็มีการใส่ Epilogue หรือเนื้อเรื่องหลังจบเกมเสริมเข้ามาให้คนเล่นได้อ่านเพิ่มเติมอีกนิดหน่อยครับ

Artwork หรืองานศิลป์

ภาพลายเส้นแบบนี้คนที่ชอบก็จะชอบครับคนที่เกลียดก็อาจจะเกลียดไปเลย เพราะดูน่ากลัว 
(โดยเฉพาะตานางเองมันช่างใหญ่โตจริงๆ) และภาพที่ออกแนวโทนมืดหม่นและลึกลับแบบแปลกๆ
ซึ่งก็ขึ้นอยู่กับรสนิยมของแต่ละคน แต่ผมว่ามันเข้ากับธีมของเกมดีครับ 
และยิ่งใครชอบสาวแนว Monster Girl น่าจะยิ่งถูกใจ ถ้าตัดประเด็นเรื่องนางเอกมีตาเดียวแล้ว
บางคนเห็นแล้วกลัวไปผมว่านางเอกออกแบบมาได้น่ารัก น่าถะนุถนอมดีครับ :P
ขอติคือ CG มันน้อยไปหน่อยแต่ก็มีให้ในฉากที่เป็นเหตุการณ์สำคัญครับ 

เนื้อเรื่อง

อันนี้เป็นข้อเสียใหญ่ในเกมนี้เลยครับ เหมือนกับว่าเกมนี้ทำด้วยทีมงานแค่คนเดียว
และมีอีกหนึ่งคนเป็นคนทำเพลงประกอบ เลยทำให้เนื้อเรื่องบางช่วงกำลังจะ peak สุดๆละแต่
ก็แบบตัดจบเอาดื้อๆสะงั้น อารมณ์แบบรวบรัดไปหน่อย ถ้าคนไม่เคยเล่นเกมแนว
Visual Novel มาก่อนอาจจะพอรับได้ แต่ถ้าใครเล่นเกมอื่นมาก่อนแล้วจะ
รู้สึกแบบนี้แน่นอนครับว่าบางช่วงมันเร่งไปหน่อย หรือรู้สึกว่าแก้ปัญหาง่ายไปหน่อยนะ
แต่โดยรวมก็เล่าเรื่องได้ดีครับ และชอบตรงช่วงที่คนทำเกมเอา Fetish ของตัวเอง
มาใส่ในเกมสนองนี้ดตัวเอง ผมขอเรียกว่ามันมาแทนฉาก H ของเกม VN 18+
เลยก็ว่าได้ = =; 
เนื้อเรื่องเกมนี้เป็นแนว High School Drama เกี่ยวกับการถูกทำร้าย
ร่างกายในโรงเรียน+ มีความแหวกแนวตรงที่
คนสร้างเอาความชื่นชอบส่วนตัวบางอย่างมาใส่ในเกม ซึ่งอ่านบท
ช่วงตรงนั้นแล้วอาจจะทำให้คนเล่นจินตนาการไปไกลได้....

เพลง/เสียงประกอบ

เกมนี้ไม่มีเสียงพากย์ตัวละครครับ เสียงประกอบฉากก็แทบไม่มีเลยครับ 
ส่วนเพลงประกอบมีทั้งหมด 8 Track ซึ่งก็แต่งมาเข้ากับเนื้อเรื่อง
หรือบรรยากาศในฉากนั้นได้ดีแต่ก็ไม่ได้เพราะแบบต้องหามาฟังครับ

ภาพรวมแล้วเกมนี้ผมให้ 7/10 ละกัน ข้อเสียคือเกมสั้นพอสมควร เนื่อเรื่องเร่งไปหน่อย ไม่มีเสียงพากย์และ CG น้อยครับ
ข้อดีคือ เนื้อเรื่องถึงจะสั้นแต่ก็อ่านได้เพลินๆ นางเอกน่ารักครับ :P 
สรุปตอนจบได้ ok และมี Bonus เนื้่อเรื่องหลังเหตุการณ์จากฉากจบ
ต่อให้อ่านอีกนิดหน่อย แล้วก็ CG ต้นแบบก่อนจะมาเป็นเกมพร้อมคำอธิบายของคนสร้างเกมให้อ่านเล่นอีกด้วย
ถ้าใครไม่ใช่แฟนเกมแนว อ่านเยอะๆแบบนี้ก็ไม่แนะนำครับหรือใครงบน้อยก็รอลุ้นตอนมัน Sale ค่อยซื้อก็ไม่เสียหายครับ

author: {'steamid': '76561198206864836', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1432452769}
review: No actual gameplay but a really sweet story with fun and engaging characters as well as great art, I have no regrets buying this visual novel and would recommend it to anyone who likes this sort of thing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068919027', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 154, 'last_played': 1432435546}
review:
Short, cute, and fairly satisfying. It may be overpriced for some, but as a bibliophile I liked it.

If you read a lot of visual novels, you might be disappointed. As a first for me, i liked it for being lighter and being an easy read. I don't care about branching paths (of which this game has none) since i usually just put myself in the main characters's shoes. For me, branching paths are just content i won't see, or will feel forced to seek out despite having played the game as i wanted to play it. 

If you want a light, short, and simple experience, this game/visual novel is a nice piece of content. Great for first timers, but lacking in depth.
